      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldValidation" cachelocation="false">
/**
*  Purpose: Used for validating required fields in step 3 of wizard .Displays error message accordingly on violation
*  Where: step 3 Next button click snippet
*
* @name  Fieldvalidation.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/

//params will contail all the info about the context of call like which record data calles it,what condition,etc
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');
var newCollateralRow = newCollateralModel.data[0];

var newCollateralTypeCatModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_CollateralTypeCategoryAssoc');
var collCatCatModelCondition = newCollateralTypeCatModel.getConditionByName('collTypeName');
newCollateralTypeCatModel.setCondition(collCatCatModelCondition, newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Type__r.Name);
newCollateralTypeCatModel.activateCondition(collCatCatModelCondition);

skuid.model.updateData([newCollateralTypeCatModel],function(){
    var catRow = newCollateralTypeCatModel.data[0];

    newCollateralModel.updateRow(newCollateralRow ,
                        { clcommon__Collateral_Category__c : catRow.clcommon__Collateral_Category__c });


});

//fetch the wizard object
var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
//fetch wizard current step
var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    var editor = $('#detailsPage ').data('object').editor;
    editor.messages.empty();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};

var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

var ApplicationCollateralNewModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralNew');
var ApplicationCollateralNewRow = ApplicationCollateralNewModel.data[0];

if(!newAppCollRow){
    var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.createRow();
}

//validation condition
if(newCollateralRow.NewCollateral){

    if(newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Name__c && newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Code__c ){
        /* update pledge amount to 0 */
        ApplicationCollateralNewModel.updateRow(ApplicationCollateralNewRow, {'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c':0});

        //navigate to step 4 in wizard
        currentStep.navigate('step4');
    }
    else{
         return displayMessage('Fill all the fields marked in red ', 'ERROR');
    }
}
else{
    var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
    var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

    var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_CollateralValuation');
    var colValRow = collValModel.data[0];

    if(colValRow === undefined) {
        /* update pledge amount to 0 */
        newAppCollModel.updateRow(newAppCollRow, {'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c':0});
    }

    //navigate to step 4 in wizard
    currentStep.navigate('step4');
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateRemainingValue" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_CollateralValuation');
var collValRow = collValModel.getFirstRow();

var allAppForCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_ApplicationsForCollateral');
var allAppForCollateralList = allAppForCollateralModel.data;

var total_pladge_amt = 0;

if(allAppForCollateralList !== undefined) {
    /* sum all pledge amount across all application for this collateral */
    $.each(allAppForCollateralList, function(fieldId,appColRow) {
        $.each(appColRow,function(fieldName,val) {
            if ((fieldName != 'attributes') && (fieldName === 'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c')) {
                if(val !== undefined && val !== null) {
                    total_pladge_amt = total_pladge_amt + val;


                }

            }
        });
    });
    if(collValRow !== undefined) {
        /* update remianing value = Appraisaed_Value -Sum(Pledge_Amount across other loan application) */
        collValModel.updateRow(collValRow,{
             RemainingValue: collValRow.clcommon__Appraised_Value__c - total_pladge_amt
        });
    }
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveAppColNew" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');
newCollateralModel = newCollateralModel.data[0];
var newEquipmentDetails = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralClone');
newEquipmentDetails = newEquipmentDetails.data[0];

var quickQuote = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
quickQuote = quickQuote.data[0];
var CollateralCatTypeAssio = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralCategoryTypeAssociation');
newCollateralModel.clcommon__Collateral_Type__c = CollateralCatTypeAssio.data[0].clcommon__Collateral_Type__r.Id;
newCollateralModel.clcommon__Collateral_Category__c = CollateralCatTypeAssio.data[0].clcommon__Collateral_Category__r.Id;

for(var key in newCollateralModel) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
       delete newCollateralModel[key];
    }
}

for(var key in newEquipmentDetails) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {

       delete newEquipmentDetails[key];
    }
}
    
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.AppCollSaveAndUpdateActions','saveOrUpdateAppCollateral',{
         collParams : JSON.stringify(newCollateralModel),
         appCollParams : JSON.stringify(newEquipmentDetails),
         appId : quickQuote.Id
    });
    

try {
    var result = sforce.apex.execute(
    'genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl',
    'generatePricing', {
        applicationId : quickQuote.Id
    }
);

} catch (err) {
    console.log('Error getting pricing: ' + err.description);
}

var appEquipmentToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("ApplicationEquipmentParent");

if(appEquipmentToRefresh !== undefined) {
    appEquipmentToRefresh.updateData();
}

var appCollateralToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("ApplicationCollateralParent");

if(appCollateralToRefresh !== undefined) {
    appCollateralToRefresh.updateData();
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="EquipmentSelectValidation" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
	$ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

var newCollateralCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralClone');
var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.data[0];
//Throwing error if no option (New Relationship / Existing Relationship) is selected
if(!(newCollateralCloneRow && (newCollateralCloneRow.NewCollateral || newCollateralCloneRow.ExistingCollateral || newCollateralCloneRow.EquipmentMasterBtn))){
     stepEditor.handleMessages(
         [{
            message: 'Please select one of the options (New Equipment  / Existing Equipment / Equipment Master)!',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
    );
    return false;
}
</jsitem>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId }]
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication').createRow({});
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);

    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calculateFinancedAmount" cachelocation="false">var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('PricingAppModel');

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="selectPricingOption" cachelocation="false">/*
var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('PricingAppModel');

var records = skuid.$.map(arguments[0].list.getSelectedItems(),function(item){ 
        return item.row; 
    }); 
console.log(records);
console.log(arguments[0].list);
if ( !records[0]  || records.length < 1) { 
    alert("Please select at least one pricing option"); 
}else if(records  && records.length > 1){
    alert("Please select at only one pricing option"); 
} else{ 
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SelectPricingOnApplication','selectPricingOption',
    {   
            pricingId : records[0].Id
    });
    alert(result);
}
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calculateFinancedAmount1" cachelocation="false">var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('PricingAppModel');
var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePricing',
{   
        applicationId : pricingAppRow.Id
});

// Update pricing status
pricingAppModel.updateRow({
    Id: pricingAppRow.Id
}, {
    genesis__Status__c: "NEW - PRICING GENERATED"
});

// Save updates
pricingAppModel.save({
    callback: function (result) {
        if (result.totalsuccess) {
             //alert('New Quote Id: ' + appRow.Id); 
        } else {
            alert('Error: ' + result.insertResults[0]); 
            console.log(result.insertResults[0]);          
        }
    }
});

alert(result);
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CalcPaymentsOrYield" cachelocation="false">var $ = skuid.$
var pageTitle = $('#pricingPanel');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;

var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('PricingAppModel');
var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];

/*
* Added IsYieldEnabled Model to check for which choiceNo to send based on selected checkbox genesis__Is_Get_Yield_Enabled__c 
*/
var isYieldEnabledModel = skuid.model.getModel('IsYieldEnabled'); 
var isYieldEnabledRow = isYieldEnabledModel.data[0];

var pAppObj = new sforce.SObject("genesis__Applications__c");
for(var key in pricingAppRow) {
   if(key.includes('__c') || key === 'Id'|| key === 'Name') {
       pAppObj[key] = pricingAppRow[key];
   }    
}

var choiceNo = 1;
if( ! isYieldEnabledRow['genesis__Is_Get_Yield_Enabled__c'] ){
    choiceNo = 2;
}

var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','calculatePricingFactors',
{   
        application : pAppObj,
        choice : choiceNo
});

if(result == 'Successfully computed...'){
    
    /* 
    Added extra if else to check against choiceNo to display whether yield/payment is 
    succesfully computed. Earlier in both cases only "yield calculated succesfully" was getting displayed
    */
    
    if(choiceNo == 1){
        editor.handleMessages( 
       [{
          
           message: 'Yield Calculated Successfully', 
           severity: 'INFO'
       }]
    )} else {
        editor.handleMessages( 
       [{
          
           message: 'Payment Calculated Successfully', 
           severity: 'INFO'
       }]
    )}
} else {
    editor.handleMessages(
        [{
              message: result,
              severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
    );
}</jsitem>

*/

var isYieldEnabledRow = isYieldEnabledModel.data[0];

console.log('isYieldEnabledRow ',isYieldEnabledRow);
isYieldEnabledModel.save();
</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveSelectedPointSetup" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];
var records = skuid.$.map(arguments[0].list.getSelectedItems(),function(item){

        });</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updatePointsOverride" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CreateNewTemplate" cachelocation="false">
    //a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
    //Get a reference to this element
    var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

    var lfFeeChargeModel = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricingFee_FeeCharge');
    var lfFeeChargeRow = lfFeeChargeModel.data[0];

    //setting param for NewCreateTemplate true
    if(!lfFeeChargeRow){
        var lfFeeChargeRow = lfFeeChargeModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'NewCreateAdhoc', value:false },
                { field: 'NewCreateTemplate', value: true },
            ]
        });

    }else{
        lfFeeChargeModel.updateRow(lfFeeChargeRow ,
                            { NewCreateAdhoc : false ,
                              NewCreateTemplate : true });



    }

</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createTemplateSnippet" cachelocation="false">
    var $ = skuid.$,
    action = arguments[0].action,
    list = arguments[0].list,
    model = arguments[0].model,
    selectedItems = list.getSelectedItems();

    var editor = $('#errorDisplayPopupFees').data('object').editor;

    // Handle error messages
    var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
                severity: severity.toUpperCase()
            }
        ]);

        return false;
    };

    if(!selectedItems || selectedItems.length===0){
        return displayMessage('Please select a row ', 'ERROR');
    }

    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];

    var rowToupdates =[];
    var rowUpdates ={};

        $.each( selectedItems,function( i, item ){
            rowUpdates ={};
            var row = item.row;
            $.each( row,function( f, val ){
                if ((f == 'clcommon__Amount__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['genesis__Amount__c'] = val;

                }

                if ((f == 'Name')) {
                    rowUpdates['Name'] = val;
                }

                if ((f == 'Id')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Fee_Definition__c'] = val;
                }

    /*            if ((f == 'clcommon__Type__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Type__c'] = val;
                }*/
                if ((f == 'clcommon__Taxable__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Taxable__c'] = val;
                }
                if ((f == 'clcommon__Include_in_APR__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Include_in_APR__c'] = val;
                }
                if ((f == 'clcommon__Capitalize__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Capitalize__c'] = val;
                }
                if ((f == 'clcommon__Include_In_Dues__c')) {
                    rowUpdates['clcommon__Include_In_Dues__c'] = val;
                }

            });

            rowToupdates.push(rowUpdates);


        });


    var lfFeeChargeClone2Model = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricingFee_FeeChargeClone2');
    lfFeeChargeClone2Model.cancel();
    var lfFeeChargeClone2Row = lfFeeChargeClone2Model.data[0];


    $.each( rowToupdates,function( i, item ){
        lfFeeChargeClone2Model.createRow( {
            additionalConditions: [

                { field :'clcommon__Original_Amount__c',value :item.genesis__Amount__c },
                { field :'clcommon__Fee_Definition__c',value :item.clcommon__Fee_Definition__c },
                {field : 'genesis__Application__c',value : skuid.page.params.id},
                //{field : 'clcommon__Type__c',value : item.clcommon__Type__c},
                {field : 'clcommon__Taxable__c',value : item.clcommon__Taxable__c},
                {field : 'clcommon__Include_in_Dues__c',value : item.clcommon__Include_in_Dues__c},
                {field : 'clcommon__Capitalize__c',value : item.clcommon__Capitalize__c},
                {field : 'clcommon__Include_in_APR__c',value : item.clcommon__Include_in_APR__c}
            ]});

    });


    skuid.component.getById('saveFeeInPopUp').element.show();
    skuid.component.getById('cancelFeeInPopup').element.show();

    currentStep.navigate('step2');</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="checkIfExistingPaymentDetailFound" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	var UIOnlyModel = skuid.model.getModel('UIOnlyModel');
    var UIModelRow = UIOnlyModel.getFirstRow();
    var FeeChargeCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricingFee_FeeChargeCloneModel');
    var FeeChargeCloneModelRow=FeeChargeCloneModel.getRowById(UIModelRow.RowID);
    var currPaymentDetailID= FeeChargeCloneModelRow.genesis__Application_Fee_Payment__c!==null?FeeChargeCloneModelRow.genesis__Application_Fee_Payment__c:UIModelRow.curr_Payment_Detail_Selected;
    var paymentDetailPresent = 0;
    $.each(FeeChargeCloneModel.getRows(), function(i, row) {
        if (row.genesis__Application_Fee_Payment__c === currPaymentDetailID) {
                paymentDetailPresent++;
            }
    });
    if(paymentDetailPresent==1)
      return true;
    else
      return false;</jsitem>

Name: LeasePricingFeePaymentSchedule
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" showheader="true">
  <models>
    <model id="LeasePricingFPaymentSchedule_PSApplication" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Applications__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="RecordTypeId"/>
        <field id="genesis__CL_Product__r.genesis__Generate_Amortization_Schedule__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Product_Sub_Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="LeasePricingFPaymentSchedule_PSPaymentStream" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Payment_Stream__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Sequence__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Start_Date__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Payment_Amount__c"/>
        <field id="Fee" uionly="true" displaytype="DOUBLE" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="9" scale="2" label="Fee" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="totalPaymentAmount" uionly="true" displaytype="DOUBLE" length="255" label="Total Payment Amount" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="9" scale="2"/>
        <field id="Rent" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" precision="9" scale="2">
          <formula>{{genesis__Payment_Amount__c}}</formula>
        </field>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="onloadPaymentStream" cachelocation="false" url="">
(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricingFPaymentSchedule_PSApplication');
        var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];
        
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePaymentSchedule',
            {   
                applicationId : pricingAppRow.Id,
            }
        );
        		
    	var response=JSON.parse(result);
    	
        var pStreamAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricingFPaymentSchedule_PSPaymentStream');
        var pStreamAppRow = pStreamAppModel.data;
        var additionalConditions={};
        
        pStreamAppModel.abandonAllRows();
        
    	if(pricingAppRow.genesis__CL_Product__r.genesis__Generate_Amortization_Schedule__c === false || pricingAppRow.genesis__Product_Sub_Type__c === 'OPERATING LEASE'){
        	for(var i=response.length-1;i>=0;i--) {
                var newChargeRow = pStreamAppModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'genesis__Sequence__c', value:response[i].seqnum },
                        { field: 'genesis__Start_Date__c', value: response[i].date },
                        { field: 'genesis__Payment_Amount__c', value: response[i].originalamount },
                        { field: 'Fee', value: response[i].feeamount },
                        { field: 'totalPaymentAmount', value: response[i].totalamount }
                    ]
                });
        	}
    	}
	});
})(skuid);
		</jsitem>
    </javascript>

	}
	
	
	</cssitem>

			<label id="genesis__LeasePricingForManual_RemainingPayments_LessThanTerm"/>

		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="inline" name="onloadPricing" cachelocation="false" url="">	(function(skuid){
			   var $ = skuid.$;
			   $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
			
			var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
	        var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];
	        var update = {};
			
	        if(pricingAppRow.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c === null || pricingAppRow.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c === undefined)
	        {
	            update[pricingAppRow.Id] = {
	                    genesis__Number_of_Advance_Payments__c : 1 ,
						genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c: pricingAppRow.genesis__Term__c - 1
			    };
			    pricingAppModel.updateRows(update);
			    pricingAppModel.save();
	        }
			
            var PaymentSequenceModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel');
        
            $.each(PaymentSequenceModel.getRows(), function(j, row) {
               if(row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c !== null || row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c !== undefined){
                   PaymentSequenceModel.updateRow(row, {'PaymentAmount' : row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c});
               } 
            });
            
			$('#PricingCellEdit').hide();
			$('#PricingCellRead').show();
			$('#ManualPricingCalculatorButton').attr('title', 'Manual Pricing Action');
			$('#EditAPplicationLP').attr('title', 'Edit Application');
			 var modelToRefreshUnlock = skuid.model.getModel("LeasePricingforManual_ApplicationLockStatus");
            var applicationLock = skuid.model.getModel("NGLoanDashBoard_ApplicationLockStatus");
            if(applicationLock !== undefined && modelToRefreshUnlock !== undefined) {
                  if (applicationLock.getFirstRow().RecordStatus ) {
                      modelToRefreshUnlock.updateRow(modelToRefreshUnlock.getFirstRow(), {
                      RecordStatus : true
                        });
                  }
            }

		});
	})(skuid);</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="hidePricingCellRead" cachelocation="false">	var params = arguments[0],
			   $ = skuid.$;
			$('#PricingCellEdit').show();
			$('#PricingCellRead').hide();</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="hidePricingCellEdit" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
			$('#PricingCellEdit').hide();
			$('#PricingCellRead').show();</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="oneditApplication" cachelocation="false">	var params = arguments[0],
			   $ = skuid.$;
	
 	$('#ApplicationPricingSave').hide();
    var pageTitle = $('#buttonCell');
	var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
	
	var PricingApplicationModel=skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
	PricingApplicationlistRow = PricingApplicationModel.data;
	var updates = {};
    var message;
	if(params.row.genesis__Down_Payment__c>params.row.genesis__Estimated_Selling_Price__c)
	{
    editor.clearMessages();
	editor.handleMessages(

			[{

				message: 'Downpayment amount cannot exceed selling price',
				severity: 'ERROR'
			},]);

			 updates[PricingApplicationlistRow.Id]= {
			   genesis__Down_Payment__c:0
		   }
	}
	else if(params.row.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c>100)
	{
	
	editor.clearMessages();
	editor.handleMessages(

			[{

				message: 'Downpayment % cannot be greater than 100%',
				severity: 'ERROR'
			},]);
			  updates[PricingApplicationlistRow.Id]= {
			   genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c:''
		   }
	}
	else if(params.row.genesis__Number_of_Advance_Payments__c <= 0)
	{
		message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__LeasePricingForManual_AdvancePayment_Validation}}");
	    editor.clearMessages();
	    editor.handleMessages(

		[{
			message: message,
			severity: 'ERROR'
		},]);
	}
	else if(params.row.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c <= 0)
	{
		message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__LeasePricingForManual_RemainingPayment_Validation}}");
	    editor.clearMessages();
	    editor.handleMessages(

		[{
			message: message,
			severity: 'ERROR'
		},]);
	}
	else if(params.row.genesis__Number_of_Advance_Payments__c > params.row.genesis__Term__c)
	{
		message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__LeasePricingForManual_AdvancePayment_LessThanTerm}}");
	    editor.clearMessages();
	    editor.handleMessages(

		[{
			message: message,
			severity: 'ERROR'
		},]);
	}
	else if(params.row.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c > params.row.genesis__Term__c)
	{
		message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__LeasePricingForManual_RemainingPayments_LessThanTerm}}");
	    editor.clearMessages();
	    editor.handleMessages(

		[{
			message: message,
			severity: 'ERROR'
		},]);
	}
	
	else if((params.row.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c != (params.row.genesis__Term__c - 1)) &&  ((params.row.genesis__Number_of_Advance_Payments__c + params.row.genesis__Number_of_Remaining_Payments__c) != params.row.genesis__Term__c ))
	{
	    message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__LeasePricingForManual_NoOfPayments_Validation}}");
	    editor.clearMessages();
	    editor.handleMessages(

		[{
			message: message,
			severity: 'ERROR'
		},]);
	}
	
	else
	{
	    $('#ApplicationPricingSave').show();
	    editor.clearMessages();
	}

	 PricingApplicationModel.updateRows(updates);

			</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="beforeshowPaymentStreamSolvedfor" cachelocation="false">	var params = arguments[0],
			   $ = skuid.$;
	$('#SolvedforPanel').hide();
	$('#CalculateSolvedFor').hide();
	$('#paymentAmountSolveFor').hide();
	$('#AdditionalYield').hide();
	$('#SaveCalculatedValue').hide();</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="afterSolvedforPaymentStream" cachelocation="false">	var params = arguments[0],
			   $ = skuid.$;
	$('#SolvedforPanel').show();
	$('#CalculateSolvedFor').show();
	if(params.row.genesis__Solve_For__c == 'Payment Amount') {
	    $('#paymentAmountSolveFor').show();
	}
	else {
	    $('#paymentAmountSolveFor').hide();
	}
	$('#AdditionalYield').show();

	</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="callFinancedAmountandYield" cachelocation="false">	var $ = skuid.$
	var pageTitle = $('#buttonCell');
	var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;

	var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
	var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];

	var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePricing',
	{
			applicationId : pricingAppRow.Id,
	});
	if(result[0].includes('More than one')){
		alert(result);
	}
	$('#PricingCellEdit').hide();
	$('#PricingCellRead').show();
	</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calculateSolvedfor" cachelocation="false">
	var $ = skuid.$
	var pageTitle = $('#SolveforMsg');
	var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
	editor.clearMessages();
	var isError = false;

	var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
	var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];

	var YieldModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_Yield');
	var yieldAppRow = YieldModel.data;

	var changedAdditionalYieldPercentage = 0;
	var changedYieldId = null;
	var selectedYieldsCount = 0;


	var yieldNameToYieldIdMap =new Map();
	var yieldStreamJSON = '';
	$.each(YieldModel.getRows(),function(i,row) {
        yieldNameToYieldIdMap.set(row.Name, row.Id);

		if(yieldStreamJSON.length > 0) {
		    yieldStreamJSON = yieldStreamJSON + ',';
		}
        if (row.genesis__User_Computed_Yield__c === true) {
            selectedYieldsCount = selectedYieldsCount + 1;
            if (row.Input === undefined || row.Input === '' || row.Input === null) {
                row.Input = row.genesis__Yield_Percentage__c;
            }
            changedAdditionalYieldPercentage = row.Input;
            changedYieldId = row.Id;
        }
		yieldStreamJSON = yieldStreamJSON + '{"Id": "' + row.Id + '",';
		yieldStreamJSON = yieldStreamJSON + '"genesis__Yield_Percentage__c": "' + (row.Input === undefined || row.Input === '' || row.Input === null ? 0 : row.Input) + '",';
		yieldStreamJSON = yieldStreamJSON + '"Name": "' + row.Name + '"}';
	});

	yieldStreamJSON = '{"YIELD_STREAM": [' + yieldStreamJSON + ']}';

	var PaymentStreamModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel');
	var PaymentStreamRow = PaymentStreamModel.data;

	var AmortizationScheduleModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_AmortizationScheduleModel');
	var AmortizationScheduleRow = AmortizationScheduleModel.data;
	
	var standardYield=pricingAppRow.genesis__Yield__c;
	var solveFor=pricingAppRow.genesis__Solve_For__c;
	var paymentAmount = pricingAppRow.genesis__Payment_Amount__c;

    if (solveFor === 'Payment Amount') {
        if (selectedYieldsCount > 1) {
            isError = true;
            editor.handleMessages(
			[{
				message: 'Please provide only one user input yield in additional yields table.',
				severity: 'ERROR'
			}]);
        }
        else if (standardYield !== null && standardYield !== undefined && standardYield !== '' && standardYield !== 0
            && selectedYieldsCount === 1) {
            isError = true;
        	editor.handleMessages(
				[{
				message: 'Standard yield should not be provided when user input yield is checked. Please provide only one yield value for payment amount calculation.',
				severity: 'ERROR'
			}]);
        }
        else if (selectedYieldsCount === 0 && (standardYield === null || standardYield === undefined || standardYield === '')) {
            isError = true;
            editor.handleMessages(
				[{
				message: 'Please provide yield value for payment amount calculation.',
				severity: 'ERROR'
			}]);
        }
        if (isError === true) {
            $.unblockUI();
    		return false;
        }
    }
	var paymentStreamJSON = '';
	var paymentDates = new Set();
	var paymentSequences = new Set();
	$.each(PaymentStreamModel.getRows(),function(i,row) {
	    if (paymentDates.has(row.genesis__Start_Date__c)) {
	        isError = true;
	        editor.handleMessages(
				[{
				message: 'More than one payment streams are provided for date ' + row.genesis__Start_Date__c,
				severity: 'ERROR'
			}]);
	    }
	    /*if (paymentSequences.has(row.genesis__Sequence__c)) {
	        isError = true;
	        editor.handleMessages(
				[{
				message: 'More than one payment streams found for sequence number ' + row.genesis__Sequence__c,
				severity: 'ERROR'
			}]);
	    }*/
	    paymentDates.add(row.genesis__Start_Date__c);
	    paymentSequences.add(row.genesis__Sequence__c);
		if(paymentStreamJSON.length > 0) {
		    paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + ',';
		}
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '{"Id": "' + row.Id + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Application__c": "' + row.genesis__Application__c + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Payment_Frequency__c": "' + row.genesis__Payment_Frequency__c + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Sequence__c": "' + row.genesis__Sequence__c + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Number_of_Payments__c": "' + row.genesis__Number_of_Payments__c + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Payment_Amount__c": "' + row.PaymentAmount + '",';
		if (solveFor === 'Payment Amount') {
		    //Put the seasonal Payment value from application
		    paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Seasonal_Payment__c": "' + pricingAppRow.genesis__Seasonal_Payment__c + '",';
		}
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Payment_Type__c": "' + row.genesis__Payment_Type__c + '",';
		paymentStreamJSON = paymentStreamJSON + '"genesis__Start_Date__c": "' + row.genesis__Start_Date__c + '"}';
	});

	if (isError === true) {
        $.unblockUI();
		return false;
	}

	paymentStreamJSON = '{"PAYMENT_STREAM":[' + paymentStreamJSON + ']}';

	if(pricingAppRow.genesis__Solve_For__c === "Financed Amount" && pricingAppRow.genesis__Financed_Amount__c > 0) {
        isError = true;
		editor.clearMessages();
		editor.handleMessages([{
			message: 'Financed amount has already been calculated',
			severity: 'ERROR'
		}]);
        $.unblockUI();
		return false;
	}
	else{
    	var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','calculateSolveFor',
            	{
            			applicationId : pricingAppRow.Id,
            			paymentStreamListJSON : paymentStreamJSON,
            			yieldListJSON : yieldStreamJSON,
            			changedAdditionalYieldId : changedYieldId,
            			standardYieldValue : standardYield,
            			isAPR : false,
            			solveFor : solveFor
            	});
    	try{
    	    var response=JSON.parse(result);
    	    updateApplication={};
    	    updateYield={};
        	for(var key in response) {
        		if(key === 'STANDARD_YIELD'){
        			if(response.STANDARD_YIELD>=0){
        				updateApplication[pricingAppRow.Id] = {
        					genesis__Yield__c:response.STANDARD_YIELD,
        					genesis__Maturity_Date__c : response.MATURITY_DATE,
        					APRflag:'true'
        				}
        				editor.clearMessages();
        				editor.handleMessages(
        				[{
        					 message: 'Yield got calculated.'
        				}]);
        			}
        			else{
                        isError = true;
    					editor.clearMessages();
    					editor.handleMessages(
    					 [{
    						  message: 'Calculated standard yield should be greater than zero.',
    						  severity: 'ERROR'
        				}]);
        			}
        		}
        		else if(yieldNameToYieldIdMap.has(key)){
        			updateYield[yieldNameToYieldIdMap.get(key)] = {
    					genesis__Yield_Percentage__c:response[key]
    				};
        		}
            }
        	YieldModel.updateRows(updateYield);

            for(var key in response) {
        	    if(key === 'PAYMENT_AMOUNT'){
        			 if(response.PAYMENT_AMOUNT>=0){
        				updateApplication[pricingAppRow.Id] = {
            				genesis__Payment_Amount__c:response.PAYMENT_AMOUNT,
            				genesis__Advance_Payment_Amount__c:response.ADVANCE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT,
            				genesis__Yield__c:response.STANDARD_YIELD,
            				genesis__Maturity_Date__c : response.MATURITY_DATE,
            				APRflag:'true'
        				};
        				editor.clearMessages();
        				editor.handleMessages(
        				[{
        					 message: 'Payment amount got calculated.',
        				}]);
        			}
        			else{
        			    isError = true;
        				editor.clearMessages();
        				editor.handleMessages(
    					[{
    						message: 'Payment amount cannot be negative.',
    						severity: 'ERROR'
    					 }]);
        			}
        		}
        		else if (key === 'PAYMENT_STREAM') {
        		    //remove existing rows and replace them by new payment stream
        		    PaymentStreamModel.abandonAllRows();
        		    var paymentStreamList = JSON.parse(response.PAYMENT_STREAM);
        		    if (paymentStreamList.length > 0) {
            		    for(var i = 0; i < paymentStreamList.length; i++) {
                            var payment = paymentStreamList[i];
            		        PaymentStreamModel.createRow({
                                additionalConditions: [
                                    { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: pricingAppRow.Id },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Start_Date__c', value: payment.pmtDate },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Payment_Frequency__c', value: payment.frequency },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Sequence__c', value: payment.sequence },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Number_of_Payments__c', value: payment.noOfPmt },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Payment_Amount__c', value: payment.rentAmount },
                                    { field: 'PaymentAmount', value: payment.rentAmount },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Payment_Type__c', value: (payment.pmtType === 'TAX DEFERRAL' ? 'Tax' : null) }
                                ], doAppend: true
                            });
            		    }
        		    }
        		}
        		else if(key === 'FINANCE_AMOUNT'){
        			if(response.FINANCE_AMOUNT>=0) {
        				updateApplication[pricingAppRow.Id] = {
        					genesis__Financed_Amount__c:response.FINANCE_AMOUNT,
        					genesis__Yield__c:response.STANDARD_YIELD,
        					genesis__Maturity_Date__c : response.MATURITY_DATE,
        					APRflag:'true'
        				};
        				editor.clearMessages();
        				editor.handleMessages(
        				[{
        					 message: 'Financed amount got calculated.',
        				}]);
        			}
        			else {
        			    isError = true;
        				editor.clearMessages();
        				editor.handleMessages(
        				 [{
        					message: 'Financed amount cannot be negative.',
        					severity: 'ERROR'
        				}]);
        			}
        		}
        		else if (key === 'ERROR_MESSAGE') {
        		    isError = true;
        		    editor.clearMessages();
        			editor.handleMessages([{
    					message: 'ERROR: ' + response.ERROR_MESSAGE,
    					severity: 'ERROR'
    				}]);
        		}
        		else if (key === 'AMORTIZATION_SCHEDULE') {
        		    //remove existing rows and replace them by new Amortization schedule
            		$.each(AmortizationScheduleRow, function(i, row) {
                        AmortizationScheduleModel.deleteRow(row);
                    });
        		    var AmortizationScheduleList = JSON.parse(response.AMORTIZATION_SCHEDULE);
        		    if (AmortizationScheduleList.length > 0) {
            		    for(var i = 0; i < AmortizationScheduleList.length; i++) {
                            var payment = AmortizationScheduleList[i];
            		        AmortizationScheduleModel.createRow({
                                additionalConditions: [
                                    { field: 'genesis__Payment_Number__c', value: i+1 },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: pricingAppRow.Id },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Due_Date__c', value: payment.Date },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Due_Interest__c', value: payment.Interest },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Due_Principal__c', value: payment.Principle },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Rent__c', value: payment.Rent },
                                    { field: 'genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c', value: payment.PrincipleBalance }
                                ], doAppend: true
                            });
            		    }
        		    }
        		}
        	}//end for loop
        	if (isError === true) {
                $.unblockUI();
        		return false;
        	}
        	pricingAppModel.updateRows(updateApplication);
        	YieldModel.updateRows(updateYield);
        }
        catch(err) {
    	   editor.clearMessages();
    	   editor.handleMessages(
    	   [{

    			message: result,
    			severity: 'ERROR'
    		}]);
        }
	}
    $('#SaveCalculatedValue').show();
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="savePaymentStream" cachelocation="false">	var params = arguments[0],
			   $ = skuid.$;
	var PaymentSequenceModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel');

    $.each(PaymentSequenceModel.getRows(), function(j, row) {
       if(row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c === null || row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c === undefined){
           PaymentSequenceModel.updateRow(row, {'genesis__Payment_Amount__c' : row.PaymentAmount});
       } 
    });
    
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
    var applicationRow = applicationModel.getFirstRow();

    //Delete the old payment schedule as the new schedule would be saved in 'LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel'
        var paymentStreamsToDeleteModel = skuid.model.getModel('LeasePricing_PaymentStreamsToDelete');
        $.each(paymentStreamsToDeleteModel.getRows(), function(i, row) {
            var retainPmt = false;
            //Check if the payment is already present in LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel model, don't delete that payment
            $.each(PaymentSequenceModel.getRows(), function(j, pmtRow) {
                if (row.Id === pmtRow.Id) {
                    retainPmt = true;
                    return false; // break the inner loop
                }
            });
            if (retainPmt !== true) {
                paymentStreamsToDeleteModel.deleteRow(row);
            }
        });
        skuid.model.save([paymentStreamsToDeleteModel, PaymentSequenceModel], {callback: function(result){}});

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeferralPaymentvalidation" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
		 $ = skuid.$;

var LeasePricingApplicationModel=skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
var LeasePricingApplicationRow=LeasePricingApplicationModel.data[0];

var  updateApplication={};

var pageTitle = $('#buttonCell');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

 if(!(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c===undefined || LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c===null
  || LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c==="") &&
  !(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c===undefined || LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c===null
  || LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c==="")) {
	editor.handleMessages([{
			message: 'You shoud either provide downpayment % or downpayment amount. Both cannot be entered',
			severity: 'ERROR'
	}]);

    updateApplication[LeasePricingApplicationRow.Id] = {
	    genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c:''
    }
}
else{
	if(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c > 0 && LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c <= LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Estimated_Selling_Price__c) {
		updateApplication[LeasePricingApplicationRow.Id] = {
		   genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c:(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Down_Payment__c/LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Estimated_Selling_Price__c)*100
		};
	}
	else if(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c > 0 && LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c <= 100) {
		 updateApplication[LeasePricingApplicationRow.Id] = {
		   genesis__Down_Payment__c:(LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Downpayment_Percentage__c/100)*LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Estimated_Selling_Price__c
		};
	}
}


var taxDeferralDate = LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Tax_Deferral_Payment_Date__c;
var taxDeferralPeriod = LeasePricingApplicationRow.genesis__Tax_Deferral_Payment_Period__c;
if(taxDeferralDate !== undefined && taxDeferralDate !== null &&  taxDeferralDate !== "" &&
   taxDeferralPeriod !== undefined && taxDeferralPeriod !== null && taxDeferralPeriod !== "") {

    editor.clearMessages();
    editor.handleMessages(
    [{
        message: 'Either Tax deferral payment date or tax deferral payment period should be provided.',
        severity: 'ERROR'
    }]);
    updateApplication[LeasePricingApplicationRow.Id] = {
        genesis__Tax_Deferral_Payment_Date__c:''
    }
}

var pricingUIOnlyModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricing_UIOnlyModel');
var uiModelRow = pricingUIOnlyModel.data[0];

if (uiModelRow.UpdateExpectedFirstPmtDate == true) {
    updateApplication[LeasePricingApplicationRow.Id] = {
        genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c:''
    }
}

LeasePricingApplicationModel.updateRows(updateApplication);
$('#PricingCellEdit').hide();
$('#PricingCellRead').show();
$('#ManualPricingCalculatorButton').attr('title', 'Manual Pricing Action');

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addPaymentStream" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
var appRow = applicationModel.getFirstRow();
var paymentStreamModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PaymentSequenceModel');
var paymentStreamSize = paymentStreamModel.getRows().length;

var frequency = appRow.genesis__Payment_Frequency__c;
if (frequency === 'MONTHLY') {
    frequency = 'Monthly';
}
else if (frequency === 'QUARTERLY') {
    frequency = 'Quarterly';
}
else if (frequency === 'WEEKLY') {
    frequency = 'Weekly';
}
else if (frequency === 'BI-WEEKLY') {
    frequency = 'Bi-Weekly';
}
else if (frequency === 'SEMI-MONTHLY') {
    frequency = 'Semi-Monthly';
}
else if (frequency === 'BI-MONTHLY') {
    frequency = 'Bi-Monthly';
}
else if (frequency === 'SEMI-ANNUAL') {
    frequency = 'Semi-Annual';
}
else if (frequency === 'ANNUAL') {
    frequency = 'Annual';
}

var paymentRow = paymentStreamModel.createRow({
    additionalConditions: [
        { field: 'genesis__Sequence__c', value: (paymentStreamSize + 1) },
        { field: 'genesis__Payment_Frequency__c', value: frequency}
    ],
    doAppend: true,
    editModeForNewItems : true
});

</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateFeeAndTotalAmount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var pricingAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_PricingApplication');
var pricingAppRow = pricingAppModel.data[0];
if(pricingAppRow.genesis__CL_Product__r.genesis__Generate_Amortization_Schedule__c === true && pricingAppRow.genesis__Product_Sub_Type__c !== 'OPERATING LEASE'){

    var AmortizationScheduleModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_AmortizationScheduleModel');
    var AmortizationScheduleRow = AmortizationScheduleModel.data;
    
    var AmortizationScheduleCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('LPPricingcol_AmortizationScheduleCloneModel');
    AmortizationScheduleCloneModel.data = [];
    var AmortizationScheduleCloneRow = [];
    
    var resultFromPaymentSchedule = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePaymentSchedule',
        {
            applicationId : pricingAppRow.Id,
        }
    );
    
    var responseFromPaymentSchedule=JSON.parse(resultFromPaymentSchedule);
    
    if(AmortizationScheduleRow.length > 0){
        var residualRow ;
        //for advance payment type with residual amount greater than 0 there will one row greater tha term in amortization schedule, slicing it and adding it at the end to avoid mismatch in rows from payment schedule(fee and total amount)
        if(pricingAppRow.genesis__Residual_Amount__c !== null && pricingAppRow.genesis__Residual_Amount__c !== undefined  && parseInt(pricingAppRow.genesis__Residual_Amount__c) !== 0 && AmortizationScheduleRow.length > pricingAppRow.genesis__Term__c && pricingAppRow.genesis__Arrears__c === false){
            residualRow = AmortizationScheduleRow[AmortizationScheduleRow.length-1];
            AmortizationScheduleRow = AmortizationScheduleRow.slice(0, AmortizationScheduleRow.length-1);
        }
        var ind = 0;
        var lastInd = 0;
        //adding fee and total payment amount for amortization schedule
        $.each(responseFromPaymentSchedule,function(i,row){
            lastInd = i;
            //checking dates of two schedules, if there is any mismatch creating a new row in amortization schedule is added(mismatch occurs when the fee is added with differnt frequency than that of pricing)
            if(row.date === AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Due_Date__c){
                AmortizationScheduleCloneModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'genesis__Payment_Number__c', value: i+1 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: pricingAppRow.Id },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Date__c', value: row.date },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Interest__c', value: AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Due_Interest__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Principal__c', value: AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Due_Principal__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Rent__c', value: AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Rent__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c', value: AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Fee__c', value: row.feeamount },
                        { field: 'genesis__Total_Due_Amount__c', value: row.totalamount }
                    ], doAppend: true
                });
                if(ind < AmortizationScheduleRow.length -1 ){
                    ind = ind+1;
                }
                   
            }
            else{
                var principleBalance;
                if(ind === 0){
                    principleBalance = AmortizationScheduleRow[ind].genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c;
                }
                else{
                    principleBalance = AmortizationScheduleRow[ind-1].genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c;
                }
                AmortizationScheduleCloneModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'genesis__Payment_Number__c', value: i+1 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: pricingAppRow.Id },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Date__c', value: row.date },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Interest__c', value: 0.00 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Principal__c', value: 0.00 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Rent__c', value: 0.00 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c', value: principleBalance},
                        { field: 'genesis__Fee__c', value: row.feeamount },
                        { field: 'genesis__Total_Due_Amount__c', value: row.totalamount }
                    ], doAppend: true
                });
            }  
        });
        //adding the sliced row
        if(residualRow !== null && residualRow !== undefined){
            AmortizationScheduleCloneModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'genesis__Payment_Number__c', value: lastInd+2 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: pricingAppRow.Id },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Date__c', value: residualRow.genesis__Due_Date__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Interest__c', value: residualRow.genesis__Due_Interest__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Due_Principal__c', value: residualRow.genesis__Due_Principal__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Rent__c', value: residualRow.genesis__Rent__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c', value: residualRow.genesis__Closing_Principal_Balance__c },
                        { field: 'genesis__Fee__c', value: 0.00 },
                        { field: 'genesis__Total_Due_Amount__c', value: 0.00}
                    ], doAppend: true
                });
        }
        AmortizationScheduleRow = AmortizationScheduleModel.data;
        $.each(AmortizationScheduleRow, function(i, row) {
            AmortizationScheduleModel.deleteRow(row);
        });
        
    }
}</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="inline" name="clonePricingRecordToOverride" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
		var selectedPricingModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPricingDetailsRecord');
		var applicationPricingOverrideModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationPricingOverrideModel');
		
		var fieldsToUpdate = {};
		for(var key in selectedPricingModel.data[0]) {
           if(key.includes('__c')) {
               fieldsToUpdate[key] = selectedPricingModel.data[0][key];
           }    
        }
        
         // set to override as the application pricing override record must have type = override
        fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Rate_Factor__c'] = 0;
        fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Yield_Percent__c'] = 0;
        fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Payment_Amount_Derived__c'] = 0;
        fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Override_Type__c'] = '';
        fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Maximum_Financed_Amount__c'] = selectedPricingModel.data[0].genesis__Application__r.genesis__Financed_Amount__c;
        
        if(fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Type__c'] == 'OVERRIDE') {
            // editing an override
            fieldsToUpdate['Id'] = selectedPricingModel.data[0].Id;
            applicationPricingOverrideModel.emptyData();
            applicationPricingOverrideModel.adoptRows([fieldsToUpdate]);
        } else {
            fieldsToUpdate['genesis__Type__c'] = 'OVERRIDE';
            applicationPricingOverrideModel.updateRow({ Id: applicationPricingOverrideModel.data[0].Id }, fieldsToUpdate);
        }
        
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calculateOverrides" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],    
$ = skuid.$;
// overide values
var appPricingModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationPricingOverrideModel');
var appPricingModelRecord = appPricingModel.data[0];
// set values in Application Pricing Detail Sobject
var pricingDetail = new sforce.SObject("genesis__Application_Pricing_Detail__c");
for(var key in appPricingModelRecord) {
   if(key.includes('__c')) {
       pricingDetail[key] = appPricingModelRecord[key];
   }    
}

var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','calculateOverrides',{overrideRecord : pricingDetail});
result = result[0];
try{
    result = JSON.parse(result);
    var tempData = {};
    for (var key in result) {
        if(key.includes('__c')) {
            tempData[key] = result[key];
        }
    }
    tempData['EnableSave'] = true;
    appPricingModel.updateRow(appPricingModelRecord, tempData);
} catch(e) {
    // show error message
    var pageTitle = $('#OverrideTitlePanel');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([{
      message: result,
      severity: 'ERROR'
    }]);
}</jsitem>
        </javascript>
        <css/>
        <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-FHm-254"/>
    </resources>
    <styles>
        <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
    </styles>
    <interactions/>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newCollateral" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for creating new collateral in the system.Sets values for UI only fields for rendering
*  Where: step 1 new collateral button
*
* @name  newCollateral.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

$('#equipmentMasterId').removeClass('selected-btn');
$('#newcollateralid').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingCollateralId').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');
var newCollateralRow = newCollateralModel.data[0];

var newCollateralCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralClone');
var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.data[0];

//add values to UI only fields which will be used for rendering
if(!newCollateralCloneRow){
    var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewCollateral', value:true },
            { field: 'ExistingCollateral', value: false },
        ]
    });
}else{
    newCollateralCloneModel.updateRow(newCollateralCloneRow ,
                        { NewCollateral : true ,
                          ExistingCollateral : false });

}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="highlightSelectedPricing" cachelocation="false" url="">
var $ = skuid.$;
var pricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');

var selectedPricingId;
var selectedPricingCard;
$.each(pricingDetailModel.data, function(i,row) {
    var j = i+1;
    selectedPricingCard = document.querySelector("#pricingDetailsDeck > div.nx-editor-contents > div.nx-list > div > article:nth-child(" + j + ")");
    if (pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'genesis__Selected__c')) {
        selectedPricingId = pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'Id');
        selectedPricingCard.style.border = "2px solid #48ce94";//green color
    }
    else {
        selectedPricingCard.style.border = "1px solid #37444e";//off black color
    }
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="GeneratePricing" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = applicationModel.getFirstRow();
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePricing',
                                 {
                                     applicationId : appRow.Id
                                 });

if (!result[0].includes('Generated...')) {
    alert(result);
    var appPricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');
    appPricingDetailModel.updateData();
    return false;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ApplyPricing" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var pricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');

var selectedPricingId;
var selectedCount = 0;
$.each(pricingDetailModel.data, function(i,row) {
    if (pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'genesis__Selected__c')) {
        selectedCount ++;
        selectedPricingId = pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'Id');
    }
});


var pageTitle = $('#PricingRecommendation');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
if (selectedCount > 1) {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
      {
          message: 'More than one pricing is seleted. Please select only one pricing.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
      },
    ]
    );
    return;
}
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SelectPricingOnApplication','selectPricingOption',
{
    pricingId : selectedPricingId
});
if (result[0].includes('Error') || result[0].includes('ERROR')) {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
      {
          message: result[0],
          severity: 'ERROR'
      },
    ]
    );
    return false;
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateInterestRate" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var appRSModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel');

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
var userMargin = appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'genesis__Margin__c');

$.each(appRSModel.data, function(i, row) {
    appRSModel.updateRow(row, {
        genesis__Interest_Rate__c : (row.genesis__Base_Rate__c + row.genesis__Margin_Rate__c + userMargin)
    });
});
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateVariableRates" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

/*Making addMonths Function for Javascript*/
Date.isLeapYear = function (year) {
    return (((year % 4 === 0) && (year % 100 !== 0)) || (year % 400 === 0));
};
Date.getDaysInMonth = function (year, month) {
    return [31, (Date.isLeapYear(year) ? 29 : 28), 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31][month];
};
Date.prototype.isLeapYear = function () {
    return Date.isLeapYear(this.getFullYear());
};
Date.prototype.getDaysInMonth = function () {
    return Date.getDaysInMonth(this.getFullYear(), this.getMonth());
};
Date.prototype.addMonths = function (value) {
    var day = this.getDate();
    this.setDate(1);
    this.setMonth(this.getMonth() + value);
    this.setDate(Math.min(day, this.getDaysInMonth()));
    return this;
};


var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
var rateLock = appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'genesis__Rate_Lock__c');

var pageTitle = $('#SelectedOfferPage');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c < 0) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Floor can not be negative.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}
else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c < 0) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Ceiling can not be negative.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}
else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c > appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Ceiling must be greater than Rate Floor.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}

if (appRow.genesis__Margin__c === undefined) {
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {
        genesis__Margin__c : 0
    });
}

if (rateLock === undefined || rateLock === false) {
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c : undefined,
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c : 0,
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c : 0
    });
}
else if (rateLock === true) {
    if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c !== undefined) {
        if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c < 0) {
            editor.handleMessages([
               {
                  message: 'Rate Lock Period can not be negative.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
            return false;
        }
        else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c !==  undefined && appRow.genesis__Maturity_Date__c !== undefined) {
            var jsDate = skuid.time.parseSFDateTime(appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c);
            var rateLockPeriodEndDate = jsDate.addMonths(appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c);

            if (skuid.time.parseSFDateTime(appRow.genesis__Maturity_Date__c) < rateLockPeriodEndDate) {
                editor.handleMessages([
                   {
                      message: 'Rate Lock Period must not cross the Maturity Date of application.',
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                    }
                ]);
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
    if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c < 0) {
        editor.handleMessages([
           {
              message: 'Rate Lock Validity Period can not be negative.',
              severity: 'ERROR'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="validateFields">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var pageTitle = $('#PricingRecommendation');

var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
var addressModel  = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel').data[0];
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application').data[0];
if(!(addressModel.genesis__Rate_Type__c) )  {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Rate Type Not Selected',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}
if( !(addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c)  )  {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Start Date Not Selected',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}else if((addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c) && ((addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c) <= ((applicationModel.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c)  ))){
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Start Date should be greater than ' +applicationModel.expectedCloseDate,
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}

    color: #37444e;
}


#viewRateScheduleButton {
    display : contents !important;
}

#viewRateScheduleButton :hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Tab heading color : off black */
#PricingTabs .nx-template {
    color : #37444e;
}

#PricingTabs > ul {
    background-color : #dddddd;
    outline: none !important;
}

#PricingTabs > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-active {
    background-color : #dddddd;
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom-color: #2D5074 !important;
    border-left-color: transparent !important;
    outline: none !important;
}
#PricingTabs .ui-tabs-anchor {
    outline: none !important;
}
#PricingTabs > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-state-hover {
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom-color: #8ac8ff !important;
    border-left-color: transparent !important;

}

    display: none;
}

#pricingDetailsDeck > div.nx-editor-contents > div.nx-list > div > article:nth-child(n) :hover {

}

.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content {

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="NewRelationship" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

$('#newRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel').data[0];
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
if(!newPartyRow){
    var newRow = newPartyModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewRelationship', value:true },
            { field: 'ExistingRelationship', value: false },
        ]
    });

     if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){

        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(5)').addClass('hide-stepbar');
        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(6)').addClass('hide-stepbar');
        var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
        var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
        if(relationship === 'Business'){
         $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
           $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : true ,
                                IndividualRelationship : false,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
        );
        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){
             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : false,
                                IndividualRelationship : true,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
            );
        }
    }
}else{
     var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
     if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : true ,
                            ExistingRelationship : false,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
        );
        if(relationship === 'Business'){
             $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : true ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false
                        });

        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){
             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : true
                        });

        }
     }
     else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : true ,
                            ExistingRelationship : false,
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
        );
     }

}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ExistingRelationship" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

$('#newRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel').data[0];
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
if(!newPartyRow){
        var newRow = newPartyModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewRelationship', value:false },
            { field: 'ExistingRelationship', value: true },
        ]
    });
   if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){

        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(5)').addClass('hide-stepbar');
        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(6)').addClass('hide-stepbar');


        var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
         var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
        if(relationship === 'Business'){
            $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
            $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : true ,
                                IndividualRelationship : false,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
        );
        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){
             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : false,
                                IndividualRelationship : true,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
            );
        }

    }

}else{
     var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
    if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : false ,
                            ExistingRelationship : true,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
        );
        if(relationship === 'Business'){

             $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : true ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false
                        });

        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){

             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : true
                        });

        }
     }
    else{
        var rowUpdates = {};
        rowUpdates['NewRelationship'] = false;
        rowUpdates['ExistingRelationship'] = true;
        rowUpdates['BusinessRelationship'] = false;
        rowUpdates['IndividualRelationship'] = false;
        rowUpdates['clcommon__Account__c'] = null;
        newPartyModel.updateRow( newPartyRow , rowUpdates);

    }
