      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldValidation" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for validating required fields in step 3 of wizard .Displays error message accordingly on violation
*  Where: step 3 Next button click snippet
*
* @name  Fieldvalidation.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/

//params will contail all the info about the context of call like which record data calles it,what condition,etc
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');
var newCollateralRow = newCollateralModel.data[0];
console.log('collateral row - ',newCollateralRow);
newCollateralRow.Commodity__c = newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Name__c;
console.log('commodity - ',newCollateralRow.Commodity__c);
console.log('collateral name - ',newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Name__c);
var newCollateralTypeCatModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_CollateralTypeCategoryAssoc');
var collCatCatModelCondition = newCollateralTypeCatModel.getConditionByName('collTypeName');
newCollateralTypeCatModel.setCondition(collCatCatModelCondition, newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Type__r.Name);
newCollateralTypeCatModel.activateCondition(collCatCatModelCondition);

skuid.model.updateData([newCollateralTypeCatModel],function(){
    var catRow = newCollateralTypeCatModel.data[0];

    newCollateralModel.updateRow(newCollateralRow ,
                        { clcommon__Collateral_Category__c : catRow.clcommon__Collateral_Category__c });


});


//fetch the wizard object
var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
//fetch wizard current step
var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    var editor = $('#detailsPage ').data('object').editor;
    editor.messages.empty();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};

var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

var ApplicationCollateralNewModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralNew');
var ApplicationCollateralNewRow = ApplicationCollateralNewModel.data[0];

if(!newAppCollRow){
    var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.createRow();
}

//validation condition
if(newCollateralRow.NewCollateral){


    if(newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Name__c && newCollateralRow.clcommon__Collateral_Code__c ){
        /* update pledge amount to 0 */
        ApplicationCollateralNewModel.updateRow(ApplicationCollateralNewRow, {'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c':0});

        //navigate to step 4 in wizard
        currentStep.navigate('step5');
    }
    else{
        //CUSTOM ADDED BY SUBHAM-----
         //return displayMessage('Fill all the fields marked in red ', 'ERROR');
         ApplicationCollateralNewModel.updateRow(ApplicationCollateralNewRow, {'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c':0});

        //navigate to step 4 in wizard
        currentStep.navigate('step5');
        ////CUSTOM ADDED BY SUBHAM-----
    }

}
else{
    var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
    var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

    var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('PledgeCollaterals_CollateralValuation');
    var colValRow = collValModel.data[0];

    if(colValRow === undefined) {
        /* update pledge amount to 0 */
        newAppCollModel.updateRow(newAppCollRow, {'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c':0});
    }

    //navigate to step 4 in wizard
    currentStep.navigate('step5');
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newCollateral" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for creating new collateral in the system.Sets values for UI only fields for rendering
*  Where: step 1 new collateral button
*
* @name  newCollateral.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

$('#newcollateralid').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingCollateralId').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');
var newCollateralRow = newCollateralModel.data[0];

var newCollateralCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralClone');
var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.data[0];

//add values to UI only fields which will be used for rendering
if(!newCollateralCloneRow){
    var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewCollateral', value:true },
            { field: 'ExistingCollateral', value: false },
        ]
    });
    var newCollateralRow = newCollateralModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'NewCollateral', value:true },
                { field: 'ExistingCollateral', value: false },
        ]
    });
}else{
    newCollateralCloneModel.updateRow(newCollateralCloneRow ,
                        { NewCollateral : true ,
                          ExistingCollateral : false });
    newCollateralModel.updateRow(newCollateralRow ,
                            { NewCollateral : true ,
                              ExistingCollateral : false });

}

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="existingCollateral" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for updating existing collateral in the system.Sets values for UI only fields for rendering
*  Where: step 1 existing collateral button
*
* @name  existingCollateral.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0

*/


var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

$('#newcollateralid').removeClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingCollateralId').addClass('selected-btn');

var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

var newCollateralCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralClone');

var newCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('Collateral');

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validatePledgeAmountCollateral" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: validation of pledge amount
*
* @name  saveCollateral.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/

var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#errorMessagePledgeAmountId ').data('object').editor;
    editor.messages.empty();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var editor = $('#errorMessagePledgeAmountId ').data('object').editor;

var newCollateralCloneModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralClone');
var newCollateralCloneRow = newCollateralCloneModel.data[0];

var newAppCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateral');
var newAppCollRow = newAppCollModel.data[0];

var ApplicationCollateralNewModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralNew');
var ApplicationCollateralNewRow = ApplicationCollateralNewModel.data[0];

var isNewCollateral = newCollateralCloneRow.NewCollateral;

if(isNewCollateral === true) {
    if(!ApplicationCollateralNewRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c ){
        return displayMessage('Please specify the pledge amount.', 'ERROR');
    }
    editor.messages.empty();
    if(ApplicationCollateralNewRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c && ApplicationCollateralNewRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c===0){
        return displayMessage('The pledge amount must be greater than zero.', 'ERROR');
    }

} else {
    if(!newAppCollRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c ){
        return displayMessage('Please specify the pledge amount.', 'ERROR');
    }
    editor.messages.empty();
    if(newAppCollRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c && newAppCollRow.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c===0){
        return displayMessage('The pledge amount must be greater than zero.', 'ERROR');
    }
    //newAppCollModel.updateRow(newAppCollRow, {'genesis__Application__c':skuid.page.params.id});

}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="typeValidation" cachelocation="false">/**

*  step before.Only allows users to goto next step if passed.
*  Where: step 2 next button
*
* @name  typeValidation.js

*/



var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var newCollateralTypeModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralTypeModel');
var newCollateralTypeRow = newCollateralTypeModel.data;

var valid_collaterals =[];

$.each( newCollateralTypeRow,function( i, item ){

    valid_collaterals.push(item.Name);

});

var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];

var editor = $('#PanelForAll ').data('object').editor;

    editor.handleMessages([

            message: message,

        }
    ]);

};

         if(valid_collaterals.indexOf(newAppCollCloneRow.genesis__Collateral__r.clcommon__Collateral_Type__r.Name) < 0){

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="LoanQueue">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var PartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('RDParty');
var newPartyRow = PartyModel.getRows();

var orgParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('OrgParameters');


var prevID =PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Id;
var prevName = PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var partyType = PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Type__r.Name;

var mapForMultipleParties = new Map();
var flag=0;
var UIPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyQueueModel');

var newChargeRow=new Array();
//mapForMultipleParties.set(PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Id, 1);
$.each(PartyModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
    if(orgParamModel.data[0].genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c == false){
        if(mapForMultipleParties.has(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)){
            UIPartyModel.updateRow(newChargeRow[mapForMultipleParties.get(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)],
                                 {'PartyType' : 'MULTIPLE ROLES',
                                  'AccountName' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Name,
                                  'AccountId' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,
                                  'partyId' : row.Id,
                                  'ApplicationID' : row.genesis__Application__c
            });   
        }
        else{
            mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
        });
        flag++;
        }
    }else{
        var partyTypes = row.clcommon__Party_Types__c;
        if(partyTypes.includes(';')){
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value:'MULTIPLE ROLES' },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
            }); 
            flag++;
        }
        else{
            mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
            });
            flag++;
        }
    }
    
});
</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="simple-queue" cachelocation="false">.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-header {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .simple-queue.nx-queue {
    border-top: 0;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item{
    color: white;
}
.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item-inner-with-icon {
    height: 30px;
}

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid white;
    margin: 0 15px 0 0;
}

 /*to get the font content, go https://astronautweb.co/snippet/font-awesome/ */

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon.sk-icon-members:before {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    content: "\f007";
    padding: 4px;
    font-size: 20px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected > .nx-queue-item-inner {
    color: white;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected .sk-icon {
    color: #48ce94;
    border: 2px solid #48ce94;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item {
    border-left: 5px solid #7f7f7f;
    background: #7f7f7f;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-template {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-queue-loader {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item:hover {
    border-left: 5px solid #2d5074;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected {
    border-left: 5px solid #48ce94;
}</cssitem>

        var iconElem =
        $( '<div>' ) // create the icon container
        .addClass('ui-button ui-state-default') // mark the container as a silk icon container
        .append(
        innerIconText
        )
        .appendTo( cellElem ); // add the container to the cell

        switch( value )
        {
        case 'Hot':
        // apply the red flag icon to the container
        iconElem.addClass('ui-silk-flag-red');
        break;
        case 'Warm':
        // apply the orange flag icon to the container
        iconElem.addClass('ui-silk-flag-orange');
        break;
        case 'Cold':
        // apply the blue flag icon to the container
        iconElem.addClass('ui-silk-flag-blue');
        break;

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="covenant-status-label" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="">var $ = skuid.$,
    field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1];

if(field){
    var row = field.row
    var cellElem = field.element.addClass('status-label');
    if (row.clcommon__Covenant_Evaluations__r) { // there's at least one evaluation record
        var evaluationRecord = row.clcommon__Covenant_Evaluations__r.records[0];
        var evaluationStatus = evaluationRecord.clcommon__Status__c
        if(evaluationStatus){
            wrapperLabel(evaluationStatus, cellElem)
        }
    }
}

function wrapperLabel(evaluationStatus, cellElem){

    var innerIconText =  $('<span>').text(evaluationStatus);
    var labelElem = innerIconText.appendTo( cellElem ); // add the container to the cell
    switch (evaluationStatus){
        case 'Pending':
            cellElem.addClass('pending');
            break;
        case 'Clear':
            cellElem.addClass('clear');
            break;
        case 'Expired':
            cellElem.addClass('expired');
            break;
        case 'Accepted':
            cellElem.addClass('accepted');
            break;
        case 'Exception':
            cellElem.addClass('exception');
            break;            
        default:
            cellElem.addClass('accepted');
            break;
    }
}</jsitem>

        var value = new Date(childRow.CreatedDate);

        }

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="statusCustomLabel" cachelocation="false">var $ = skuid.$,
    field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1];

if (value) {
    var cellElem = field.element.addClass('status-label');
    var spanText = $('<span>').text(value)
    applyStyle(value, cellElem);
    spanText.appendTo(cellElem); // add the container to the cell
}

function applyStyle(value, cellElem){
    switch (value) {
        case 'Pending':
            cellElem.addClass('pending');
            break;
        case 'Clear':
            cellElem.addClass('clear');
            break;
        case 'Expired':
            cellElem.addClass('expired');
            break;
        case 'Accepted':
            cellElem.addClass('accepted');
            break;
        case 'Exception':
            cellElem.addClass('exception');
            break;
        default:
            cellElem.addClass('accepted');
            break;
    }
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="applicationRedirect" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var url = document.referrer;
var productId = params.row.__skuid_record__.__id;
var recordTypeId = params.row.RecordTypeId;
var accountId = skuid.page.params.id
if(recordTypeId==undefined || recordTypeId == null ){
    alert("Record Type is not defined for the selected Product");
}else{
    var developerName = sforce.connection.query("select DeveloperName from recordtype where id = '"+recordTypeId+"'");
    var sql = "select id,Name,sobjectType,DeveloperName from RecordType where sobjecttype='genesis__Applications__c' and developername='"+developerName.records.DeveloperName+"'";
    var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
    if(result.records.Id){
    var urls = url+"apex/NewApplication?RecordType="+result.records.Id+"&AccountId="+accountId +"&ProductId="+productId;
    window.open(urls, '_blank')
    }else{
        alert("Record Type is not found: "+developerName.records.DeveloperName)
    }
}
</jsitem>
    </javascript>

      <cssitem cachelocation="false" location="inline" name="appCss">iframe {
    border: 0px;
}

html {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
    height: 100%;
}

body>.nx-page {
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}

.nx-page {
    padding: 0 0 0 0 !important;
}

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle {
    padding: 0 0 0 6px;
    font-size: 14px;
}

div[pagename ="AccountRelationDashboard"]{
    position: absolute;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.account-dashboard-left-panel{
    margin: 5px;
}

.account-dashboard-right-panel{
    overflow-y: auto;
}

.account-dashboard-tabset{
    height: 100%;
}

#document-iframe {
    border: none;
    height: calc(100% - 40px); /* 40px is the heights of the tabs panel*/
    position:absolute;
    right:0;
    left:0;
}

#household-affiliations-panel{
    height: calc(100% - 40px);
}

#household-affiliations-panel > .sk-grid > .sk-grid-division > .nx-include-panel{
    height: 100%;
}
#account-relationship-graph-panel{
    height: calc(100% - 40px);
    overflow-y: auto;
}</cssitem>

    display: flex;

    width: 15px;

    align-items: center;

}

    margin: 2px 0px 2px 0px;

    background: #a5abb0; 
}

    display: flex;

    font-size: 14px;
    height: 50%;
    padding-left: 20px;
    flex-grow: 11;
    align-self: center;
    justify-content: center; 
}

    margin-bottom: 5px; 
}
.card-list-view .action {
    text-align: center;
    flex-grow: 2;

    align-self: flex-end; 
}
.card-list-view .action .button {
    cursor: pointer; 
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateStatementForm" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var statementHeader = skuid.model.getModel('NewStatementHeader').data[0];

var result = sforce.apex.execute('clcommon.CustomButtonAction', 'generateStatementsForm', {
                            statementId: statementHeader.Id,
                        }
                    );

return true;</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="BasePeriods" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var statements = skuid.model.getModel('FinancialStatements').data;
var basePeriods = [];
var i;
for(i=0; i <statements.length ; i++){
    basePeriods.push({ label: statements[i].Name, value: statements[i].Id });
}
basePeriods.push({ label: 'Previous Period', value: 'Previous Period' });
return basePeriods;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="GenerateProjectedStatement" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var statementHeader = skuid.model.getModel('ProjectionStatement').data[0];
var statementParams = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters').data;
var acc = skuid.model.getModel('ACStatementForAccount').data[0];


var accountStmtPage = $('#sk-2ZDY-529');
var editorNew = accountStmtPage.data('object').editor;
editorNew.clearMessages();

if(statementHeader.Name===undefined){
editorNew.handleMessages(
    [
       {
          message: 'Statement Name can\'t be empty',
          severity: 'ERROR'
       },
    ]
);
return false;
}

if(statementHeader.FinancialStatementsForProjection===undefined){
editorNew.handleMessages(
    [
       {
          message: 'Financial Statements For Projection can\'t be empty',
          severity: 'ERROR'
       },
    ]
);
return false;
}

if(statementHeader.StatementDate===undefined){
editorNew.handleMessages(
    [
       {
          message: 'Statement Date can\'t be empty',
          severity: 'ERROR'
       },
    ]
);
return false;
}

if(statementHeader.MonthsCovered===undefined){
editorNew.handleMessages(
    [
       {
          message: 'Months Covered can\'t be empty ',
          severity: 'ERROR'
       },
    ]
);
return false;
}

var parameters = "{";
var i;
for(i = 0; i< statementParams.length ; i++){
console.log(statementParams[i]);
parameters += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\"" + ":" + "\"" + statementParams[i].PercentChange+"\""+",");
}
parameters = parameters.slice(0,-1);
parameters+="}";


var result  = sforce.apex.execute('clcommon.CustomButtonAction', 'generateProjectedStatement', {
                            statementName : statementHeader.Name,
                            baseStatementIds : statementHeader.FinancialStatementsForProjection,
                            objId : acc.Id,
                            statementType : statementHeader.StatementType,
                            statementDate : statementHeader.StatementDate,
                            monthsCovered : statementHeader.MonthsCovered,
                            params : parameters
                        }
                    );
skuid.component.getById('accountIFrame').render();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SensitivityAnalysisRequest" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var statementHeader = skuid.model.getModel('SensitivityAnalysis').data[0];
var statementParams = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParamsForSensitivityAnalysis').data;
var acc = skuid.model.getModel('ACStatementForAccount').data[0];

var parameters = "{";
var i;
var case1Params = "{";
var case2Params = "{";
var case3Params = "{";
for(i = 0; i< statementParams.length ; i++){
console.log(statementParams[i]);
case1Params += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\""+ ": "+"\""+statementParams[i].Case1+"\""+",");
case2Params += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\""+ ": "+"\""+statementParams[i].Case2+"\""+",");
case3Params += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\""+ ": "+"\""+statementParams[i].Case3+"\""+",");
/*parameters += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\"" + ": {" + "\"" +"Case 1" +"\""+":"+"\""+statementParams[i].Case1+"\""+","+"\""+"Case 2"+"\""+":"+"\""+statementParams[i].Case2+"\""+","+"\""+"Case 3"+"\""+":"+"\""+statementParams[i].Case3+"\""+"}"+",");*/
}

case1Params = case1Params.slice(0,-1);
case1Params += "}";
case2Params = case2Params.slice(0,-1);
case2Params += "}";
case3Params = case3Params.slice(0,-1);
case3Params += "}";

parameters += ("\"" +"Case 1" +"\""+":"+case1Params+","+"\""+"Case 2"+"\""+":"+case2Params+","+"\""+"Case 3"+"\""+":" + case3Params);
parameters+="}";


sforce.apex.execute('clcommon.CustomButtonAction', 'performSensitivityAnalysis', {
                            baseStatement : statementHeader.FinancialStatements,
                            objId : acc.Id,
                            statementType : statementHeader.StatementType,
                            params : parameters,
                            deletePreviousAnalysis : true
                        }
                    );
skuid.component.getById('accountAnalysisIFrame').render();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeMonthsCovered" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var picklistEntries = [];

for (i = 1; i <= 11; i++) {
    
    picklistEntries.push(
        { value:i, label: i, defaultValue: false, active: true }
    );
}    
return picklistEntries
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeMonthsCoveredAnnual" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var statementType = field.row.clcommon__Statement_Type__c;
var picklistEntries = [];


if(statementType == 'Annual'){
    picklistEntries.push(
        
        			{ value:'12', label: '12', defaultValue: true, active: true }
        
        	);
        	
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['readonly'](field, "12");
    
} else {
    for (i = 1; i <= 11; i++) {
        
        picklistEntries.push(
            { value:i, label: i, defaultValue: false, active: true }
        );
    }
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, "");  
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="renderMonthsCovered" cachelocation="false">var FIELD_TO_RERENDER = 'clcommon__Months_Covered__c';

var params = arguments[0],
   row = params.row,
   model = params.model,
   $ = skuid.$,
   fieldsByRow = model.registeredFieldsByRowThenField,
   uiFields;
    
if (fieldsByRow && fieldsByRow[row.Id]) {
    uiFields = fieldsByRow[row.Id][FIELD_TO_RERENDER];
    if (uiFields && skuid.utils.size(uiFields)) {
        $.each(uiFields,function(){
            this.render(); 
        });
    }
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="setDefaultStatementYear" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var picklistEntries = field.metadata.picklistEntries;
if(picklistEntries!==undefined)
    picklistEntries.length = 0;
    
var currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();

var i;
for (i = currentYear+10; i >= currentYear-20; i--) {
    picklistEntries.push(
        { value:i, label: i, defaultValue: false, active: true }
    );

}
field.row.clcommon__Statement_Year__c = String(currentYear);
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, currentYear);
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="trackAccountStatementChanges" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
            var data = JSON.parse(event.data);
            if(data!==undefined&&data.isFSChanged!==undefined){
                window.parent.postMessage(event.data, "*");
            }
        });
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>

background:none;
}

.nx-editor-header .nx-header-right .ui-button.iconic-button,
.nx-editor-header .nx-header-right .ui-button.iconic-button.ui-state-hover,
.nx-editor-header .nx-header-right .ui-button.iconic-button.ui-state-focus,
.ui-button.iconic-button {
width: 32px;
height: 32px;
line-height: 32px;
border-radius: 50%;
outline: none;
cursor: pointer;
background-color: transparent;   
}


.ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-barchart:before,
.ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-barchart.ui-state-hover:before,
.ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-barchart.ui-state-focus:before {
font-family: FontAwesome;
content: "\f080";
font-size: 20px;
color: #FFA21D;
vertical-align: middle;
border: 2px solid #2D5074;
}

.balancesheet-css{
margin-top:30px;
}

.accountWrapper{
max-height:350px;
}

.addStmtButton,
.addStmtButton.ui-state-hover, 
.addStmtButton.ui-state-focus{
    background: transparent !important;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    font-size: 20px;
    border: 2px solid;
    border-radius: 50%;
    height: 30px;
    width: 30px;
    outline: none;
}

.addStmtButton.ui-button.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-icon-primary.fa-plus{
    left: 1px;
    top: 16px;
}

#accountButtonSet > div.nx-editor-header > div.nx-header-right{
top: 10px;
position: absolute;
right: 125px;
}

#sk-2TrE-392 .nx-fieldtext, #sk-3DHK-899 .nx-fieldtext {
    color: #000000;
    font-style: normal;
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var docModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAppDocumentCategory');
var documentData = docModel.data[0];
var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});
var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));
var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};

var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ApplicationDocumentManagement','linkAttachment',
{   
        documentCatId : documentData.Id,
        attachmentIds : selectedIds
});

if(documentData.genesis__Application__c !== undefined) {
    closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({divIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe']});
} else {
    skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').dialog('close');
}


function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var contentDocumentLink = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');
var contentDocumentData=contentDocumentLink.data;
var attachmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AttachmentAccount');
var attachmentRow = attachmentModel.getFirstRow();
var afterFileUploadRowCount = contentDocumentLink.getRows().length - attachmentRow.AttachmentCount;

var AllIds = $.map(contentDocumentData, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});


$.each(AllIds, function(index, id) {
    if(attachmentRow.AttachmentCount===0)
    {
        var checkbox=$('#attachment-table> div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child('+ (index+1) +') > td:nth-child(1) ').find('input[type=checkbox]');
        if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
            checkbox.trigger('click');
        }
    }
    else if((attachmentRow.AttachmentCount!==0) && (index<=afterFileUploadRowCount)){
        var checkbox=$('#attachment-table> div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child('+ (index) +') > td:nth-child(1) ').find('input[type=checkbox]');
        if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
            checkbox.trigger('click');
        }
    }    
});

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderFileName" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1],
	$ = skuid.$;

field.element.text(value);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="beforeFileUpload" cachelocation="false">var beforeRowCount = 0;
var params = arguments[0];
var $ = skuid.$;
var contentVersion = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');
beforeRowCount = contentVersion.getRows().length;
var attachmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AttachmentAccount');
var attachmentRow = attachmentModel.getFirstRow();
attachmentModel.updateRow(attachmentRow, {
    AttachmentCount : (beforeRowCount)
});
</jsitem>

<skuidpage personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
	<models>

				<field id="genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c"/>
				<field id="NoFilters" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="NoFilters" defaultValue="true"/>
				<field id="ProductFilter" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="ProductFilter" defaultValue="false"/>
			</fields>

				<condition type="param" value="id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
			</conditions>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ChangeFilterBtnColor" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var covAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppForAddingCovenants');
var covAppRow = covAppModel.data[0];
if(covAppRow.NoFilters){
    $('#NoFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#NoFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}

if(covAppRow.ProductFilter){
    $('#ProductFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#ProductFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="queryDefinitions" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppForAddingCovenants');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

var covenantDefModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicableCovntDefinition');
covenantDefModel.cancel();
// fetch condition
var productTypeCondition = covenantDefModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Product__c');
covenantDefModel.deactivateCondition(productTypeCondition);
if(appRow.ProductFilter){
    covenantDefModel.setCondition(productTypeCondition, appRow.genesis__CL_Product__c);
}
skuid.model.updateData([covenantDefModel],function(){ 
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object'); 
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step2');
});
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeCovenants" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppForAddingCovenants');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
var startDate;
if(appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c){
    startDate = new Date(appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c);
}else{
    startDate = new Date(appRow.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c);
}

var otherParamsMap = {};


otherParamsMap['startDay'] = startDate.getDate();
otherParamsMap['startMonth'] = startDate.getMonth()+1;
otherParamsMap['startYear'] = startDate.getFullYear();
otherParamsMap['applicationId'] = appRow.Id;

// covert to salesforce object instances
var resultObjList = [];
if(params.rows && params.rows.length > 0){
     params.rows.forEach(function (skuidObject){
         var sObj = new sforce.SObject(params.model.objectName);
         for(var key in skuidObject){
             if(skuidObject[key]){
                if(typeof skuidObject[key] !== 'object'){
                    if(!(key.toUpperCase() === "ID15" || key.toUpperCase() === "ID")){
                        sObj[key] = skuidObject[key];
                    } else if(key.toUpperCase() === "ID"  && skuidObject[key].length >= 15){
                        sObj[key] = skuidObject[key];
                    }
                }
            }
         }
         resultObjList.push(sObj); 
     });
}

var res = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidCovenantCtrl','generateCovenantsFromDefinitions', {
                                covenantDefinitions : JSON.stringify(resultObjList) ,
                                otherParams : JSON.stringify(otherParamsMap)
                            });
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);

if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    var newCovenantsModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedCovenantsForApp');
    newCovenantsModel.data = [];
    for (i = 0; i < resObj.content.length; i++) {
        var newRow = newCovenantsModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Account__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Account__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Active__c', value:true },
                { field: 'clcommon__Covenant_Definition__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Covenant_Definition__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Covenant_Definition__r', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Covenant_Definition__r },
                { field: 'clcommon__Expiration_Date__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Expiration_Date__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator_High_Value__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator_High_Value__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator_Low_Value__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator_Low_Value__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Operator__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Operator__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Frequency__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Frequency__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Notification_Days__c', value:  resObj.content[i].clcommon__Notification_Days__c},
                { field: 'clcommon__Type__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Type__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Sub_Type__c', value: resObj.content[i].clcommon__Sub_Type__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Statement_Type__c', value: resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Statement_Type__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Due_Days_from_end_of_accounting_period__c', value: resObj.content[i].clcommon__Due_Days_from_end_of_accounting_period__c},
                { field: 'clcommon__Accounting_Period_Type__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Accounting_Period_Type__c},
            ]
        });   
    }
    // move to next step
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');
}else{
    var pageTitle = $('#initializeErrorTile');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor; 
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
}
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveCovenants" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppForAddingCovenants');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
var startDate;
if(appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c){
    startDate = new Date(appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c);
}else{
    startDate = new Date(appRow.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c);
}

var otherParamsMap = {};
otherParamsMap['applicationId'] = appRow.Id;
otherParamsMap['startDay'] = startDate.getDate();
otherParamsMap['startMonth'] = startDate.getMonth()+1;
otherParamsMap['startYear'] = startDate.getFullYear();

var newCovenantsModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedCovenantsForApp');
var res = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidCovenantCtrl','saveCovenants', {
                                covenantsJson : JSON.stringify(buildSObject(newCovenantsModel,true)) ,
                                otherParams : JSON.stringify(otherParamsMap)
                            });
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').last().dialog('close');
}else{
    var pageTitle = $('#saveCovenantErrorTitle');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor; 
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});

var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));

var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};

window.parent.postMessage(message, '*');

function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var newAttachments = $.grep(allAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return $.inArray(attachment.Id, origIds) == -1;
});

var newIds = $.map(newAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var attachmentTable = skuid.$('#attachment-table').data('object');

$.each(newIds, function(index, id) {
    var checkbox = $(attachmentTable.list.renderedItems[id].element).find('input[type=checkbox]');
    if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
        checkbox.trigger('click');
    }
});</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});

var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));

var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};


var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ApplicationDocumentManagement','linkAttachment',
{   
        documentCatId : id,
        attachmentIds : selectedIds
});


closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({divIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe']});
function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var contentDocumentLink = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');
var contentDocumentData=contentDocumentLink.data;
var attachmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AttachmentCollateral');
var attachmentRow = attachmentModel.getFirstRow();
var afterFileUploadRowCount = contentDocumentLink.getRows().length - attachmentRow.AttachmentCount;
var AllIds = $.map(contentDocumentData, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});


$.each(AllIds, function(index, id) {
    if(attachmentRow.AttachmentCount===0)
    {
        var checkbox=$('#attachment-table> div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child('+ (index+1) +') > td:nth-child(1) ').find('input[type=checkbox]');
        if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
            checkbox.trigger('click');
        }
    }
    else if((attachmentRow.AttachmentCount!==0) && (index<=afterFileUploadRowCount)){
        var checkbox=$('#attachment-table> div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child('+ (index) +') > td:nth-child(1) ').find('input[type=checkbox]');
        if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
            checkbox.trigger('click');
        }
    }    
});

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveDeals" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var dfd = $.Deferred();
var userActionObject = skuid.model.getModel('UserAction').getFirstRow();
    if(!userActionObject.genesis__Application__c){
        addErrorMsg('Select Application first'); 
        return;
    }

var selectedApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedAppToUpdate');
var selectedApplication = selectedApplicationModel.getFirstRow();
selectedApplication.genesis__Parent_Application__c = skuid.page.params.id;
var parentPartiesModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentParties');
var childPartiesModel = skuid.model.getModel('ChildParties');
childPartiesModel.setCondition(childPartiesModel.getConditionByName('genesis__Application__c'), selectedApplication.Id);
$.when(childPartiesModel.updateData()).then(function(){

    var showError = false;
    $.each(childPartiesModel.data,function(i, row){
        var matchingParty = parentPartiesModel.data.filter(function(rowTocheck){
	        if(rowTocheck.clcommon__Account__c===row.clcommon__Account__c)
		    {
		        return true;
		    }
		    else
		        return false;
	    });
	    if(matchingParty.length==0)
        {
            showError = true;
        }
        
    });
    
	if(!showError)
    {
        selectedApplicationModel.save({
            callback: function (result) {
                if (result.totalsuccess) {
                    var modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("NGLDApplication");
            
                    if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
                    modelToRefresh.updateData();
                    }
                    
                    // To Refreash the deal page
                    modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication');
                    if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
                        modelToRefresh.updateData();
                    }
                    dfd.resolve();
                } else {
                    addErrorMsg(result.insertResults[0]);
                    dfd.reject();
                }
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        isErr = addErrorMsg('The Borrowers/Lessees on the child application must be a subset or same as the parent application.'); 
        dfd.reject();
    }
});


function addErrorMsg(errMsg){
    var pageTitle = $('#AddDealErrorPanel');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: errMsg,
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
}

return dfd.promise();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LaunchAddNewApplicationDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

// var title = 'Add Credit Facility To Deal - ' + skuid.page.params.name;
// var skuidPage = 'ApplicationFormForComplexDeals';
// var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&parentId=' + skuid.page.params.id;

// openTopLevelDialog({
//     title: title,
//     iframeUrl: iframeUrl
// });


skuid.page.params.newdeal = true;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="InsufficientAvailableAmountMessage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var dfd = $.Deferred();

var userActionObject = skuid.model.getModel('UserAction').getFirstRow();
    if(!userActionObject.genesis__Application__c){
        addErrorMsg('Select Application first'); 
        return;
    }

var selectedApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedAppToUpdate');
var selectedApplication = selectedApplicationModel.getFirstRow();

var parentAndIncludedApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication');
var parentAndIncludedApplication = parentAndIncludedApplicationModel.getFirstRow();


if(parentAndIncludedApplication.genesis__Total_Facility_Variance__c<=0||parentAndIncludedApplication.genesis__Total_Facility_Variance__c-selectedApplication.genesis__Loan_Amount__c<=0)
{
    $('<div />').text("Insufficeint available amount on parent facility, Do you want to proceed?").dialog({
      resizable: true,
      height: 180,
      modal: true,
      buttons: {
         "Yes":function(){
             $(this).dialog("close");
             dfd.resolve();
         },
         "No": function(){
             $(this).dialog("close");
             dfd.reject();
         }
      }
    });
}
else{
    dfd.resolve();
}

return dfd.promise();
</jsitem>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveMembers" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var modelsToSave = [];
var isDataValid = true;
var relModel1 = skuid.model.getModel('ANR_NewIndividualRelationship');
var total=0;
if(relModel1.getFirstRow().clcommon__Related__Entity__c || relModel1.getFirstRow().clcommon__Relationship__c){
    if(!relModel1.getFirstRow().clcommon__Related__Entity__c && !relModel1.getFirstRow().clcommon__Relationship__c){
        isDataValid = false;
        var editor = $('.individual-save-member-error-panel').data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Both Related Entity and Role should be selected to add new individual member',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
    } else {
        modelsToSave.push(relModel1);
    }
}

var relModel2 = skuid.model.getModel('ANR_NewBusinessRelationship');
if(relModel2.getFirstRow().clcommon__Related__Entity__c || relModel2.getFirstRow().clcommon__Relationship__c){
    if(!relModel2.getFirstRow().clcommon__Related__Entity__c && !relModel2.getFirstRow().clcommon__Relationship__c){
        isDataValid = false;
        var editor = $('.business-save-member-error-panel').data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Both Related Entity and Role should be selected to add new business member.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
    } else {
        modelsToSave.push(relModel2);
    }
}

if(relModel1.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c != undefined && isNaN(relModel1.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c) && isDataValid){
    isDataValid = false;
        var editor = $('.individual-save-member-error-panel').data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please enter the valid value of Percentage.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
}
if(relModel2.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c != undefined && isNaN(relModel2.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c) && isDataValid){
    isDataValid = false;
        var editor = $('.business-save-member-error-panel').data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please enter the valid value of Percentage.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
}

if(relModel1.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c != undefined){
    total = total+relModel1.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c;
} 
if(relModel2.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c != undefined){
    total = total+relModel2.data[0].clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c;
}
if(total>100){
        isDataValid = false;
        var editor = $('.business-save-member-error-panel').data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Total value of Ownership Percentage should not be greater than 100',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
}
if(isDataValid){
    skuid.model.save(modelsToSave, { callback: function(result){
        if (result.totalsuccess){
            var parentId = skuid.model.getModel('AccountRelationDashboardPage').getFirstRow().Id;
            if(parentId.length > 15){
                parentId = parentId.slice(0, 15);
            }
            var path = parentId + ',deal-dashboard-iframe';
            closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: [path]});
        } else {
            // do nothing
        }
    }});
}</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="AddMembersCSS" cachelocation="false">.add-members-button-title .nx-header-right,
.add-members-button-title .nx-header-right > div,
.add-members-button-title .nx-header-right > div > div[role="button"]{
    width: 100%;
}

.add-members-button-title .nx-header-right > div > div[role="button"]{
    background: #1cbdd4;
}

.add-members-button-title .nx-header-right > div > div[role="button"] > .ui-button-text{
    font-size: 16px;
}
</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2k87-588"/>
  </resources>

    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
  <interactions/>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	            $ = skuid.$;
            </jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ChangeFilterBtnColor" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var covPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyCovAddtn');
var covPartyRow = covPartyModel.data[0];

if(covPartyRow.NoFilters){
    $('#NoFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#NoFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}

if(covPartyRow.RelationshipFilter){
    $('#RelationshipFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#RelationshipFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}

if(covPartyRow.EntityFilter){
    $('#EntityFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#EntityFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}

if(covPartyRow.ProductFilter){
    $('#ProductFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}else{
    $('#ProductFilter').removeClass('selected-btn');
}


</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="queryCovenantDefinitions" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
        	
var covPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyCovAddtn');
var covPartyRow = covPartyModel.data[0];
if(!(covPartyRow.NoFilters || covPartyRow.RelationshipFilter || covPartyRow.EntityFilter || covPartyRow.ProductFilter)){
   covPartyModel.updateRow(covPartyRow ,{ NoFilters : true ,
                                          RelationshipFilter : false,
                                          EntityFilter : false,
                                          ProductFilter : false
   });
   $('#NoFilter').addClass('selected-btn');
}

var covenantDefModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicableCovenantDefinition');
covenantDefModel.cancel();

// fetch all conditions
var relationshipCondition = covenantDefModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Relationship_Type__c');
var entityTypeCondition = covenantDefModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c');
var productTypeCondition = covenantDefModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Product__c');
// first deactivate all conditions
covenantDefModel.deactivateCondition(relationshipCondition);
covenantDefModel.deactivateCondition(entityTypeCondition);
covenantDefModel.deactivateCondition(productTypeCondition);

if(covPartyRow.RelationshipFilter){
    covenantDefModel.setCondition(relationshipCondition, covPartyRow.clcommon__Type__c);
}else if(covPartyRow.EntityFilter){
    covenantDefModel.setCondition(entityTypeCondition, covPartyRow.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c);
}else if(covPartyRow.ProductFilter){
    covenantDefModel.setCondition(productTypeCondition, covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__CL_Product__c);
}else{
    // no conditions
}

skuid.model.updateData([covenantDefModel],function(){ 
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object'); 
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step2');
});
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeCovenants" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var covPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyCovAddtn');
var covPartyRow = covPartyModel.data[0];
var startDate;
if(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c){
    startDate = new Date(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c);
}else{
    startDate = new Date(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c);
}

var otherParamsMap = {};
otherParamsMap['startDay'] = startDate.getDate();
otherParamsMap['startMonth'] = startDate.getMonth()+1;
otherParamsMap['startYear'] = startDate.getFullYear();
otherParamsMap['accountId'] = covPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
otherParamsMap['applicationId'] = covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.Id;

// covert to salesforce object instances
var resultObjList = [];
if(params.rows && params.rows.length > 0){
     params.rows.forEach(function (skuidObject){
         var sObj = new sforce.SObject(params.model.objectName);
         for(var key in skuidObject){
             if(skuidObject[key]){
                if(typeof skuidObject[key] !== 'object'){
                    if(!(key.toUpperCase() === "ID15" || key.toUpperCase() === "ID")){
                        sObj[key] = skuidObject[key];
                    } else if(key.toUpperCase() === "ID"  && skuidObject[key].length >= 15){
                        sObj[key] = skuidObject[key];
                    }
                }
            }
         }
         resultObjList.push(sObj); 
     });
}

var res = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidCovenantCtrl','generateCovenantsFromDefinitions', {
                                covenantDefinitions : JSON.stringify(resultObjList) ,
                                otherParams : JSON.stringify(otherParamsMap)
                            });
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    var newCovenantsModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedCovenants');
    newCovenantsModel.data = [];
    for (i = 0; i < resObj.content.length; i++) { 
        var newRow = newCovenantsModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Account__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Account__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Active__c', value:true },
                { field: 'clcommon__Covenant_Definition__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Covenant_Definition__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Covenant_Definition__r', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Covenant_Definition__r },
                { field: 'clcommon__Expiration_Date__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Expiration_Date__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator_High_Value__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator_High_Value__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Indicator_Low_Value__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Indicator_Low_Value__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Financial_Operator__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Financial_Operator__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Frequency__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Frequency__c },
                { field: 'clcommon__Notification_Days__c', value:resObj.content[i].clcommon__Notification_Days__c },
            ]
        });   
    }
    // move to next step
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');
}else{
    var pageTitle = $('#initializeErrorTile');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor; 
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveCovenants" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var covPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyCovAddtn');
var covPartyRow = covPartyModel.data[0];
var startDate;
if(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c){
    startDate = new Date(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c);
}else{
    startDate = new Date(covPartyRow.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c);
}

var otherParamsMap = {};
otherParamsMap['accountId'] = covPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
otherParamsMap['applicationId'] = covPartyRow.genesis__Application__c;
otherParamsMap['startDay'] = startDate.getDate();
otherParamsMap['startMonth'] = startDate.getMonth()+1;
otherParamsMap['startYear'] = startDate.getFullYear();

var newCovenantsModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedCovenants');
var res = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidCovenantCtrl','saveCovenants', {
                                covenantsJson : JSON.stringify(buildSObject(newCovenantsModel,true)) ,
                                otherParams : JSON.stringify(otherParamsMap)
                            });
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').last().dialog('close');
}else{
    console.log(resObj);
    var pageTitle = $('#saveCovenantErrorTitle');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor; 
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
}</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveParentChildModels" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
const appId = urlParams.get('id');
console.log('appId'+appId);

var list = params.list;

var selectedList1 = skuid.$('#assignReasonTable').data('object').list.getSelectedItems();
debugger;
var selectedList3= [];
var descriptionList = [];
var selectedList2= skuid.$('#assignReasonTable').data('object').list.getSelectedItems();//[0].childComponents[0].list.getSelectedItems()

selectedList2.forEach(function(entry){
selectedList3.push(entry.drawers[0].childComponents[0].list.getSelectedItems());
});

selectedList1.forEach(function(item){
    descriptionList.push(item.row.Id);
});

selectedList3.forEach(function(i){
    i.forEach(function(j){
        descriptionList.push(j.row.Id);
    });
});
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.AdverseAction','UpsertSelectedReasons',
{
    applicationId : appId,
    itemsList : descriptionList
});
alert(result);
//window.location.reload();</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
	             //Custom Added by Subham starts----
	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}]
	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                         { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
                         //Custom Added by Subham starts----
        	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}
        	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
        	             ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>

return result;

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});

var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));

var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};

window.parent.postMessage(message, '*');

function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var newAttachments = $.grep(allAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return $.inArray(attachment.Id, origIds) == -1;
});

var newIds = $.map(newAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var attachmentTable = skuid.$('#attachment-table').data('object');

$.each(newIds, function(index, id) {
    var checkbox = $(attachmentTable.list.renderedItems[id].element).find('input[type=checkbox]');
    if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
        checkbox.trigger('click');
    }
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="attachmentsComponent.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderFileName" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1],
	$ = skuid.$;

field.element.text(value);</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteDocumentCategory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var selectDocument = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryDetails').data[0];
var documentCategoryId = selectDocument.Id;	
var documentCategoryName = selectDocument.Name

var title = 'Delete ' + documentCategoryName + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document Category'
			+ ', <strong>\'' + documentCategoryName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document Category'
			+ ' \'' + documentCategoryName + '\'';

var okAction = {
	func: 'generateDeleteDocumentCategoryMessage',
	parameters: [documentCategoryId]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
	title: title,
	message: message,
	cancelText: cancelText,
	okText: okText,
	okAction: okAction
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteAttachment" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var catAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('AppDocCatAssociation').data[0];
var documentId = catAssociation.genesis__AttachmentId__c;
var parentId = catAssociation.genesis__Application_Document_Category__c;

var attachmentModelData = skuid.model.getModel('NewAttachmentModel').data[0];
var documentName = attachmentModelData.Name;


var title = 'Delete ' + documentName + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document'
			+ ', <strong>\'' + documentName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document'
			+ ' \'' + documentName + '\'';

var okAction = {
	func: 'generateDeleteDocumentMessage',
	parameters: [documentId, parentId]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
	title: title,
	message: message,
	cancelText: cancelText,
	okText: okText,
	okAction: okAction
});</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fetchAccountData" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

var applicationRowData = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').data[0];
var commonAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonAccountModel');
var biModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonBusinessInforModel');
var addressModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForm_Address');
commonAccountModel.emptyData();
biModel.emptyData();
addressModel.emptyData();

if(applicationRowData && applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c){
    var accountIdCondition = commonAccountModel.getConditionByName('CommonAccId');
    commonAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([commonAccountModel],function(){
    var AddressAccIdCondition = addressModel.getConditionByName('AddressAccId');
    addressModel.setCondition(AddressAccIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([addressModel],function(){});
        if(!(commonAccountModel.data && commonAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
            var newPSRow = commonAccountModel.createRow({ });
        }else{
            if(commonAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
                // fetch business info
                var bIdCondition = biModel.getConditionByName('BusinessInfoId');
                biModel.setCondition(bIdCondition,commonAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
                skuid.model.updateData([biModel],function(){});
            }else{
                var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
            }
        }
    });
   
}else{
    if(!(commonAccountModel.data && commonAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
        var newPSRow = commonAccountModel.createRow({ });
        var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
    }
}
</jsitem>
