        });
    }else{
        if(!(commonContactModel.data && commonContactModel.data.length > 0)){
            var newPSRow = commonContactModel.createRow({ });
        }
    }
}</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveApplication" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

var ApplicationRow = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').getFirstRow();

$.blockUI({
    message: 'Saving Application...',
    onBlock:function(){
        saveApplication();
    }
});

function saveApplication(){
    var newAppParams = {};
    var flag = false;
    var paramsMap = {}; // map of<string,string> 
    var editorWrapper = $('#AppTitleHeader');
    if(skuid.page.params.id){
        editorWrapper = $('#AppDetailTitleHeader');
    }
    var clPlatformCustomSettingsModel = skuid.model.getModel('CLPlatformCustomSettings');
    var customSettingsRow = clPlatformCustomSettingsModel.data[0];
    var firstPaymentDateValidationMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__FIRST_PAYMENT_CLOSE_DATE_VALIDATION}}");
    var editor = editorWrapper.data('object').editor;
    editor.clearMessages();
    var fetchIncludedPageData = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('getIncludedPageData');
    var result = fetchIncludedPageData();
    
    /*
    Handle error messages

    For printing error messages: use return functionName() as syntax
    For printing non error(INFO,WARNING) messages: use functionName() as syntax without any 'return' preceding function name
    */
    var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    
        if(severity === 'ERROR') {
            console.log('error');
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                    message: message,
                    severity: severity.toUpperCase()
                }
            ]);
    
            return false;
        } else {
            console.log('info');
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                    message: message,
                    severity: severity.toUpperCase()
                }
            ]);
        }
    };
    
    if(!result){
        displayMessage('Unable to save Application data.', 'ERROR');
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }

    var applicationModel = result['genesis__Applications__c'];
    var appRow = applicationModel.data[0];
    appRecType = skuid.page.params.RecordType
    if(appRecType && appRecType.length <= 14){
        appRow.RecordTypeId = appRecType;
    }else{
        var found = (skuid.model.getModel('GetRecordTypeId').data).find(function(element) {
            return (element.Name == skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordType').data[0].Name);
        });
        appRow.RecordTypeId = found.Id15;
    }
    if(skuid.page.params.parentId){
        appRow.genesis__Parent_Application__c = skuid.page.params.parentId;
    }
    var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
    var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
    if(selectedProductRow.Id && selectedProductRow.Id.length > 14){
        appRow.genesis__CL_Product__c = selectedProductRow.Id;
    }
    
    var contactModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonContactModel');
    console.log(contactModel);
    var contactRow = contactModel.data[0];
    var accountModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonAccountModel');
    var accRow = accountModel.data[0];
    var businessModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonBusinessInforModel');
    var businessRow = businessModel.data[0];

    if(!appRow.genesis__Term__c){
        appRow.genesis__Term__c = 0;
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__Term__c<0){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
                {
                    message: 'Term of payment information cannot be negative value.',
                    severity: 'ERROR'
                },
            ]
        );
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }

    if(appRow.genesis__Payment_Frequency__c == 'SEMI-MONTHLY-PD'){
        if(appRow.genesis__Second_Due_Day__c == 0){
          
            $.unblockUI();
            
            var isSecondDueDayPresent = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global","{{$Label.genesis__Application_Second_Due_Day_Present}}");        
            return displayMessage(isSecondDueDayPresent, 'ERROR');
        
        }
    }
    
    if(!appRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c){
        appRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c = 0;
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c<0){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                    message: 'Interest Rate cannot be negative value.',
                    severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }
    if(!appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c){
        appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c = 0;
    }
    if(!appRow.genesis__Requested_Loan_Amount__c){
        appRow.genesis__Requested_Loan_Amount__c = 0;
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c<0){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
                {
                    message: 'Loan Amount cannot be negative value.',
                    severity: 'ERROR'
                },
            ]
        );
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }
    if(!appRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c){
        appRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c = 0;
    }
    if(!appRow.genesis__Financed_Amount__c){
        appRow.genesis__Financed_Amount__c = 0;
    }
    if(!appRow.genesis__Draw_Term__c){
        appRow.genesis__Draw_Term__c = 0;
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__Amortization_Term__c === ''){
        appRow.genesis__Amortization_Term__c = null;
    }
     if(appRow.genesis__Repayment_Procedure__c === 'Equal Monthly Installments' && appRow.genesis__Interest_in_Advance__c === true){
         editor.handleMessages(
            [
                {
                    message: 'Interest in Advance and Equated Monthly Instalment cannot be selected together.',
                    severity: 'WARNING'
                },
            ]
        );
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }

    // add vendor related details
    var commonAppData = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').data[0];
    if(commonAppData.genesis__Vendor__c && commonAppData.genesis__Vendor__c !== '') {
        appRow.genesis__Vendor__c = commonAppData.genesis__Vendor__c;
    }
    if(commonAppData.genesis__Program__c && commonAppData.genesis__Program__c !== '') {
        appRow.genesis__Program__c = commonAppData.genesis__Program__c;
    }
    if(commonAppData.genesis__Parent_Application__c && commonAppData.genesis__Parent_Application__c !== '') {
        appRow.genesis__Parent_Application__c = commonAppData.genesis__Parent_Application__c;
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__CL_Purpose__r != undefined && appRow.genesis__CL_Purpose__r != null && appRow.genesis__CL_Purpose__r.clcommon__Primary_Purpose__c){
         appRow.genesis__Secondary_Purpose__c = appRow.genesis__CL_Purpose__r.clcommon__Primary_Purpose__c
    }
    if(appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__ != null && appRow.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c !=null && (appRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c<appRow.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c)){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                    message: firstPaymentDateValidationMessage,
                    severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }
    var addressModel  = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForm_Address');
    
    
    if(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) {
        //Deleting address rows marked for deletion on the UI
        addressModel.data.forEach(function(row) {
            if(addressModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(row) == true) {
                //The records just added in the UI but not saved in dB have ID starting with 'Sk-'
                //Hence, putting this check to delete the address row from dB, if that address exists in dB
                if(!(row.Id.startsWith('sk-'))) {
                    var addressToDelete = new sforce.SObject("clcommon__Address__c"); 
                    addressToDelete.Id = row.Id;
                    var delResult = sforce.connection.deleteIds([addressToDelete.Id]);
                    if(delResult[0].getBoolean("success")) {
                        addressModel.abandonRow(row);
                    } 
                    else {
                        console.log("failed to delete address " + delResult[0]);
                    }   
                }
                else {
                    addressModel.abandonRow(row);
                }
                //Deleting address values from account/contact which were copied from the addressModel
                //row (because of custom setting - clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c being true )
                if(row.clcommon__Billing_Address__c) {
                    accRow.BillingCity = null;
                    accRow.BillingCountry = null;
                    accRow.BillingStreet = null;
                    accRow.BillingState = null;
                    accRow.BillingPostalCode = null;
                }
                if(row.clcommon__Shipping_Address__c) {
                    accRow.ShippingCity = null;
                    accRow.ShippingCountry = null;
                    accRow.ShippingStreet = null;
                    accRow.ShippingState = null;
                    accRow.ShippingPostalCode = null;
                }
                if(row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
                    contactRow.MailingCity = null;
                    contactRow.MailingCountry = null;
                    contactRow.MailingStreet = null;
                    contactRow.MailingState = null;
                    contactRow.MailingPostalCode = null;
                }
                if(row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
                    contactRow.clcommon__Current_City__c = null;
                    contactRow.clcommon__Current_Country__c = null;
                    contactRow.clcommon__Current_Street__c = null;
                    contactRow.clcommon__Current_State__c = null;
                    contactRow.clcommon__Current_Zip_Code__c = null;
                }
                if(row.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) {
                    contactRow.OtherCity = null;
                    contactRow.OtherCountry = null;
                    contactRow.OtherStreet = null;
                    contactRow.OtherState = null;
                    contactRow.OtherPostalCode = null;
                }
            }
        });
        
        // Address validations code
        var invalidPreviousAddress = false;

        var missingStartDate = false;
        var missingEndDate = false;

        // Additionally, start date must be less than end date.
        var invalidDateRange = false;

        // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping.
        var hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = false;

        // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping with the current address.
        var hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = false;

        var currentAddressStartDate, currentAddressEndDate, previousAddress;

        // Stores the epoch for each previous address' start & end date.
        var prevAddressDateRangeList = [];

        // Comparator to sort the 'prevAddressDateRangeList' array. This is needed to optimise validations at #204.
        var startTimeComparatorFn = function(a, b) {
          if (a.startDateEpoch === b.startDateEpoch) {
            return a.endDateEpoch - b.endDateEpoch;
          }
          return a.startDateEpoch - b.startDateEpoch;
        }
        
        addressModel.data.some(function(row, i){
            // Validate Date range
            if (!row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
              missingStartDate = true;
              return true;
            }

            else if (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && !row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
              missingEndDate = true;
              return true;
            }

            else {
                if ((row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) &&
                    (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c > row.clcommon__End_Date__c)) {
                    invalidDateRange = true;
                    return true;
                }
            }

            if(row.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) {
                previousAddress = row;
                if (row.clcommon__Current_Address__c  || row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
                    invalidPreviousAddress = true;
                    return true;
                }

                // Populate date ranges within prev address for running validations later.
                if (previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c && previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
                    let startDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c).valueOf();
                    let endDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c).valueOf();

                    prevAddressDateRangeList.push({
                      startDateEpoch: startDateEpoch,
                      endDateEpoch: endDateEpoch
                    });
                }

            }
            if(row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
                currentAddressStartDate = row.clcommon__Start_Date__c;
                currentAddressEndDate = row.clcommon__End_Date__c;
            }
        });

        // Validate date ranges for any over lap in previous addresses.
        if (prevAddressDateRangeList.length) {
          prevAddressDateRangeList = prevAddressDateRangeList.sort(startTimeComparatorFn);
          let currentAddressStartDateEpoch, currentAddressEndDateEpoch;

          if (currentAddressStartDate && currentAddressEndDate) {
            currentAddressStartDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressStartDate).valueOf();
            currentAddressEndDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressEndDate).valueOf();
          }

          for (let i = 0; i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length; i++) {
            if ((i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length - 1) && 
                (prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch >= prevAddressDateRangeList[i+1].startDateEpoch)) {
              hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = true;
              break;
            }

            // Validate date ranges for any over lap of current address with previous addresses.
            if (currentAddressStartDateEpoch && currentAddressEndDateEpoch) {
              if (!(currentAddressStartDateEpoch > prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch ||
                currentAddressEndDateEpoch < prevAddressDateRangeList[i].startDateEpoch)) {
                  hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = true;
                  break;
              }
            }
          }
        }
    
    
        if (invalidPreviousAddress) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('Previous Address can\'t be selected with any other address type', 'ERROR');
        }
    
        if (missingStartDate) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('Start date must be defined if end date is defined.', 'ERROR');
        }
    
        if (missingEndDate) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('End date must be defined if start date is defined.', 'ERROR');
        }
    
        if (invalidDateRange) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('Start date must be less than end date.', 'ERROR');
        }
    
        if (hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap.', 'ERROR');
        }
    
        if (hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange) {
            $.unblockUI();
            return displayMessage('Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap with the current address.', 'ERROR');
        }

        const date1 = new Date(currentAddressStartDate);
        const date2 = new Date(currentAddressEndDate);
        const diffTime = Math.abs(date2 - date1);
        const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
        if(diffDays < 731) {
            if(previousAddress === undefined || !(previousAddress.clcommon__Street_Address__c && previousAddress.clcommon__City__c && previousAddress.clcommon__State_Province__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Zip_Code__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Country__c))
            {
                editor.handleMessages(
                    [
                    {
                        message: 'Previous address cannot be blank',
                        severity: 'ERROR'
                    },
                    ]
                );
                $.unblockUI();
                return;
            }
        }
    }
    // Address validations end

    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationModel;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = businessModel;
    if(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c)
        newAppParams.addressM = addressModel;
    else
        newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;

    var accExist = false;
    try{
        if(accRow.Name || accRow.LastName)
        {
           accExist=true;
        }
    }
    catch(ex){
        if(accRow.Name)
        {
           accExist=true;
        }
    }
    
    //CUSTOM Query to get the Legal entity starts--------------------------
    if(ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity != null){
        var query = "SELECT Id,Name from clcommon__Legal_Entity__c where Name = '"+ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity+"' LIMIT 1";
        var records = sforce.connection.query(query);
    }
    
    console.log('query---',records);
    //CUSTOM Query to get the Legal entity ends----------------------------
    if(accExist){
        //Custom added to store the entity type starts----------------
        if(ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity != null){
            accountModel.data[0]['clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c'] = records.records.Id;
        }
        else{
            accountModel.data[0]['clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c'] = accountModel.data[0].clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c
        }
        //Custom added to store the entity type ends------------------
        
        // if(!accountModel.data[0]['clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c']){
        //     editor.handleMessages(
        //         [
        //           {
        //               message: 'Legal Entity Type is missing',
        //               severity: 'ERROR'
        //           },
        //         ]
        //     );
        //     $.unblockUI();
        //     return;
        // }
        console.log('Account Model---->',accountModel);
        newAppParams.accountM = accountModel;
    }else{
        newAppParams.accountM = null;
    }
    if(contactRow && contactRow.LastName){
        //Custom added to store the entity type starts----------------
        if(ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity != null){
            contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c = records.records.Id;
        }
        else{
            contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c = contactModel.data[0].Account.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c
        }
        //Custom added to store the entity type ends------------------
        
        // if(!contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c){
        //     editor.handleMessages(
        //         [
        //           {
        //               message: 'Legal Entity Type is missing',
        //               severity: 'ERROR'
        //           },
        //         ]
        //     );
        //     $.unblockUI();
        //     return;
        // }
        let birthDate = contactRow.Birthdate;
        let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
        console.log('acountModel----->',accountModel.data[0]);
        //console.log(accountModel.data[0].clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name);
        //custom added by Subham --------
            //check only when the borrower is an individual
        /*if ((birthDate === '' || birthDate === null || birthDate === undefined || birthDate>today) ) {
            editor.handleMessages(

                 [{
                    message: 'BirthDate cannot be future date or blank.',
                    severity: 'ERROR'
                }]
            );
            $.unblockUI();
            return;
        }*/

        /*if((!(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) && (contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c === undefined||contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c<1)||(contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c==1&&(contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c<=0||contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c===undefined ))))
        {
            if(!(contactRow.MailingStreet&&contactRow.MailingCity&&contactRow.MailingState&&contactRow.MailingPostalCode))
            {
                editor.handleMessages(
                    [
                      {
                          message: 'Address cannot be blank',
                          severity: 'ERROR'
                      },
                    ]
                );
                $.unblockUI();
                return;
            }
        }*/
        newAppParams.contactM = contactModel;
    }else{
        newAppParams.contactM = null;
    }
    if(!selectedProductModel.data[0]['clcommon__Asset_Class__c']){
            editor.handleMessages(
                [
                  {
                      message: 'Asset Class on CL Product is missing, please correct the Product Configuration.',
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                  },
                ]
            );
            $.unblockUI();
         return;
    }
    var skuidApplicationId = appRow.Id;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    if(ApplicationRow.changeDate == true){
        paramsMap.changeDate = true;
    }else{
        paramsMap.changeDate = false;
    }
    if(ApplicationRow.generateSchedule == true) {
        paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    }else{
        paramsMap.generateSchedule = false;
    }
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap; //paramsMap is assigned to newAppParams
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    $.unblockUI();
    console.log(result);
    console.log('businessModel==',businessModel);
    console.log('businessRow==',businessRow);
    
    var resultJSON = $.parseJSON(result[0]);
    console.log(resultJSON);
    //Custom Added by Subham Start
    if(resultJSON.status === 'SUCCESS'){
        
        if(ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity === 'Individual(s) with DBA' || ApplicationRow.UIOnlyAppEntity === 'Individual(s) - Sole Proprietorship'){
            var accId = resultJSON.content[0].genesis__Account__c;
            $ = skuid.$,
            defer = new $.Deferred();
            $.when(businessModel.save()) 
            .done(function(){
                console.log('SUCCESS -->');
                businessModel.load();
                businessModel.updateData();
                var modelToSave = new sforce.SObject("Account");
                modelToSave.Id = accId;
                modelToSave.genesis__Business_Information__c = businessRow.Id;
                var resultOfUpdate = sforce.connection.update([modelToSave]);
                defer.resolve();
                
            }) 
            .fail(function(){ 
                defer.reject();
                console.log('save failed');
            });
        }
        console.log('Hello!!!------');
        
        if(skuidApplicationId == resultJSON.content[0].Id){
            var modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("NGLDApplication");
            if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
            modelToRefresh.updateData();
            }
            // To Refreash the deal page
            modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication');
            if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
                modelToRefresh.updateData();
            }
            skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').dialog('close');
            
        }else{
            window.location = '/' + resultJSON.content[0].Id;
            
        }
        return defer.promise();
            
            
    }
    //Custom Added by Subham End
    if (resultJSON.status === 'ERROR') {
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
              message: 'Application could not be saved. Duplicate account detected.',
              severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
    }

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="onLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
$('head').append(
  $('<base target="_blank">')
);
  var personAccount = skuid.model.getModel('PersonAccount');
  try{
    var isPersonAccount = false;
    var records =  skuid.utils.getAPIDescribeSObject('Account');
    records.recordTypeInfos.forEach(function(value) {
        // Check default record type and person account
        if(value.defaultRecordTypeMapping==="true")
        {
           var recordTypeId = value.recordTypeId
           var queryForPersonAccount = "select IsPersonType from RecordType where SobjectType='Account' and Id= \'"+recordTypeId+"\' and IsPersonType=true"
           var recordCount = sforce.connection.query(queryForPersonAccount);
           if(recordCount.size==1)
            isPersonAccount = true;
        }
    });

    if(personAccount.data.length!==0)
    {
        personAccount.data[0].Enabled=isPersonAccount;
    }
  }
  catch(ex){
    if(personAccount.data.length!==0)
    {
        personAccount.data[0].Enabled=false;
    }
  }
  var pageParam = skuid.model.getModel('PageParam').getFirstRow();
  var paramId = pageParam.Id;
  
  var orgParamRow = skuid.model.getModel('OrgParameter').getFirstRow();
  var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel');
  applicationModel.emptyData();
  if(paramId){
        var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
        applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,paramId);
        skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
            // record type
            var appRecType = applicationModel.data[0].RecordTypeId;
            var applicationRTModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordType');
            var rtIdCondition = applicationRTModel.getConditionByName('Id');
            applicationRTModel.setCondition(rtIdCondition, appRecType);
            var productModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var prodIdCondition = productModel.getConditionByName('Id');
            productModel.setCondition(prodIdCondition, applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c);
            skuid.model.updateData([productModel,applicationRTModel],function(){
                skuid.snippet.getSnippet('fetchAccountData')();
                skuid.snippet.getSnippet('fetchContactData')();
            });
        });
  }else{
      // fetch record type info
      var appRecType = skuid.page.params.RecordType;
      var appProType = skuid.page.params.ProductId;
        var applicationRTModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordType');
        var rtIdCondition = applicationRTModel.getConditionByName('Id');
        applicationRTModel.setCondition(rtIdCondition,appRecType);

      if(appProType){
          skuid.model.updateData([applicationRTModel],function(){
          var newRow = applicationModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'NewBorrower', value:false },
                    { field: 'RecordType', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow() },
                    { field: 'RecordTypeId', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow().Id },
                    { field: 'genesis__Account__c', value:skuid.page.params.AccountId },
                    { field: 'genesis__CL_Product__c', value:appProType },
                ]
            });
        });
      }else{
          skuid.model.updateData([applicationRTModel],function(){
              var newRow = applicationModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'NewBorrower', value:false },
                        { field: 'RecordType', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow() },
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow().Id },
                    ]
                });
        });
     }

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateRequiredFields" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

if(!(addressModel.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) && !(addressModel.clcommon__Current_Address__c)  && !(addressModel.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) && !(addressModel.clcommon__Billing_Address__c) && !(addressModel.clcommon__Shipping_Address__c))  {

    ]    
    );    
    $.unblockUI();    
    return false;    
}

return validateAllRequiredFields($,editor,models);

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="beforePopup" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
    
var fetchIncludedPageData = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('getIncludedPageData');
var result = fetchIncludedPageData();
var applicationModel = result['genesis__Applications__c'];
var newData = applicationModel.data[0];
var ApplicationOldValues = result['ApplicationOldValues'];
if( ApplicationOldValues !== undefined){
    if(skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').getFirstRow().oldProduct === undefined ){
        var appRow = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').getFirstRow();
        appRow.oldTerm =-1;
        
    }else{
        var oldData = ApplicationOldValues.data[0];
        var appRow = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').getFirstRow();
        appRow.oldTerm = oldData.oldTerm;
        appRow.newTerm = newData.genesis__Term__c;
        appRow.oldFrequency = oldData.oldFrequency;
        appRow.newFrequency = newData.genesis__Payment_Frequency__c;
        appRow.oldCloseDate = oldData.oldCloseDate;
        appRow.newCloseDate = newData.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c;
        appRow.oldLoanAmount = oldData.oldLoanAmount;
        appRow.newLoanAmount = newData.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        appRow.oldInterestRate = oldData.oldInterestRate;
        appRow.newInterestRate = newData.genesis__Interest_Rate__c;
        appRow.oldAmortizationTerm = oldData.oldAmortizationTerm;
        appRow.newAmortizationTerm = newData.genesis__Amortization_Term__c;
        appRow.oldInterestOnlyPeriod = oldData.oldInterestOnlyPeriod;
        appRow.newInterestOnlyPeriod = newData.genesis__Interest_Only_Period__c;
        appRow.oldRequestedLoanAmount = oldData.oldRequestedLoanAmount;
        appRow.newRequestedLoanAmount = newData.genesis__Requested_Loan_Amount__c;
        appRow.oldExpectedFirstPaymentDate = oldData.oldExpectedFirstPaymentDate;
        appRow.newExpectedFirstPaymentDate = newData.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c;
        
    }
}
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fetchAccountData" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var applicationRowData = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationClonedModel').data[0];
var ClonedAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedAccountModel');
var biModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedBusinessInforModel');

ClonedAccountModel.emptyData();
biModel.emptyData();

if(applicationRowData && applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c){
    var accountIdCondition = ClonedAccountModel.getConditionByName('CommonAccId');
    ClonedAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([ClonedAccountModel],function(){
        if(!(ClonedAccountModel.data && ClonedAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
            var newPSRow = ClonedAccountModel.createRow({ });
        }else if(ClonedAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
            // fetch business info
            var bIdCondition = biModel.getConditionByName('BusinessInfoId');
            biModel.setCondition(bIdCondition,ClonedAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
            skuid.model.updateData([biModel],function(){
                
            });
        }else{
            var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
        }
    });
}else{
    if(!(ClonedAccountModel.data && ClonedAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
        var newPSRow = ClonedAccountModel.createRow({ });
        var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
    } 
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fetchContactData" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var applicationRowData = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationClonedModel').data[0];
var ClonedContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedContactModel');
ClonedContactModel.emptyData();
if(applicationRowData && applicationRowData.genesis__Contact__c){
    if(applicationRowData.genesis__Contact__c){
        var contactIdCondition = ClonedContactModel.getConditionByName('CommonContactId');
        ClonedContactModel.setCondition(contactIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Contact__c);
        skuid.model.updateData([ClonedContactModel],function(){
            if(!(ClonedContactModel.data && ClonedContactModel.data.length > 0)){
                var newPSRow = ClonedContactModel.createRow({ });
            }
        });
    }
}else{
    if(!(ClonedContactModel.data && ClonedContactModel.data.length > 0)){
        var newPSRow = ClonedContactModel.createRow({ });
    }
}
        
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveApplication" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var dfd = $.Deferred();

var newAppParams = {};
var editorWrapper = $('#AppDetailTitleHeader1'); 
var editor = editorWrapper.data('object').editor;
var fetchIncludedPageData = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('getIncludedPageData');
    var result = fetchIncludedPageData();
    if(!result){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Unable to save Application data.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        dfd.reject();
    }
    

var applicationModel = result['genesis__Applications__c'];
var appRow = applicationModel.data[0];

var appRecordTypeRow = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordTypeModel');

if(skuid.page.params.id){
    appRow.genesis__Parent_Application__c = skuid.page.params.id;    
}

var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProductClone');
var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];

var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";

var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);

var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');


appRow.RecordTypeId = recordsArr[0].Id;
if(selectedProductRow.Id && selectedProductRow.Id.length > 14){
    appRow.genesis__CL_Product__c = selectedProductRow.Id;
}

var contactModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedContactModel');
var contactRow = contactModel.data[0];

var accountModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedAccountModel');
var accRow = accountModel.data[0];

var parentPartiesModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentParties');

var showError = false; 
if(accRow.Name){
    var matchingParty = parentPartiesModel.data.filter(function(rowTocheck){
        if(rowTocheck.clcommon__Account__c===accRow.Id)
        {
            return true;
        }
        else
            return false;
    });
    if(matchingParty.length==0)
    {
        showError = true;
    }
    
}
else if(contactRow.LastName){
    var matchingParty = parentPartiesModel.data.filter(function(rowTocheck){
        if(rowTocheck.clcommon__Contact__c===contactRow.Id)
        {
            return true;
        }
        else
            return false;
    });
    if(matchingParty.length==0)
    {
        showError = true;
    }
}

if(showError){
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: 'The Borrowers/Lessees on the child application must be a subset or same as the parent application.',
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );  
    dfd.reject();
}

var businessModel = skuid.model.getModel('ClonedBusinessInforModel');
var businessRow = businessModel.data[0];

if(!appRow.genesis__Term__c){
    appRow.genesis__Term__c = 0;
}
if(!appRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c){
    appRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c = 0;
}
if(!appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c){
    appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c = 0;
}
if(!appRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c){
    appRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c = 0;
}

newAppParams.applicationM = applicationModel;
newAppParams.businessM = businessModel;
if(accRow.Name){
    newAppParams.accountM = accountModel;
}else{
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
}

if(contactRow.LastName){
    newAppParams.contactM = contactModel;
}else{
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
}
var result = saveNGApplication(newAppParams);

var resultJSON = $.parseJSON(result[0]);
if (resultJSON.status === 'ERROR') {
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resultJSON.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    dfd.reject();
    
} else {
    var modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("NGLDApplication");
    
    if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
    modelToRefresh.updateData();
    }
    
    // To Refreash the deal page
    modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication');
    if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
        modelToRefresh.updateData();
    }
    dfd.resolve();
}
return dfd.promise();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="InsufficientAvailableAmountMessage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var dfd = $.Deferred();

var editorWrapper = $('#AppDetailTitleHeader1'); 
var editor = editorWrapper.data('object').editor;
var fetchIncludedPageData = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('getIncludedPageData');
    var result = fetchIncludedPageData();
    if(!result){
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Unable to save Application data.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return;
    }
    

var applicationModel = result['genesis__Applications__c'];
var appRow = applicationModel.data[0];

var parentAndIncludedApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication');
var parentAndIncludedApplication = parentAndIncludedApplicationModel.getFirstRow();

if(parentAndIncludedApplication.genesis__Total_Facility_Variance__c<=0||parentAndIncludedApplication.genesis__Total_Facility_Variance__c-appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c<=0)
{
    $('<div />').text("Insufficeint available amount on parent facility, Do you want to proceed?").dialog({
      resizable: true,
      height: 180,
      modal: true,
      buttons: {
         "Yes":function(){
             $(this).dialog("close");
             dfd.resolve();
         },
         "No": function(){
             $(this).dialog("close");
             dfd.reject();
         }
      }
    });
}
else{
    dfd.resolve();
}

return dfd.promise();
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="newcss" cachelocation="false">.sk-wrapper .nx-page {
    padding: 0 0 0 0;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-3N14-617"/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

Name: ApplicationView
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models>
    <model id="LockedApplicationRecord" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="clcommon__Locked_Record_Configuration_Snapshot__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Primary_Object_ID__c"/>
      </fields>
      <actions/>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="clcommon__Primary_Object_ID__c" operator="contains" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
    <model id="ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="RecordStatus" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false" mergefield="LockedRecordStatus" userinfotype="userid" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </fields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  <model id="ApplicationAttachments" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="Attachment"><fields><field id="Name"/><field id="LastModifiedDate"/><field id="Id"/></fields><conditions/><actions/></model></models>
  <components>
    <includepanel type="skuid" uniqueid="ApplicationHeader" pagename="GenericHeader" module="ngUi" querystring="?id={{$Param.id}}&isLocked={{{$Model.ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus.data.0.RecordStatus}}}" cssclass="includeHeader">
      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
    </includepanel>
    <pagetitle model="ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus" uniqueid="lockNotification" cssclass="lockNotification">
      <maintitle>Application is locked for further edits</maintitle>
      <actions/>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="RecordStatus" value="true"/>
      </renderconditions>
    </pagetitle>
    <includepanel type="skuid" uniqueid="myPkgView" pagename="PackageView" module="ngUi" querystring="?id={{{$Param.id}}}&isLocked={{{$Model.ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus.data.0.RecordStatus}}}" cssclass="myPkgView">
      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
    </includepanel>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="mainPage.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RecordLockStatusCheck" cachelocation="false">    var recordStatus = skuid.model.getModel('LockedApplicationRecord').data[0];
    var ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatusModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatus');
        
    if (typeof recordStatus !== 'undefined'){
        
        var isTrueSet = true;
        ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatusModel.updateRow(ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatusModel.getFirstRow(), {
                            RecordStatus:isTrueSet
                            });
        ApplicationView_ApplicationLockStatusModel.save();
      //alert('a'); 
      
        var element = document.getElementById("myPkgView");
        element.classList.remove("myPkgView");
        element.classList.add("unlockMyPkgView");
        
        var pageInclude = skuid.$('#ApplicationHeader').data('object');
        pageInclude.unrender();
        pageInclude.querystring = '?id=' + skuid.page.params.id+'&isLocked=' + isTrueSet;
        pageInclude.load();

        pageInclude = skuid.$('#myPkgView').data('object');
        pageInclude.unrender();
        pageInclude.querystring = '?id=' + skuid.page.params.id+'&isLocked=' + isTrueSet;
        pageInclude.load();
        

    }</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-common.css"/>
      <cssitem location="inline" cachelocation="false" name="applicationViewCSS">html {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    overflow-x: hidden;
}

	      
#ApplicationHeader {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 49px;
}

.lockNotification {
    background-color:#d1584f;
    position: absolute;
    top: 49px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 28px;
}

#lockNotification > div.nx-editor-header > div.nx-pagetitle-maintitle > div > div > div{
    color:white;
    margin: auto;
    font-family:Lato;
    text-align: center;
}

#lockNotification > div.nx-editor-header > div.nx-pagetitle-maintitle{

	position: absolute;
	top:0;
	bottom: 0;
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
  	
	margin: auto;
}

.myPkgView {
    position: absolute!important;
    top: 49px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.myPkgView body {
	background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
}

.myPkgView > .nx-page {
    margin-top: -1px;
    margin-right: -10px;
    margin-left: -10px;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}

div[pagename="ApplicationView"] {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}
.unlockMyPkgView{
    position: absolute!important;
    top: 78px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0; 
    	
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
    
        margin-top: -1px;
    margin-right: -10px;
    margin-left: -10px;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2Pzl-392">
      <actionsequence id="55d57c88-197c-4b37-95db-d94b68826f4d" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" label="CheckRecordStatus" event-name="page.rendered" uniqueid="sk-2Pzl-393">
        <description/>
        <actions>
          <action type="custom" snippet="RecordLockStatusCheck"/>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
    </actionsequences>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
    <styleitem property="position" value="absolute"/>
    <styleitem property="top" value="0"/>
    <styleitem property="bottom" value="0"/>
    <styleitem property="left" value="0"/>
    <styleitem property="right" value="0"/>
    <styleitem property="overflow-x" value="hidden"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var AssetBasedLOCCSProductmodel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSProduct');
	        var AssetBasedLOCCSProductmodelRow = AssetBasedLOCCSProductmodel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + AssetBasedLOCCSProductmodelRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             {field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LINE OF CREDIT'}]
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                        { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c', value:  'LINE OF CREDIT'}
                    ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){

    });
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];

}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetBasedLOCCSApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;

</jsitem>

<skuidpage personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" useviewportmeta="false" showheader="false">

          </actions>
          <events>

          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Market_Value__c</field>

        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="TotalLiabilities" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Liability__c" type="aggregate">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Amount_Owing__c" name="sumAmountOwing" function="SUM"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="Id" field="genesis__Contact__c" fieldtargetobjects="Contact" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="param" value="appId" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" inactive="false" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
      <groupby method="simple"/>
    </model>
    <model id="TotalAssets" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Asset_Information__c" type="aggregate">
      <fields>

      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="Id" field="genesis__Contact__c" fieldtargetobjects="Contact" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="param" value="appId" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" inactive="false" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>

    <model id="NetWorth" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateAssetsAndLiabilities" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var dfd = new $.Deferred();

var assetInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetInformationModel');

$.each(assetInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let acquisitionDate = row.genesis__Date_of_Acquisition__c;
    let marketValueDate = row.genesis__Market_Value_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (acquisitionDate === '' || acquisitionDate === null || acquisitionDate === undefined || acquisitionDate>today ) {
        
        dfd.reject({
            message: 'Date of Acquisition cannot be future date or blank.', 
            severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }
    
    if (marketValueDate === '' || marketValueDate === null || marketValueDate === undefined || marketValueDate>today ) {
        
        dfd.reject({
            message: 'Market Value Date cannot be future date or blank.', 
            severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }
    
    let name = row.Name
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        
        dfd.reject({
            message: 'Asset description can not be blank.', 
            severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }
});

var liabilityInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LiabilityInformationModel');

$.each(liabilityInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    let paymentAmount = row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c;
    let amountOwing = row.genesis__Amount_Owing__c;
    
    if (paymentAmount>amountOwing) {
        dfd.reject({
                message: 'Payment amount cannot be greater than amount owing.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }

});

dfd.resolve();

return dfd.promise();

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refreshThePage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
skuid.$M('NetWorth').evaluateFormulaFields();</jsitem>
    </javascript>

    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-1Egv-406"/>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createChangeMemo" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for setting paramemters for displaying create new change memo editor and hiding others
*  Where: create new change memo button
*
* @name  createChangeMemo.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


//a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

var newChangeMemo = skuid.model.getModel('ChangeMemo');
var newChangeMemoRow = newChangeMemo.data[0];

if(!newChangeMemoRow){
    var newChangeMemoRow = newChangeMemo.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'showCreateMemo', value:true },
            { field: 'showExistingMemo', value: false },

        ]
    });

}else{
    newChangeMemo.updateRow(newChangeMemoRow ,
                        { showCreateMemo : true ,
                          showExistingMemo : false });


}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="showExisting" cachelocation="false">/**

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="checkIfAllNone" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var panel =  $('#savePageTitleCreateButtons');
var editor =panel.data('object').editor;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};

var isBlankStr = function(str) {
    return (str === undefined || str.length === 0 || isNaN(str));
}

var newChangeMemo = skuid.model.getModel('CreateChangeMemoInPopUp');
var newChangeMemoRow = newChangeMemo.data[0];

if(isBlankStr(newChangeMemoRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c ) && isBlankStr(newChangeMemoRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c ) && isBlankStr(newChangeMemoRow.genesis__Term__c )) {
    return displayMessage('Provide value for at least one of the following input fields:[Loan Amount, Interest Rate, Term] ', 'ERROR');
}

return true;</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validatePledgeAmount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#pledge-collateral-title-id ').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var appColRowForPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForRemainingVal = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateralForPreviousPledgeAmount').getFirstRow();



var pledgeAmt;
var remainingAmt;
var previousPledgeAmt;

if(appColRowForPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    pledgeAmt = appColRowForPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}


if(appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}
if(previousPledgeAmt === undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = 0;
}

if(appColRowForRemainingVal !== undefined) {
    remainingAmt = appColRowForRemainingVal.RemainingValue;
    if(isNaN(Number.parseFloat(pledgeAmt))) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount should be a number ', 'ERROR');
    }else if(pledgeAmt < 0) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot be less than 0 ', 'ERROR');
    } else if(pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > 0 && pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > remainingAmt) {
        /* throw error message; return false */
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot exceed the available appraised value remaining for the collateral ', 'ERROR');
    } else {
        /* return true;*/
        return true;
    }
}

return true;

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateAppReqRecord" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
    
var appReq = skuid.model.getModel('AppraisalRequest');
var appReqRow = appReq.data[0];

var appColAssocn = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
var appColAssocnRow = appColAssocn.data[0];

var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#appraisal-request-title-id').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);
    return false;
};

if(appReq !== undefined) {
    
    if(appReqRow.genesis__Due_Date__c == undefined) {
        return displayMessage('Due Date for the Appraisal Request can not be null. ', 'ERROR');
    }
}

if(!appReqRow){

    var appReqRow = appReq.createRow({
        
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'genesis__Status__c', value:'Pending' },
            { field: 'genesis__Application_Collateral__c', value: appColAssocnRow.Id },
        ]
        
    });

}else{

    appReq.updateRow(appReqRow ,
                        { genesis__Status__c : 'Pending' ,
                          genesis__Application_Collateral__c : appColAssocnRow.Id });

}

var dfd = new $.Deferred();

    $.when(appReq.save())
        .done(function(){
           dfd.resolve();
        })
        .fail(function(){
           dfd.reject();
        });

    return dfd.promise();

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateRemainingValue" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;


var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collValRow = collValModel.getFirstRow();

var allAppForCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateral');
var allAppForCollateralList = allAppForCollateralModel.data;

var total_pledge_amt = 0;

if(allAppForCollateralList !== undefined) {
    /* sum all pledge amount across all application for this collateral */
    $.each(allAppForCollateralList, function(fieldId,appColRow) {
        $.each(appColRow,function(fieldName,val) {
            if ((fieldName != 'attributes') && (fieldName === 'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c')) {
                if(val !== undefined && val !== null) {
                    total_pledge_amt = total_pledge_amt + val;


                }

            }
        });
    });
    if(collValRow !== undefined) {
        /* update remianing value = Appraisaed_Value -Sum(Pledge_Amount across other loan application) */
        collValModel.updateRow(collValRow,{
             RemainingValue: collValRow.clcommon__Appraised_Value__c - total_pledge_amt
        });
    }
}

var collateralDetailView = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');

var appCollateralAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
appCollateralAssociation = appCollateralAssociation.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralAssociation) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralAssociation[key];
    }
}

var appCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
var appCollateralLienRow = appCollateralLien.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralLienRow) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralLienRow[key];
    }
}
var lienPosition = appCollateralLienRow.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
var res =true;

if(null==lienPosition || null==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c || ''==lienPosition || ''==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c){

    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position and amount are required to save lien details.',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

if(isNaN(lienPosition) || isNaN(appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c) ) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Invalid Lien Position/ Lien Amount.',	
        severity: 'ERROR'	},	
    ]);	
    return;	
}	
if(lienPosition<0 || (appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c)<0) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Lien position and Lien Amount can\'t be negative',	
        severity: 'ERROR'  },	
    ]);	
    return;	
}

if(lienPosition==0){
    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var applicationCollaterals = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollaterals');
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    let position = -1;
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    }
    
    
    if(position==lienPosition)
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        res = false;
    }
});

if(res===true)
{
    try{
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.CollateralLienSaveAndUpdateActions','saveOrUpdateApplicationCollateralLien',{
            appCollLienParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralLienRow),
            appCollAssociationParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralAssociation)
       });
       collateralDetailView.updateData();
       collateralLien.updateData();
       applicationCollaterals.updateData();	
    }
    catch(err) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + err,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }

    if (!result.includes('Succesfully saved')){
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + result,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }
    else {
         editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Lien saved successfully!',
                severity: 'INFO'
            },
        ]);
        var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
        var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
        var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                      paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                    });

        if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
        }
        else {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
                  severity: 'INFO'
                }
            ]);
        }
    }
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rejectDuplicates" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var collateralLienTable = $('#collateralLienTable');
var editor = collateralLienTable.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var existingLienPositions = [];
var applicationCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
applicationCollateralLien = applicationCollateralLien.data[0];

if(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
    existingLienPositions.push(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Lien_Position__c);
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var res =true;
var row_count =1;
var deleteRowCheck;
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    deleteRowCheck=false;
    let applicationLoan;
    if(null!=row.genesis__Application__c){
         if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined')        {
            applicationLoan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
            applicationLoan = 0;
        }
    }else{
        applicationLoan = null;
    }

    // This is to ensure that we are able to delete the newly added empty rows by surpassing the 'Required' functionality of various fields
    let row_element = document.getElementsByTagName('tr')[row_count];
    if(row_element.outerHTML.includes('nx-item deleted')){
        deleteRowCheck = true;
        row.clcommon__Bank__c = 'Dummy Bank';
        row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c = 0.0;
        row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c = 0;
    }

    if(!deleteRowCheck && row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c==0){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0 or blank',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    //Verifying if all the required fields are entered in the rows to be saved/updated (excluding the rows to be deleted)
    if(!deleteRowCheck && (
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c) == 'undefined' ||
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c) == 'undefined' ||
        null==row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c ||
       null==row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c  ||
       row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c == '' || row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c=='' ||
       (applicationLoan == null && row.LoanAmount  == ''))){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: ' Lien Amount, Lien Position and Loan Amount are mandatory fields. Please ensure to enter values for these!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    var lienAmount = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c;
    var loanAmount = ''+row.LoanAmount;
    var lienPosition = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(isNaN(lienAmount) || isNaN(lienPosition) ){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    if(lienAmount.includes('-') || loanAmount.includes('-') || lienPosition.includes('-')){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format. Can\'t save negative values.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    let position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(!deleteRowCheck && existingLienPositions.includes(position)){

        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
          {
              message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]);
        return
    }
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        existingLienPositions.push(position);
    }
    
    row_count++;
});
if(res===true){
    $.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
        let loan;
        if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else if(typeof(row.LoanAmount)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.LoanAmount;
        }else if(typeof(row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
             loan = 0.0;
        }
        collateralLiens.updateRow(row, {
            clcommon__Loan_Amount__c: loan
        });

    });
    collateralLiens.save();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
          message: 'Collateral Liens updated successfully!',
          severity: 'INFO'
        }
    ]);

    var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
    var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
    var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                  paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                });
    if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
    else {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
    }
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="makingLoanConditionallyEditable">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var field = arguments[0];
var value = arguments[1];

var collateralLien = field.row;

if(null!=collateralLien.genesis__Application__c){
    let loan_amount;
    if(typeof(collateralLien.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined')        {
        loan_amount = collateralLien.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
    }else{
        loan_amount = 0;
    }
    value=loan_amount;
    return skuid.ui.getFieldRenderer(field.metadata.displaytype).read( field, value );
}
else{
    try{
        if(typeof(collateralLien.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined'){
            value=collateralLien.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c;
        }
        else{
            value=0.0;
        }
    }catch(e){
        value=0.0;
    }
    return skuid.ui.getFieldRenderer(field.metadata.displaytype).edit( field, value );
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateLienAmount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
var applicationRow = applicationModel.data[0];

var AppCollateralAssociationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
var AppCollateralAssociationRow = AppCollateralAssociationModel.data[0];

if(applicationModel !== undefined){
    if(applicationRow !== undefined){

        if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'LOAN'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c
                           }); 
                
        }
        else if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'LINE OF CREDIT'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c
    
                               
                           });   
        }
        else if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'PACKAGE'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c
    
                               
                           });   
        }
    }
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="external" name="ConnectionJS" cachelocation="false" url="/soap/ajax/40.0/connection.js">var params = arguments[0],

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateStatementForm" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var statementHeader = skuid.model.getModel('NewStatementHeader').data[0];
var result = sforce.apex.execute('clcommon.CustomButtonAction', 'generateStatementsForm', {
                                statementId: statementHeader.Id,
                            }
                        );
skuid.component.getById('collateralIFrame').render();
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refreshTabs" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	skuid.component.getById('collateralIFrame').render();
	skuid.component.getById('colAnalysisIFrame').render();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="BasePeriods" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var statements = skuid.model.getModel('FinancialStatements').data;
var basePeriods = [];
var i;
for(i=0; i <statements.length ; i++){
    basePeriods.push({ label: statements[i].Name, value: statements[i].Id });
}
basePeriods.push({ label: 'Previous Period', value: 'Previous Period' });
return basePeriods;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="GenerateProjectedStatement" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var statementHeader = skuid.model.getModel('ProjectionStatement').data[0];
var statementParams = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters').data;

var col = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralModel').data[0];

var collateralStmtPage = $('#sk-1pNw-1422');
var editorNew = collateralStmtPage.data('object').editor;
editorNew.clearMessages();

if(statementHeader.Name===undefined){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Statement Name can\'t be empty',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}

if(statementHeader.FinancialStatementsForProjection===undefined){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Financial Statements For Projection can\'t be empty',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}

if(statementHeader.StatementDate===undefined){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Statement Date can\'t be empty',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}

if(statementHeader.MonthsCovered===undefined){
    editorNew.handleMessages(

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SensitivityAnalysisRequest" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

var parameters = "{";

var case1Params = "{";
var case2Params = "{";
var case3Params = "{";

    case3Params += ("\"" + statementParams[i].TemplateDetail +"\""+ ": "+"\""+statementParams[i].Case3+"\""+",");

case1Params = case1Params.slice(0,-1);

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeMonthsCoveredAnnual" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var statementType = field.row.clcommon__Statement_Type__c;
var picklistEntries = [];


if(statementType == 'Annual'){

        			{ value:'12', label: '12', defaultValue: true, active: true }
        
        	);

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="renderMonthsCovered" cachelocation="false">var FIELD_TO_RERENDER = 'clcommon__Months_Covered__c';

var params = arguments[0],
   row = params.row,
   model = params.model,
   $ = skuid.$,
   fieldsByRow = model.registeredFieldsByRowThenField,
   uiFields;
    
if (fieldsByRow && fieldsByRow[row.Id]) {
    uiFields = fieldsByRow[row.Id][FIELD_TO_RERENDER];

        $.each(uiFields,function(){
            this.render();

    }

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="setDefaultStatementYear" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var picklistEntries = field.metadata.picklistEntries;
if(picklistEntries!==undefined)
    picklistEntries.length = 0;
    
var currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();

var i;
for (i = currentYear+10; i >= currentYear-20; i--) {
    picklistEntries.push(
        { value:i, label: i, defaultValue: false, active: true }
    );

}
field.row.clcommon__Statement_Year__c = String(currentYear);
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, currentYear);
</jsitem>
