      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var ConstructionCREProductmodel = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREProduct');
	        var ConstructionCREProductmodelRow = ConstructionCREProductmodel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + ConstructionCREProductmodelRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id }]
	        });
	    }else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType}
                    ]
        	    });
        	}    
	    }
	    
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
       
    });
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
	
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREProduct').getFirstRow();	
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0]['genesis__CL_Product__c'] = productRow.Id;
}

var paymentStreamRows = skuid.model.getModel('PaymentStreamForCCREApp');
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'genesis__Payment_Stream__c' : paymentStreamRows,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;</jsitem>

return picklistEntries</jsitem>

var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];

Name: ConstructionHelp
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models/>
  <components>
    <wrapper uniqueid="sk-2SF_qm-79">
      <components>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SKB6Z-2050" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating a Budget Record</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2SGAnF-102">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SGF86-110" allowhtml="true" cssclass="help-text-wrapper">
                  <contents>To begin the construction budget process, users must first create the Budget Summary record.  Budget Summary fields are automatically presented to users on the Construction Dashboard:
    <ul>
        <li>Type - this is the type of construction project being undertaken (examples might include Office Building or Warehouse)</li>
        <li>Description - this is the description of the construction project</li>
        <li>Start Date - this is the date that the construction project is scheduled to begin</li>
        <li>End Date - this is the date that the construction project is scheduled to be completed</li>
        <li>Disbursement Type - this is the type of disbursement plan that is being applied to the project; applicable values include:
            <ul>
                <li>Standard - "standard" disbursement plans have been configured by the organization and will automatically create project milestones and disbursement schedules based on the type of construction project</li>
                <li>Progress-Based - "progress-based" disbursement plans assume that specific project milestones - or progress checkpoints - will be used to define the disbursement schedule</li>
            </ul>
        </li>
    </ul>
To enter values into these fields, user should hover over the specific field to reveal a <i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> icon. The user may, then, click on the <i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> icon to edit the field. Once all of the fields have been entered, the user must save the Budget Summary record by clicking the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2SG3-k-93" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_StartScreen.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SMoz9-2189" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating Milestones From Standard Disbursement Plan Templates</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2SMqYN-2194">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SNJXZ-2224" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Once the Budget Summary has been created, the following Budget Milestones actions are enabled:
<ul>
    <li><i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> - If the Budget Summary's Disbursement Type value is 'Standard', users can create milestones from standard disbursement plan templates by clicking the <i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> action.</li>
    <li><i class="fa fa-plus"></i> - Users can manually create project milestones by clicking the <i class="fa fa-plus"></i> icon.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2SN2HN-2213" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_BudgetSummary.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2W7pSX-97">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <grid uniqueid="sk-2WUS3z-1631">
                  <divisions>
                    <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
                      <components/>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
                  </styles>
                </grid>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2W7ypo-112" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>When users click the <i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> icon, the Disbursement Templates dialog is presented and users are enabled to select from a list of milestones associated with the type of construction project being undertaken.  To create milestones from this list of standard disbursement templates, users must click the checkbox next to each milestone (or click the checkbox above the list to select all milestones), and click the 'Generate Milestones' button.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WIUjo-1059" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DibsursementTemplates.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WAbKE-702" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Modifying Milestones</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2WAccj-707">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WAmS4-741" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>After creating project milestones, users may need to update milestone details. To do this, users must double-click on the field they want to edit, enter or update the field value, and click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save the Budget Milestone record. The following Budget Milestone fields can be modified:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the construction project milestone.</li>
    <li>Start Date - this is the date the milestone is expected to begin.</li>
    <li>End Date - this is the date the milestone is expected to be completed.</li>
    <li>Inspection Lead Time - the is the number of days prior to the start date of the milestone that an inspection alert should be generated.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WIZ1X-1068" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_MilestoneUpdate.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2Wj3A2-2269" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating Construction Activities (Milestone Line Items)</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2Wj4D0-2274">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2Wj6WC-2286" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Once the construction project milestones have been created, users can continue building out the construction project plan by adding the individual construction activities to each milestone.  These milestone line items contain the specific construction activities being performed during the project milestone - such as obtaining a building permit, or installing windows - and the estimated cost of each construction activity.

To add construction activities to a specific project milestone, users must click the <i class="fa fa-tasks"></i> icon next to the applicable milestone to reveal the Construction Activity Line Items screen. From the Construction Activity Line Items screen, users must click the <i class="fa fa-plus"></i> icon to add new construction activity rows and begin the creation process.  For each construction activity, users must enter the following information:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the construction activity.</li>
    <li>Amount - this is the estimated cost of the construction activity.</li>
</ul>
Once all applicable construction activities have been entered for a specific milestone, users must click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save the construction activities (users must click the <i class="fa fa-close"></i> icon to cancel any actions). These steps should be repeated for each milestone.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2Wj61Q-2281" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_LineItems.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WUNne-1627" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Generating a Disbursement Schedule</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2WUTe7-1636">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WUX0e-1648" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Disbursement schedules for construction loans in CL Originate are generated from the milestones configured in the construction project plan. To generate a disbursement schedule, users must select the milestones they want to use to create each disbursement in the disbursement schedule by click the checkbox next to the applicable milestone (or users can click the checkbox above the milestones to select them all).

Once all applicable milestones have been selected, users must click the 'Generate Disbursement' Schedule button.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WUW4u-1643" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_GenerateDisbursements.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lTNwv-158">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTQdx-165">
                  <contents>Once the 'Generate Disbursement Schedule' button is clicked, the selected project milestone information will appear as disbursement line items on the Disbursement Schedule panel.  If needed, users are given an opportunity to make changes to the disbursement line items prior to submitting the disbursement schedule.  The following information is mapped from the Budget Milestones to the Disbursement Schedule:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the disbursement line item; this value maps from the corresponding project milestone description.</li>
    <li>Schedule Date - this is the date that the disbursement is scheduled; this value maps from the start date of the corresponding project milestone.</li>
    <li>Inspection Lead Time - this is the period of time (in days) that users should be notified before a disbursement is required, given users the opportunity to perform any necessary site inspections before granting the disbursement; this value maps from the inspection lead time of the corresponding project milstone.</li>
    <li>Amount - this is the total amount of the disbursement; this value maps from the total line item amounts of the corresponding project milestone.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTRLQ-169" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DisbursementsEdit.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lTbCO-183">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTeiP-196">
                  <contents>To commit the Disbursement Schedule, users must click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save each line item record (or click the <i class="fa fa-close"></i> icon to cancel).

Users can add additional disbursement line items after the disbursement schedule has been generated by adding a new project line item, selecting it and clicking the 'Generate Disbursement Schedule' once more. Users may also edit existing disbursement line items by double-clicking on any specific record.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTcwE-190" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DisbursementSchedule.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTDWy-148" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Managing Inspection Alerts</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lT3-j-125">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lT6UD-132">
                  <contents>Many organizations will want to inspect the progress of the construction project prior to issuing a disbursement.  Likewise, users will see inspection alerts on the Construction Dashboard when a project milestone has met the project lead time criteria and is ready for inspection.  In these cases, users will be presented with the Inspection Alert penal as well as the following message:

<i class="fa fa-exclamation-triangle"></i> The following project milestones need to be inspected. A delay in inspection could result in a delay in a scheduled disbursement.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTA2K-140" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionAlert.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2la-G0-2264">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lb2zH-2283">
                  <contents>Once a site inspection has been performed, users can update the inspection alert by double-clicking the Inspection Status field to reveal status options.  Users must then select one of these options to clear the alert.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lb13Y-2273" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionUpdate.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2la_NP-2259">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lb3kX-2287">
                  <contents>Any time an inspection alert status changes, users are prompted to enter notes and/or comments related to the site inspection.  In these cases, users should enter notes or comments into the Comments field and click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lb1uQ-2278" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionNotes.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
      </components>
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="background"/>
        <styleitem type="border"/>
        <styleitem type="size"/>
      </styles>
    </wrapper>
  </components>
  <resources>

Name: CopyParty
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models>
    <model id="SelectedParentParty" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" adapter="salesforce" type="" sobject="clcommon__Party__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>

        <field id="clcommon__Account__r.Name"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Type__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Type__r.Name"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r.Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="RelatedAppWithSameParty" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" adapter="salesforce" type="" sobject="clcommon__Party__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>

      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="genesis__Application__r.genesis__Parent_Application__c" operator="=" novaluebehavior="noquery" model="SelectedParentParty" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="clcommon__Account__c" operator="=" model="SelectedParentParty" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="clcommon__Account__c" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="clcommon__Type__c" operator="=" model="SelectedParentParty" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="clcommon__Type__c" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="RemainingApplications" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" adapter="salesforce" type="" sobject="genesis__Applications__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="genesis__CL_Product__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__CL_Product__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__CL_Product__r.clcommon__Product_Name__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="genesis__Parent_Application__c" operator="=" model="SelectedParentParty" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="genesis__Application__c" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="Id" operator="not in" model="RelatedAppWithSameParty" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="genesis__Application__c" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>

    <model id="NewlyCreatedPartyModel" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" adapter="salesforce" type="" sobject="clcommon__Party__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r.Name"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Type__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Type__r.Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <grid uniqueid="sk-3Iq_ma-315">
      <divisions>
        <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1" verticalalign="top">
          <components>
            <pagetitle model="SelectedParentParty" uniqueid="addPartyErrorTitle">
              <actions/>
            </pagetitle>
            <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" createrecords="false" model="RemainingApplications" buttonposition="" mode="readonly" uniqueid="sk-3Ir1Jn-321">
              <fields>
                <field id="Name"/>
                <field id="genesis__CL_Product__r.clcommon__Product_Name__c"/>
              </fields>
              <rowactions/>
              <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true">
                <action type="multi" label="Add To Credit Facilities" icon="fa-plus">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="custom" snippet="createPartiesForApps"/>
                  </actions>
                </action>
              </massactions>
              <views>
                <view type="standard"/>
              </views>
              <actions defaultlabel="Global Actions" defaulticon="sk-icon-magic" usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
            </skootable>
          </components>
        </division>
      </divisions>
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
      </styles>
    </grid>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createPartiesForApps" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedParty = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedParentParty').getFirstRow();
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedPartyModel');
var selectedApplications = skuid.model.getModel('RemainingApplications').data;
if(selectedApplications){
    for (var index in selectedApplications) {
        console.log(index);
        if(selectedApplications[index] && selectedApplications[index].Id){
            var newRow = partyModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'clcommon__Account__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Account__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Account__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Account__r },
                    { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: selectedApplications[index].Id },
                    { field: 'genesis__Application__r', value: selectedApplications[index] },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__c', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__c },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__r', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__r },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__c', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__c },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__r', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__r },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Type__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Type__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Type__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Type__r },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r },
                ]
            });    
        }
    }

    skuid.model.save([partyModel], { callback: function(result){
        if (result.totalsuccess) {
            // close the frame
            closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: []});
        } else {
            var pageTitle = $('#addPartyErrorTitle');
            var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
            editor.handleMessages(
                [
                   {
                      message: result.insertResults[0],
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                   },
                ]
            );
        }
    }});
}

</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateQuestionsVisibility" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var questionToUpdateModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionToUpdate');
var questionId = questionToUpdateModel.data[0].Id;
var displayConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('DisplayCondition');

if(displayConditionModel.data.length>0)
{
  $.each(questionToUpdateModel.data,function(i,row){

    questionToUpdateModel.updateRow(row, {
            clcommon__Is_Visible__c: false
        });
  });   
}

questionToUpdateModel.save();
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="deleteAnswer" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var editor = $('#questioneditor').data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
var answerModel = skuid.model.getModel('AnswerDefinition');
var questionModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionDefinition');
if(answerModel.data.length>1)
{
    answerModel.deleteRow({Id:params});
    answerModel.save();
    return;
}
else if(questionModel.data[0].EnableScore===false&&(questionModel.data[0].clcommon__Answer_Type__c=='Text Area'||questionModel.data[0].clcommon__Answer_Type__c=='Check Box')){
    answerModel.deleteRow({Id:params});
    answerModel.save(); 
    return;
}
else{
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: 'Atleast one answer definition is required',
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    return;
}

return;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addAnswerRow" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var editor = $('#questioneditor').data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
var answerModel = skuid.model.getModel('AnswerDefinition');
var questionModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionDefinition');

var answerType = questionModel.data[0].clcommon__Answer_Type__c;
var isScoreEnabled  = questionModel.data[0].EnableScore;
var rows = answerModel.data.length;

if(answerType==='Text Area'&&isScoreEnabled&&rows<=0)
{
    answerModel.createRow();
    return;
}
else if(answerType=='Check Box'&&isScoreEnabled&&rows<=1)
{
    answerModel.createRow();
    return;
}
else if(answerType=='Multiselect Picklist'||answerType=='Picklist')
{
    answerModel.createRow();
    return;
}
else{
    editor.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: 'Can not add another answer definition for ' + answerType,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    return;
}

return;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="getSectionList">var field = arguments[0],    
$ = skuid.$;

var savedSection = field.row.clcommon__Display_Condition_Section_Id__r;
var sectionModel = skuid.model.getModel('SectionForDisplayCondition');

var picklistEntries = field.metadata.picklistEntries;
if(picklistEntries!==undefined)
    picklistEntries.length = 0;

if(savedSection!==undefined){
    $.each(sectionModel.data, function(i, row){
    
        if( row.Id!==savedSection.Id)
        {
            picklistEntries.push(
        
        			{ value:row.Id, label: row.Name, defaultValue: false, active: true }
        
        	);
        }
    });
        
    
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, savedSection.Name);
}
else{
    $.each(sectionModel.data, function(i, row){
        picklistEntries.push(
        
        		{ value:row.Id, label: row.Name, defaultValue: false, active: true }
        
        );
    });
        
    
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, "");
}</jsitem>

if(picklistEntries!==undefined)

if(savedQuestion!==undefined){
    $.each(questionModel.data, function(i, row){
    
        if(row.Id!==savedQuestion.Id)
        {
            picklistEntries.push(
        
        			{ value:row.Id, label: row.Name, defaultValue: false, active: true }
        
        	);
        }
    });
        
    
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype]['edit'](field, savedQuestion.Name);
}
else{
    $.each(questionModel.data, function(i, row){

        picklistEntries.push(
    
    			{ value:row.Id, label: row.Name, defaultValue: false, active: true }

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="renderAnswerValues" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],    
$ = skuid.$;
var value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]);

var displayConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('DisplayCondition');
var displayConditionValue = displayConditionModel.data[0].clcommon__Display_Condition_Answer_Value__c;
var selectedQuestionForDisplayConditionData = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedQuestionForDisplayCondition').data[0];
var answerDefinitionForDisplayConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('AnswerDefinitionForDisplayCondition');
var answerType = "Text Area"

if(selectedQuestionForDisplayConditionData!==undefined&&selectedQuestionForDisplayConditionData.clcommon__Question_Definition__r!==undefined)
{
    answerType = selectedQuestionForDisplayConditionData.clcommon__Question_Definition__r.clcommon__Answer_Type__c;
}
var displayType="TEXTAREA";

if(answerType==="Check Box")
{
    displayType="BOOLEAN";
        if(displayConditionValue=="true")
            displayConditionValue=true;
        else if(displayConditionValue=="false")
            displayConditionValue=false;
        else {
        	displayConditionModel.updateRow(displayConditionModel.data[0], {
                clcommon__Display_Condition_Answer_Value__c:"false"
            });
            displayConditionValue=false;
        }
}
else if(answerType==="Picklist")
{
    displayType="PICKLIST";
    var picklistEntries = [];
    
    $.each(answerDefinitionForDisplayConditionModel.data, function(i, row){
    
        picklistEntries.push(
    
    			{ value:row.clcommon__Value__c, label: row.clcommon__Value__c, defaultValue: false, active: true }
    
    	);
    });
    
    field.metadata.picklistEntries = picklistEntries;
}
else if(answerType==="Multiselect Picklist")
{
    displayType="MULTIPICKLIST";
    var multiPicklistEntries = [];
    
    $.each(answerDefinitionForDisplayConditionModel.data, function(i, row){
    
        multiPicklistEntries.push(
    
    			{ value:row.clcommon__Value__c, label: row.clcommon__Value__c, defaultValue: false, active: true }
    
    	);
    });
    
    field.metadata.picklistEntries = multiPicklistEntries
}


skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[displayType][field.mode](field, displayConditionValue);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addAnswerOnEnable" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var answerModel = skuid.model.getModel('AnswerDefinition');
var questionModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionDefinition');

var isScoreEnabled  = questionModel.data[0].EnableScore;
var rows = answerModel.data.length;

if(isScoreEnabled&&rows<=0)
{
    answerModel.createRow();
    return;
}

return;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="enableDisplayCondition" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var displayConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('DisplayCondition');
var questionToUpdateModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionToUpdate');

var question = questionToUpdateModel.data[0];
var rows = displayConditionModel.data.length;

if(question!==undefined&&question.clcommon__Questionnaire_Section_Definition__r.Name==='Section - 1'&&question.Name==='Question - 1')
{
    return false;
}
else if(rows>0){
    return false;
}
else
{
    return true;
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateQuestionDefinition" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var editor = $('#questioneditor').data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var questionModel = skuid.model.getModel('QuestionDefinition');
var displayConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('DisplayCondition');


if(questionModel.data.length>0)
{
    var questionData = questionModel.data[0];
    if(questionData.clcommon__Question_Description__c===undefined || questionData.clcommon__Question_Description__c==='' || questionData.clcommon__Question_Description__c===' ')
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Question Description can not be empty ',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return false;
    }
}

if(displayConditionModel.data.length>0){
    var consitionData = displayConditionModel.data[0];
    if(consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Question_Id__c===undefined || consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Question_Id__c==='' || consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Question_Id__c===' ')
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Question Id of display condition can not be empty ',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return false;
    }
    if(consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Section_Id__c===undefined || consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Section_Id__c==='' || consitionData.clcommon__Display_Condition_Section_Id__c===' ')
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Section Id of display condition can not be empty ',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return false;
    }
}

return true;</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="creditScoreJS" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        calculateColor();
        adjustMark();
    });
})(skuid);


function adjustMark() {
    var width = $('.credit-score-bar').width();
    var score = parseInt($('.credit-score-number').text());
    var left = width * (score - 300) / (850 - 300);
    $('.credit-score-number').css('left', (left - $('.credit-score-number').outerWidth() / 2) + 'px');
    $('.credit-score-mark').css('left', (left - 3) + 'px');
    $('.credit-score-mark-top').css('left', (left - 7) + 'px');
    return score;
}

function calculateColor() {
    var score = parseInt($('.credit-score-bg').text());
    var low = 300, middle = 575, high = 850;
    var lowRed = 230, middleRed = 255, highRed = 72;
    var lowGreen = 60, middleGreen = 162, highGreen = 206;
    var lowBlue = 0, middleBlue = 29, highBlue = 148;

    var alpha, red, green, blue;

    if (score < middle) {
        alpha = (score - low) / (middle - low);
        red = Math.floor(alpha * middleRed + (1 - alpha) * lowRed);
        green = Math.floor(alpha * middleGreen + (1 - alpha) * lowGreen);
        blue = Math.floor(alpha * middleBlue + (1 - alpha) * lowBlue);
    } else {
        alpha = (score - middle) / (high - middle);
        red = Math.floor(alpha * highRed + (1 - alpha) * middleRed);
        green = Math.floor(alpha * highGreen + (1 - alpha) * middleGreen);
        blue = Math.floor(alpha * highBlue + (1 - alpha) * middleBlue);
    }

    var color = 'rgb(' + red + ', ' + green + ', ' + blue + ')';
    $('.credit-score-bg').css('background-color', color);
}</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderCreditReportColumn" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],

var url = field.row.ints__Credit_Report_Attachment__c;
var reportId = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf('/')+1);

field.element.html('<a>' + value + ' <i class="fa fa-expand"></i></a>');

field.element.on('click', function(evt) {
    openPreviewDialog(reportId);
    return false;
});

function openPreviewDialog(reportId) {
    var dialogHeight = $(window).height();
    var dialogWidth = $(window).width();

    var iframe = $('<iframe width="100%" height="100%" frameBorder="0"/>');
    iframe.attr('src', '/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=' + reportId);

    $(document.body).append($('<div id="document-preview-dialog"></div>').append(iframe));

    $('#document-preview-dialog').dialog({
        modal: true,
        title: 'Credit Report',
        width: dialogWidth,
        height: dialogHeight,
        draggable: false,
        resizable: false,
        close: function(evt, ui) {
            $(document.body).find('#document-preview-dialog').remove();
        }
    });
}</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="external" name="apexExecute" cachelocation="false" url="/soap/ajax/30.0/apex.js">

				$ = skuid.$;
			</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="computeDTI" cachelocation="false">
				var params = arguments[0],
				$ = skuid.$;
				var appId = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationData').data[0].Id;
				var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeDebtToIncomeRatio', 'computeDebtToIncomeRatio', { objectID : appId });
                var dfd = new $.Deferred();
				if (returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
                    return dfd.resolve( {
                        message : returnMsg[0]
                    });
                }
                else {
                    alert(returnMsg);
                    return dfd.resolve( {
                        message : 'Loading...'
                    });
                }
            </jsitem>
        </javascript>
        <css>

					#includePartyDTIDashboard {
						height:-webkit-fill-available;
						overflow:visible;
					}
			</cssitem>
        </css>
        <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2Rb--645"/>

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="false">
    <models>
        <model id="DataLoaderHeader" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="ints__Data_Loader_Header__c">
            <fields>
                <field id="Name" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="STRING"/>
                <field id="ints__Installed__c"/>
                <field id="Id"/>
            </fields>
            <conditions logic="1 AND 2">
                <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Id" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="dlh_id"/>
            </conditions>
            <actions/>
        </model>
        <model id="DataLoaderDetail" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="ints__Data_Loader_Detail__c">
            <fields>
                <field id="Name"/>
                <field id="ints__Data_Loader_Header__c"/>
                <field id="ints__Data_Loader_Header__r.Name"/>
                <field id="ints__Static_Resource_Name__c"/>
                <field id="Id"/>
                <field id="ints__Order_of_Processing__c"/>
                <field id="ints__Operation__c"/>
                <field id="ints__Object_Name__c"/>
            </fields>
            <conditions/>
            <actions/>
        </model>
    </models>
    <components>
        <tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" uniqueid="sk-lrc_r-85" renderas="">
            <tabs>
                <tab name="Default Product Configuration">
                    <components>
                        <panelset type="standard" uniqueid="sk-3KbKGL-207" scroll="">
                            <panels>
                                <panel type="left" width="950px">
                                    <components>
                                        <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" createrecords="false" model="DataLoaderHeader" buttonposition="" mode="readonly" allowcolumnreordering="true" uniqueid="sk-2HIBwk-188">
                                            <fields>
                                                <field id="Name" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-2HNHCp-213" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true">
                                                    <label>Default Product Configuration</label>
                                                    <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                                                    <enableconditions/>
                                                </field>
                                                <field id="ints__Installed__c" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-2HNHCp-214" type="" valuehalign="" readonly="true"/>
                                            </fields>
                                            <rowactions>
                                                <action type="multi" label="Install Default Pack " icon="fa-download">
                                                    <actions>
                                                        <action type="showPopup">
                                                            <popup title="Install Default Product Configuration" width="90%">
                                                                <components>
                                                                    <richtext multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2HNqfp-270">
                                                                        <contents><p><span style="font-size:18px;"><strong>Are you sure you want to install the following default product configuration?</strong></span></p>
</contents>
                                                                    </richtext>
                                                                    <pagetitle model="DataLoaderHeader" uniqueid="sk-2HdYR--1023">
                                                                        <subtitle>{{Name}}</subtitle>
                                                                        <actions>
                                                                            <button type="multi" label="Cancel">
                                                                                <actions>
                                                                                    <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                                                </actions>
                                                                            </button>
                                                                            <button type="multi" label="Continue">
                                                                                <actions>
                                                                                    <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                                                                    <action type="custom" snippet="InstallProductConfig"/>
                                                                                    
                                                                                <action type="requeryModel" model="DataLoaderHeader" behavior="standard"/>
</actions>
                                                                                <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                                                                                <enableconditions/>
                                                                                <hotkeys/>
                                                                            </button>
                                                                        </actions>
                                                                        <conditions>
                                                                            <condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id" operator="="/>
                                                                        </conditions>
                                                                    </pagetitle>
                                                                </components>
                                                            </popup>
                                                        </action>
                                                    </actions>
                                                    <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="DataLoaderHeader" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="ints__Installed__c" value="false"/>
                                                    </renderconditions>
                                                </action>
                                            </rowactions>
                                            <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                                            <views>
                                                <view type="standard"/>
                                            </views>
                                            <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                                        </skootable>
                                    </components>
                                </panel>
                                <panel>
                                    <components>
                                        <richtext multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3L5SnX-1121">
                                            <contents><div style="background:#ffffff;border:2px solid #008B8B;">
<div style="background:#008B8B;">
<div style="background:#eeeeee;border:1px solid #cccccc;padding:0px 0px;">
<div style="background:#008b8b;border:1px solid #cccccc;padding:0px 0px;">
<p><span style="color:#ffffff;"><span style="font-size:14px;"><strong>&nbsp;Help</strong></span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<p><span style="font-size:14px;"><code><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,Times,serif;">Default product configuration packs include standard configurations for various loan contexts&nbsp; including commercial and consumer loan&nbsp; origination for the different regions supported by&nbsp; &nbsp; CL Originate. Click the install default pack icon&nbsp; before the applicable default product configuration&nbsp; pack to initiate installation of the default product&nbsp; settings.</span></code></span></p>
</div>
</contents>
                                        </richtext>
                                    </components>
                                </panel>
                            </panels>
                        </panelset>
                    </components>
                </tab>
            </tabs>
        </tabset>
    </components>
    <resources>
        <labels/>
        <javascript>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="InstallProductConfig" cachelocation="false" url="">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var header = skuid.model.getModel('DataLoaderHeader');
var result;
var field  = arguments[0];
value = arguments[1],
 row = params.row;
var arg = new Object();
arg.dataLoaderHeaderName = row.Name;
sforce.apex.execute('genesis.DataLoader','installDefaultData',arg);
var query = "SELECT Id,ints__Installed__c FROM ints__Data_Loader_Header__c WHERE Name =\'" + row.Name + "\'" + "LIMIT 1"; 
var records = sforce.connection.query(query);
var recordsArr = records.getArray('records');
if(recordsArr !== null){
var isInstalled = recordsArr[0].ints__Installed__c;
if(isInstalled == 'false'){
result = 'Installation failed. Please check logs for further details.';
} else {
result = 'Success';
}
}
alert(result);
</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="external" name="ApexAJAX" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
        <jsitem location="external" name="ConnectionJS" cachelocation="false" url="/soap/ajax/24.0/connection.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
</javascript>
        <css/>
    </resources>
    <styles>
        <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
    </styles>
</skuidpage>

		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateIdentificationInput" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var pageTitle = null;
var documentCategoryModel = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategory');
var documentCategoryRow = documentCategoryModel.data[0];

if(documentCategoryRow.clcommon__Document_Definition__r!==undefined){
    var identificationInformationModel = null;
    if(documentCategoryRow.clcommon__Document_Definition__r.Name==='Primary Identification')
    {
        identificationInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('PrimaryIdentificationInformation');
        pageTitle = $('#primaryIdentificationEditor');
    }
    else if(documentCategoryRow.clcommon__Document_Definition__r.Name==='Secondary Identification')
    {
        identificationInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('SecondaryIdentificationInformation');
        pageTitle = $('#secondaryIdentificationEditor');
    }
    else return true
    
    var identificationInformationRow = identificationInformationModel.data[0];
    let expDate = identificationInformationRow.genesis__Expiration_Date__c;
    let issuanceDate = identificationInformationRow.genesis__Date_of_Issuance__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
    
    
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
    
    if (issuanceDate === '' || issuanceDate === null || issuanceDate === undefined || issuanceDate>today ) {
        editor.handleMessages( 
            
            [{
               
                message: 'Please Enter vaild Date of issuance', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
    
        return false;
    }
    
    if (expDate === '' || expDate === null || expDate === undefined || expDate<=today ) {
        editor.handleMessages( 
            
            [{
               
                message: 'Expiration date should be future date', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
    
        return false;
    }
}
return true;</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fileSize" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var cellElem = field.element;
var value = arguments[1];
var sizeKB  = field.row.BodyLength/1024
 sizeKB = sizeKB.toFixed(2) + ' KB'
cellElem.append(sizeKB);</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateFile" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var catAttModel = skuid.model.getModel('CategoryAttachmentAssociation');
var attModel = skuid.model.getModel('Attachment');
var contentDocModel = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');

var type = '';
if(attModel.data.length>0){
    type = attModel.data[0].Name.split('.')[1];
}
else if(contentDocModel.data.length>0){
    type = contentDocModel.data[0].ContentDocument.FileType;
}

$.each(catAttModel.data, function(i, row) {
    var fName = row.Name;
    if(fName.split('.').length != 2) {
        alert('Please provide the file extension in the file name.');
        return false;
    }
    if(fName.split('.').length == 2) {
        var cType = fName.split('.')[1];
        if(cType.toUpperCase() === type.toUpperCase()) {
            catAttModel.save();
            return true;
        } else {
             alert('Please provide the same file extension in the file name.');
             return false;
        }
    }
    return false;
    
});
</jsitem>
		</javascript>
		<css>
			<cssitem location="inline" name="newcss" cachelocation="false">#DocumentDetails .nx-pagetitle-maintitle {
    padding: 0 !important;
}</cssitem>
		</css>
		<actionsequences uniqueid="sk-3aez-508"/>
	</resources>
	<styles>
		<styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
	</styles>
</skuidpage>

      <buttons>
        <button type="multi" label="Send Notification" uniqueid="sk-38-247">
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="sendNotification"/>
          </actions>
          <hotkeys/>

          <enableconditions/>
        </button>
      </buttons>

  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="external" name="ApexAjax" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="clsRemoteActions.js"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js"/>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="sendNotification" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
            	$ = skuid.$;
var selectedList = skuid.$('#documentCategoryList').data('object').list.getSelectedItems();
    if(selectedList.length == 0){
        alert('Please select documents for notification');
        return false;
    }else{
        var docuList;
        var seq = 1;
        var appAccountId = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryList').data[0].genesis__Application__r.genesis__Account__c;
        var documentCategoryId = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryList').data[0].clcommon__Parent_Document_Category__c;
        selectedList.forEach(function(item){
            if(!docuList){
                docuList = seq + '.  ' + item.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c;
            }else{
               docuList = docuList+'\n' + seq + '.  ' +item.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c
            }
            seq++;
        });
        var documentNotification = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.DocumentCategoryNotification','sendDocumentCategoryNotification',{
             documentList : docuList ,
             accountId : appAccountId,
             documentCategoryId : documentCategoryId
        });
        alert(documentNotification);
        closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['nx-page-content']});
       
    }


</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" cachelocation="false" name="documentNotification">#documentCategoryList div.nx-actionselect {
            display: none !important;
        }
</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-3-BA-206"/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
  <interactions/>
</skuidpage>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateEmploymentAndIncome" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var employmentInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EmploymentInformationModel');
var pageTitle = $('#editorTitle');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
var showError = false;
var employementCurrentStartDateMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__EMPLOYMENT_DATE}}");
var employementPreviousStartDateMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__PREVIOUS_EMPLOYMENT_DATE}}");
var previousEmployementEndDateMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__PREVIOUS_EMPLOYMENT_END_DATE}}");
var dateValidationMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__DATE_VALIDATION}}");
var incomeNameInvalidMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__INCOME_NAME_INVALID}}");
$.each(employmentInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        
        editor.handleMessages(
        [{
            message: employementCurrentStartDateMessage,
            severity: 'ERROR'
            
        }]
        );
        showError = true;
        return false;
    }
});

var previousEmploymentInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('PreviousEmploymentInfoModel');

$.each(previousEmploymentInfoModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let endDate = row.genesis__End_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [{
            message: employementPreviousStartDateMessage,
            severity: 'ERROR'
            
        }]
        ); 
        showError = true;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (endDate === '' || endDate === null || endDate === undefined || endDate>today ) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [{
            message: previousEmployementEndDateMessage,
            severity: 'ERROR'
            
        }]
        );
        showError = true;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (startDate>endDate ) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [{
            message: dateValidationMessage,
            severity: 'ERROR'
            
        }]
        );
        showError = true;
        return false;           
    }
});

var otherIncomeModel = skuid.model.getModel('OtherIncomeModel');

$.each(otherIncomeModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let name = row.Name;

    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [{
            message: incomeNameInvalidMessage,
            severity: 'ERROR'
            
        }]
        );
        showError = true;
        return false;
    }
});

if(showError){
    return false;
}

</jsitem>
    </javascript>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="FinancialStatement_BeautifyTable" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var templateModel = skuid.model.getModel('TemplateDetails');
	    var statements = skuid.model.getModel('FSHeader');
        $('.financial-statement-table').each(
            function(tableIndex, table) {
                $(table).find('table tbody tr').each(
                    function(index, element) {
                        if(templateModel.data[index]){
                            var level = templateModel.data[index].clcommon__Level__c;
                            if(level) {
                                $(element).attr('level', level.split('.').length);
                            } else {
                                $(element).attr('level', 0);    
                            }
                            $(element).attr('row-type', templateModel.data[index].clcommon__Type__c);
                        }
                    }
                )
            }
        )
        
        $(window.document.body).find('a').each(function(index, link) {
    		$(link).attr('target', '_blank');
    	});
    	
    	$('.statement-detail').each(
    	    function(tableIndex,table){
    	        console.log(table);
    	        if(statements.data[tableIndex]){
    	            var tableData =  statements.data[tableIndex];
    	            console.log(tableData);
    	            $(table).find('.nx-field div.nx-fieldtext div.nx-template').each(
                        function(index,element){
                           
                            var level = tableData.clcommon__Financial_Statement__r.records[index].clcommon__Template_Detail__r.clcommon__Level__c;
                            console.log(level);
                            if(level) {
                                $(element).attr('level', level.split('.').length);
                            } else {
                                $(element).attr('level', 0);    
                            }
                            $(element).attr('row-type', tableData.clcommon__Financial_Statement__r.records[index].clcommon__Template_Detail__r.clcommon__Type__c);
                            console.log(element);
                        }
                    )
    	        }
    	        
    	    }
    	);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="FinancialStatement_EditHandler" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var statementModel = skuid.model.getModel('FSHeader');
var statementHeaders = statementModel.data;
if (!$('#edit-button + #edit-dropdown').length) {
    showDropdown();
} else {
    closeDropdown();
}

function showDropdown() {
    var dropdownList = $('<div/>', {
        id: 'edit-dropdown'
    }).css('position', 'absolute').css('right', '10px').css('border', '1px solid #7f7f7f').css('z-index', 5);
    statementHeaders.forEach(function(element) {
        var entry = $('<div>Statement ' + element.Name + '</div>').css('padding-top', '6px').css('padding-bottom', '6px').css('padding-left', '10px').css('padding-right', '10px').css('cursor', 'pointer');
        entry.click(function() {
            openEditIframe(element.Id)
        });
        dropdownList.append(entry);
    });

    $('#edit-button').after(dropdownList);
}

function closeDropdown() {
    $('#edit-button + #edit-dropdown').remove();
}

function openEditIframe(statementId) {
    closeDropdown();
    var overlay = $('<div id="edit-statement-overlay"></div>').css({
        position: 'fixed',
        top: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        right: 0,
    }).css("z-index", 100).css("background-color", "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3");
    var dialog = $('<div id="edit-statement-dialog"></div>').css("margin-top", "30px").css("margin-bottom", "30px").css("margin-left", '5%').css("margin-right", "5%").css("height", "calc(100% - 60px)");
    var closeButton = $('<div></div>').addClass('fa fa-times').css({
        position: 'absolute',
        top: '25px',
        left: '94%',
        height: '15px',
        width: '15px',
        color: '#ffffff'
    }).click(function() {
        closeEditIframe();
    });
    var src = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=StatementDetails&id=' + statementId + '&type=' + skuid.page.params.type + '&editmode=true';
    var iframe = $('<iframe width="100%" height="100%" frameBorder="0" style="background: #ffffff; padding-top: 20px; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; padding-bottom: 7px;"/>');
    iframe.attr('src', src);
    
    dialog.append(iframe).append(closeButton);
    overlay.append(dialog);
	
    $(document.body).append(overlay);
}

function closeEditIframe() {
    $('#edit-statement-overlay').remove();
}

window.addEventListener('message', function(evt) {
    if(evt.data.type == 'requery-statement-headers'){
        $.when(statementModel.updateData()).then(function(){
           closeEditIframe();
        });
    } else if(evt.data.type == 'close-edit-statement-headers'){
         closeEditIframe();
    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="UpdateSobjectTypeOnLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">
      (function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        // determine sobject type and prefix
        if(skuid.page.params.id){
            getDataFromId();
        } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        } else {
            skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        }
        // show button labels as icons
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
    });

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        if(sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
            var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        if(sobjectType != undefined) {
            var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    //create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
      if(sobjectType != undefined && sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
      }
    }

    // get sobject name from sobject prefix
    function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                  selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
    function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                  prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return prefix;
    }

})(skuid);
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ManageLoanTeamPopOver" cachelocation="false">
      var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

console.log(' popup session app id :: ' + sessionStorage.selectApplicationId);
var applicationId ;
var treasuryApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('TreasuryApplicationModel');
if(treasuryApplicationModel.data[0]){
    applicationId = treasuryApplicationModel.data[0].Id;
}else{
    applicationId = sessionStorage.getItem('selectApplicationId');
}
var popover = $('.webui-popover')[0];
if (popover && $(popover).is(':visible')) {
    $('.webui-popover').remove();
} else {
    $('#manage-loan-team-members').webuiPopover({
        trigger: 'manual',
        type : 'iframe',
        url: '/apex/skuid__ui?page=LoanTeamMembers&id=' + applicationId,
        width: '620px',
        placement: 'bottom-left',
        closeable: true,
        onShow: function(element) {
                var popover = element[0];
                $(popover).css('bottom', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content').css('padding', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('width', '600px');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('height', $(popover).css('height'));
        },
        onHide: function() {
            $('.webui-popover').remove();
        }
    });
    $('#manage-loan-team-members').webuiPopover('show');
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="manageLoanTeamCommunication" cachelocation="false">
      var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

console.log(' popup session app id :: ' + sessionStorage.selectApplicationId);
var applicationId ;
var treasuryApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('TreasuryApplicationModel');
if(treasuryApplicationModel.data[0]){
    applicationId = treasuryApplicationModel.data[0].Id;
}else{
    applicationId = sessionStorage.getItem('selectApplicationId');
}

var popover = $('.webui-popover')[0];
if (popover && $(popover).is(':visible')) {
    $('.webui-popover').remove();
} else {
    $('#loan-team-communication').webuiPopover({
        trigger: 'manual',
        type : 'iframe',
        url: '/apex/skuid__ui?page=LoanTeamCommunication&id=' + applicationId,
        width: '820px',
        placement: 'bottom-left',
        closeable: true,
        onShow: function(element) {
                var popover = element[0];
                $(popover).css('bottom', 0);
                $(popover).css('z-index', '999');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content').css('padding', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').attr('id', 'ltc-popover');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('width', '800px');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('height', $(popover).css('height'));
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('overflow','hidden');
                $(".close").click(function(){
                    $("#blurBackground").remove();
                });
                if( $('#blurBackground').length < 1){
                    $(".webui-popover-inner").parent().before("<div id='blurBackground' class='ui-widget-overlay ui-front' style='z-index: 100;'></div>");
                }
        },
        onHide: function() {
            $('.webui-popover').remove();
        }
    });
    $('#loan-team-communication').webuiPopover('show');
}
