      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateLiabilitiesAndIncome" cachelocation="false">
      var params = arguments[0],
      $ = skuid.$;

var partyID = skuid.page.params.partyId;

var dfd = new $.Deferred();

var employmentInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EmploymentInformationModel');

$.each(employmentInformationModel.data,function(i,row){

    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {

        dfd.reject({
            message: 'Current employment start date cannot be future date or blank.',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }
});

var liabilityInfo = skuid.model.getModel('Liabilities');

$.each(liabilityInfo.data,function(i,row){

    let includeForDTI = row.genesis__Include_for_DTI__c;
    let amountOwing = row.genesis__Amount_Owing__c;
    let liabilityType = row.genesis__Liability_Type__c;
    let paymentFrequency = row.genesis__Payment_Frequency__c;

    if (includeForDTI) {
        if (amountOwing === null || amountOwing === '' || amountOwing === undefined) {
           dfd.reject({
                message: 'Please provide Amount Owing when Include for DTI is checked for a liability record.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            });
            return dfd.resolve();
        }
        if (liabilityType === null || liabilityType === '' || liabilityType === undefined) {
            dfd.reject({
                message: 'Please provide Liability Type when Include for DTI is checked for a liability record.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            });
            return dfd.resolve();
        }
        if (paymentFrequency === null || paymentFrequency === '' || paymentFrequency === undefined) {
            dfd.reject({
                message: 'Payment Frequency must be provided when Include for DTI is checked for a liability record.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            });
            return dfd.resolve();
        }
    }

});

var otherIncomeModel = skuid.model.getModel('OtherIncomeModel');

$.each(otherIncomeModel.data,function(i,row){

    let name = row.Name;

    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {

        dfd.reject({
            message: 'Income Name can not be blank.',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        });
        return dfd.resolve();
    }
});

dfd.resolve();
return dfd.promise();

    </jsitem>
    <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CalculateDTIForParty" cachelocation="false">
    var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var partyID = skuid.model.getModel('PageParamsModel').data[0].partyId;

var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeDebtToIncomeRatio', 'computeDebtToIncomeRatio', { objectID : partyID });
if (returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
    skuid.component.getById('includePartyDTIDashboard').load();
}
else {
    alert(returnMsg);
    skuid.component.getById('includePartyDTIDashboard').load();
}
    </jsitem>
</javascript>

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="MHA_GenerateViewData" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    // create relationship view table
	    var relationView = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipView');
		relationView.data = [];
		
		var relations = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipsAsEntity').data;
		for (i = 0; i < relations.length; i++) { 
            relationView.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'AccountName', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity__r.Name },
                    { field: 'RelationName', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity_Role__c },
                    { field: 'AccountId', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity__c}
                ]
            });   
        }
        
        var relatedRelations = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipsAsRelatedEntity').data;
        for (i = 0; i < relatedRelations.length; i++) { 
            relationView.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'AccountName', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity__r.Name },
                    { field: 'RelationName', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity_Role__c },
                    { field: 'AccountId', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity__c}
                ]
            });   
        }
        
        if(relationView.data.length > 0){
            // sort the records
            relationView.data.sort(function(a, b){return a.AccountName - b.AccountName});
            
            // need to save else skuid shows unsaved changes css
            skuid.model.save([relationView], {callback: function(result){
                // get first relationship details
                querySelectedAccount(relationView.data[0].AccountId);
            }});
        }
        
        // show button label as tooltip
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
	});
	// click the first div
})(skuid)

function querySelectedAccount(selectedAccountId){
    if(selectedAccountId){
        var selectedAccModel = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_SelectedRelationshipAccount');
        var accountIdCondition = selectedAccModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');
        selectedAccModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition, selectedAccountId);
        skuid.model.updateData([selectedAccModel],function(){
            // success
            highlightSelectedRow(selectedAccountId);
        });
    }
}

function highlightSelectedRow(rowId){
    // remove highlighted row css
    $('.account-relationships').find('table tbody tr').each(
        function(index, element) {
            $(element).removeClass("highlighted-row");  
        }                
    )
    $('.account-relationships table tr').each(
        function(index, element) {
            $(element).find('div #' + rowId).each(
                function(i, e) {
                    $(element).addClass('highlighted-row');      
                }   
            )
        } 
    )
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenAddNewRelationshipDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var title = 'Add Member';
var skuidPage = 'AddNewRelationship';
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + skuid.model.getModel('MHA_SelectedAccount').getFirstRow().Id;
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenPreviewDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var attachmentRow = skuid.model.getModel('NewAttachmentModel').getFirstRow();
var documentContentRow = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocument').getFirstRow();
var documentContentLink = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink').getFirstRow();
var documentContentVer = skuid.model.getModel('ContentVersion').getFirstRow();
var title = attachmentRow === undefined ? (documentContentRow.Title + '.' + documentContentRow.FileExtension) : attachmentRow.Name;

const docAId = skuid.page.params.id
var iframeUrl = '/apex/genesisExtn__previewDocCategory?id=' + (attachmentRow === undefined ? documentContentLink.Id : attachmentRow.Id) 
        +'&docAId='+ docAId + '&isdtp=vw' + '&docConId=' + (documentContentVer === undefined ? 'NULL' : documentContentVer.Id)
        + '&fileExtName=' + (documentContentRow === undefined ? 'NULL' : documentContentRow.FileExtension);
    
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: 'Document Viewer-'+ title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="AddAttachmentsModal" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var selectDocument = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryDetails').data[0];
var title = 'Add Application Documents to ' + selectDocument.clcommon__Category_Name__c; 
var skuidPage = 'ApplicationAttachmentList';
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + selectDocument.Id;
var prefixHtml = '<div><p>Select the following application documents that have not been added to any application document category and add them to <strong>' + selectDocument.clcommon__Category_Name__c + '</strong>.</p></div>';
openTopLevelDialog({
  title: title,
  iframeUrl: iframeUrl,
  prefixHtml: prefixHtml
});
    </jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteAttachment" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var catAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('CatDocAssociation').data[0];
var documentId = catAssociation.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c;
var parentId = catAssociation.clcommon__Document_Category__c;
var documentName = catAssociation.Name;


var title = 'Delete ' + documentName + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document'
      + ', <strong>\'' + documentName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document'
      + ' \'' + documentName + '\'';

var okAction = {
    func: 'generateDeleteDocumentMessage',
    parameters: [documentId, parentId]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
      title: title,
      message: message,
      cancelText: cancelText,
      okText: okText,
      okAction: okAction
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteDocumentCategory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var selectDocument = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryDetails').data[0];
var documentCategoryId = selectDocument.Id; 
var documentCategoryName = selectDocument.clcommon__Category_Name__c

var title = 'Delete ' + documentCategoryName + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document Category'
      + ', <strong>\'' + documentCategoryName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document Category'

var okAction = {

};

openTopLevelConfirmation({

});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DocumentListForNotification" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var selectDocument = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategoryDetails').data[0];
var title = 'Document Request'; 
var skuidPage = 'DocumentNotification';
var rootId = selectDocument.clcommon__Account__c !=null ? selectDocument.clcommon__Account__c : selectDocument.clcommon__Collateral__c;
if(rootId == '' || rootId == undefined){
    rootId = selectDocument.genesis__Application__c;
}
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page='+skuidPage + '&id=' + selectDocument.genesis__Application__c +'&rootId=' +rootId  ;
var prefixHtml = '<div><p><strong>Select Documents For Notification </strong>.</p></div>';
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl,
    prefixHtml: prefixHtml
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="SendDocuments">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var appdata = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var approw = appdata.data[0];

var partyData = skuid.model.getModel('BorrowerModel');
var partyRow = partyData.data[0];
var copartyData = skuid.model.getModel('CoBorrowerModel');
var copartyRow = copartyData.data[0];
try{
    var creditdata = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,genesis__Applications__c,genesis__Fico_Score__c FROM ints__Credit_Report__c WHERE genesis__Applications__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var creditrow = creditdata.getArray("records");
    
    var copartyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'CO-BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var copartyRow = copartyData.getArray("records");
    
    var partyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var partyRow = partyData.getArray("records");
    
    var QuerydataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Merge_Query__c ");
    Querydata = QuerydataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Querydata);
    
    var templatesdataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Template__c ");
    Templatedata = templatesdataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Templatedata);
    
    var link1= '/apex/APXTConga4__Conga_Composer?&SolMgr=1';
    var date = new Date();
    var i,
    link2= '&Id='+approw.Id+
               '&QueryId=';
    var len = Querydata.length;
    for(i=0;i<len;i++){
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Application Query')
            link2 += '[AQ]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
       
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Query')
            link2 += ',[ADVACTION]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        
        if(creditrow.length>0 &&  Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Credit Report Query')
            link2 += ',[CREDITSCORE]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+creditrow[0].Id;
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Contact Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[CONTACT]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[EMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)    
                link2 += ',[COEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Previous Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PREEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PRECOEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Other Source Of Income Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[OTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COOTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Outstanding debts'){
            link2 += ',[DEBTS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Asset Information'){
            link2 += ',[ASSETS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Driver License Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[BORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<Templatedata.length;i++){
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Adverse Action notice' &&  Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Letter - Non Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Credit Application' && Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Consumer Credit Application - Non-Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
    }
    link2 +=  '&SC0=1&SC1=Attachments&DefaultPDF=1&DS7=7';    
    var finallink = link1+link2;
    window.open(finallink);
}catch(Exception){

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="buildPickList" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],  $ = skuid.$;
var entries = [];
var documentCategories = skuid.model.getModel('DocCategoryParentList');
$.each(documentCategories.getRows(),function(i,row){
  if(row.clcommon__Account__c){
    entries.push({value: row.clcommon__Account__c, label: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name,defaultValue: false });
  }else if(row.clcommon__Collateral__c){
    entries.push({value: row.clcommon__Collateral__c, label:row.clcommon__Collateral__r.clcommon__Collateral_Name__c,defaultValue: false });
  }else{
    entries.push({value: row.genesis__Application__c, label : "Application Documents",defaultValue: false });
  }
});
return entries;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addParentChildDocCategory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var docModel  = skuid.model.getModel('ParentRecordList');
var parentUser = docModel.data[0].parentRecord;
var parentDocuCategory;
var documentCategory = skuid.model.getModel('DocCategoryParentList');
var appId = documentCategory.data[0].genesis__Application__c;

$.each(documentCategory.data,function(i,row){
  if(row.clcommon__Account__c==parentUser){
  parentDocuCategory = row.Id;
  }else if(row.clcommon__Collateral__c == parentUser){
  parentDocuCategory = row.Id;
  }else if(!row.clcommon__Account__c && !row.clcommon__Collateral__c) {
  parentDocuCategory = row.Id;
  }
})

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
  return item.row.Id;
});
var documentDefinitionList = new Map();
  $.each(params.list.getSelectedItems(),function(i,item){
  if(documentDefinitionList.get(item.row.clcommon__Parent_Document_Definition__c)){
  var array = [];
  array= documentDefinitionList.get(item.row.clcommon__Parent_Document_Definition__c);
  array.push(item.row.Id);
    documentDefinitionList.set(item.row.clcommon__Parent_Document_Definition__c, array);
  }else{
  var array = [];
  array.push(item.row.Id);
  documentDefinitionList.set(item.row.clcommon__Parent_Document_Definition__c, array);
  }
  });

for(var category of documentDefinitionList) {
  sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ApplicationDocumentManagement','addDocumentCategeries',{
  parentUser : parentUser,
  docCatId : category[0],
  defintions : category[1],
  parentDocuCategory : parentDocuCategory,
  appId : appId
  });
}
closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({divIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe']});
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderColumnWIthExternalLink" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
  value = arguments[1],
  $ = skuid.$;
if(null!=value){
  var url = '/' + field.row.Id;
  field.element.html('<a href="' + url + '" target="_blank">' + value + '</a>');
}</jsitem>
    <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addAccountDocCategory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
  return item.row.Id;
});

var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ApplicationDocumentManagement','addAccountDocumentCategories',{
                                  accId : skuid.page.params.id,
                                  docDefIds : selectedIds
                                });
skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').dialog('close');</jsitem>
<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getObjectType" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var uiModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentRecordList');
var uiModelRow = uiModel.data[0].parentRecord;

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewApplicationDocumentCategoryList_Party');

var appCollModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewApplicationDocumentCategoryList_AppCollateral');

var docDefModel = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentDefinition');
var objTypeCondition =  docDefModel.getConditionByName('objectType');

var isAccount = false;
$.each(partyModel.data,function(i,row){
  if(row.clcommon__Account__c === uiModelRow){
      isAccount = true;
  }
});

var isCollateral = false;
$.each(appCollModel.data,function(i,row){
  if(row.genesis__Collateral__c === uiModelRow){
      isCollateral = true;
  }
});

if(isAccount === true) {
    docDefModel.setCondition(objTypeCondition,'clcommon__Party__c');
    skuid.model.updateData([docDefModel],function(){
       console.log('update data complete!');
    });
    
} else if(isCollateral === true) {
    docDefModel.setCondition(objTypeCondition,'Application_Collateral__c');
    skuid.model.updateData([docDefModel],function(){
       console.log('update data complete!');
    });
} else {
    docDefModel.setCondition(objTypeCondition,'Applications__c');
    skuid.model.updateData([docDefModel],function(){
       console.log('update data complete!');
    });
}
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesis" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});

var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));

var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};

window.parent.postMessage(message, '*');

function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var newAttachments = $.grep(allAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return $.inArray(attachment.Id, origIds) == -1;
});

var newIds = $.map(newAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var attachmentTable = skuid.$('#attachment-table').data('object');

$.each(newIds, function(index, id) {
    var checkbox = $(attachmentTable.list.renderedItems[id].element).find('input[type=checkbox]');
    if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
        checkbox.trigger('click');
    }
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesis" filepath="attachmentsComponent.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderFileName" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1],
	$ = skuid.$;

field.element.text(value);</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>

    height: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.nx-fileupload > .ui-button {

}

.nx-fileupload > .nx-fileupload-status {

    top: 0;
    right: 90px;
}</cssitem>

    </css>
  </resources>

    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

    $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="populateApplication" cachelocation="false">(function(skuid){
   var $ = skuid.$;
    $(function(){
        var application = skuid.$M('TaskApplication');
        var applicationRow = application.data[0];
        var newTask = skuid.$M('newTask');
        var newTaskRow = newTask.data[0];

        newTask.updateRow(newTaskRow,{
           genesis__Application__c: applicationRow.Id,
           genesis__Application__r: applicationRow
        });
        // We need to go manually tell our Field Editor
        // to re-render its "genesis__Application__c" field.
        // Since a Field Editor registers itself as a List
        // on our newTask Model, we can do this
        $.each(newTask.registeredLists,function(){
            $.each(this.renderedItems,function(){
               $.each(this.fields,function(){
                    if(this.id==='genesis__Application__c') this.render();
               });
            });
        });
    });
})(skuid);</jsitem>


      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderApplicationId" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

$(params.element).text(params.row.genesis__Application__r.Name);</jsitem>

var params = arguments[0],

var exceptionTaskPopUpElement = document.querySelector("#NewTaskPageTitle").closest("body > div.ui-dialog.ui-widget.ui-widget-content.ui-corner-all.ui-front.ui-draggable.ui-resizable");
exceptionTaskPopUpElement.id = 'addExceptionTaskPagePopup';

var exceptionTaskPopUpWindowElement = document.getElementById("addExceptionTaskPagePopup");
exceptionTaskPopUpWindowElement.classList.add("addExceptionTaskPagePopupStyle");
</jsitem>
</javascript>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="providerOnLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var integrationProvider = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderModel').data;
var providerUIModel = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel');
$.each(integrationProvider,function(i,row){
    let familyName = row.intframework__Integration_Family__r.Name;
    if (familyName == 'Consumer Credit') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isFicoActive : true
        });
    }else if (familyName == 'UCC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isUCCActive : true
        });
    } else if (familyName == 'Documents And Disclosures') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isDocumentsAndDisclosures : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYCActive : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYB') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYBActive : true
        });
    }  else if(familyName == 'E Sign') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isESignActive : true
        });
	}
		else if(familyName == 'Corporate Information') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isCorporateInformationActive : true
        });
    }
});</jsitem>

setTimeout(function(){ 

    var policyConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
    var policyConditionValue;
    $.each(policyConditionModel.data, function(i, row) {
        var j = i+1;
        policyConditionValue = document.querySelector("#policyTable > div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(" + j + ") > td:nth-child(6) > div > div");
        
        if (policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Exception" ||
        policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Rejected") {
        policyConditionValue.classList.add("red-textbox");//red color
        } else if(policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "In File" ||
            policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Pending" ) {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("amber-textbox");//amber color
        }
        else {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("blue-textbox");//blue color
        }
    });

}, 1000);</jsitem>

        saveApplication();

function saveApplication(){
    var applicationM = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var applicationData = applicationM.data[0];
    var newAppParams = {};
    var paramsMap = {};
    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationM;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = null;
    newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    
    paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    paramsMap.AddFeeToLoanAmount = true;
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap;
    
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    applicationData.updateApplication = false;
    $.unblockUI();
    location.reload();
}

 text-transform: none !important;

    font-size: 24px;

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
        var pageName = skuid.page.params.page;
        if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage') {
            var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPackageApplication').createRow({});
        } else {
            if(paramId){
                queryApplication(paramId);
            }else{
                var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPackageApplication').createRow({});   
            } 
        }
          
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPackageApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
        
    });
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPackageProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPackageApplication');
var paymentStreamModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPaymentStreams');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
};

return result;

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeSecondDueDay" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

    var picklistEntries = [];
        
    
    var i;
    
    for (i = 1; i <= 31; i++) {
        picklistEntries.push(
            { value:i, label: i, defaultValue: false, active: true }
        );
    }

return picklistEntries</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="pageMode" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode === "read"){
    return true;
}else{
    return false;
}</jsitem>

Name: PackageView
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models>
    <model id="ParentAndIncludedApplication" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="genesis__Applications__c" orderby="genesis__Parent_Application__c NULLS FIRST, Name ASC" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="RecordTypeId"/>
        <field id="RecordType.Name"/>
        <field id="RecordType.DeveloperName"/>
        <field id="genesis__Parent_Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Parent_Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Parent_Application__r.RecordType.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Parent_Application__r.RecordType.DeveloperName"/>
        <field id="genesis__Account__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Account__r.Name"/>
        <field id="DisplayName" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Display Name" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{genesis__Parent_Application__c}},
	    IF({{genesis__Parent_Application__r.RecordType.DeveloperName}} == 'Package', 
	        IF({{RecordType.DeveloperName}} == 'Credit_Line', 'CF(Credit Line): ' + {{Name}}, 'CF: ' + {{Name}}), 
	             'Take Down: ' + {{Name}}),
	    IF({{RecordType.DeveloperName}} == 'Package', 
	        'Deal: ' + {{Name}}, 
	             'Credit Line: ' + {{Name}})
	)</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="genesis__Status_of_Credit_Facility__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Maturity_Date__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Total_Facility_Variance__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="1 OR 2">
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Parent_Application__c" operator="=" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="PackageView_ApplicationLockStatus" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="RecordStatus" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="param" defaultValue="isLocked" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </fields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <wrapper uniqueid="application-deals-queue-view">
      <components>
        <panelset type="vertical" uniqueid="deal-panelset" cssclass="noPaddingTop">
          <panels>
            <panel width="50%" uniqueid="AppQueue" cssclass="appQueue">
              <components>
                <panelset type="custom" uniqueid="sk-S68n0-159">
                  <panels>
                    <panel width="100%" cssclass="" uniqueid="application-queues-wrapper-panel">
                      <components>
                        <queue tagrendertype="template" querystring="id={{Id}}" defaultitemparameter="id" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" model="ParentAndIncludedApplication" uniqueid="package-deal-queue" cssclass="simple-queue" itemicon="fa-caret-square-o-left" module="ngUi">
                          <rendertemplate>{{DisplayName}}</rendertemplate>
                          <searchfields/>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                          <interactions>
                            <interaction type="tap">
                              <action type="updateIncludePanel" panelid="deal-dashboard-iframe" querystring="id={{Id}}" pagename="NGLoanDashBoard" module="ngUi"/>
                              <action type="custom" snippet="UpdateSessionStorage"/>
                            </interaction>
                          </interactions>
                        </queue>
                      </components>
                    </panel>
                    <panel cssclass="buttonPanelHt" width="100%">
                      <components>
                        <pagetitle uniqueid="add-credit-facility-container" model="ParentAndIncludedApplication" cssclass="queue-button-container">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="multi" label="Add Drawdown" icon="fa-plus" secondary="false" cssclass="" uniqueid="sk-2evrVl-86">
                              <hotkeys/>
                              <actions>
                                <action type="showPopup">
                                  <popup title="Add Credit Facility To Deal - {{$Model.ParentAndIncludedApplication.data.0.Name}}" width="70%">

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	                $ = skuid.$;
	            </jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="windowCallbacks.js">var params = arguments[0],
	                $ = skuid.$;
	            </jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateSessionStorage" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
	    $ = skuid.$;
	    
	sessionStorage.setItem('selectApplicationId',params.row.Id);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OnLoadScript" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
		$ = skuid.$;
	var applicationRecords = skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication').data;
	
	    if(applicationRecords.length > 1) { // preprocessing data
	        if(applicationRecords[0].genesis__Parent_Application__c) {
	            // This case will never happen in a real life scenario where a credit line is approved and a draw is done
	            // and later the credit line is added to the package application. So when credit line application will be opened, the records
	            // wont be ordered properly. So it is required that the credit line record is made as the first record.
	            for(var index = 0; index < applicationRecords.length; index++) {
	                if(applicationRecords[index].genesis__Parent_Application__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Package' ) {
	                    var temp = applicationRecords[index];
	                    applicationRecords[index] = applicationRecords[0];
	                    applicationRecords[0] = temp;
	                    skuid.model.getModel('ParentAndIncludedApplication').adoptRows(applicationRecords);
	                    break;
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	    // set height of window
	    // var windowHeight = window.innerHeight - 50;
	    // $('#deal-dashboard-iframe').height(windowHeight);
	    // trigger click of first item in queue
	    $($('#package-deal-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
	    var applicationFirstRow = applicationRecords[0];
	    sessionStorage.selectApplicationId = applicationFirstRow.Id;
	    if(applicationFirstRow.RecordType
	            && !(applicationFirstRow.RecordType.DeveloperName === 'Package'
	                || applicationFirstRow.RecordType.DeveloperName === 'Credit_Line')){
	        $('.appQueue').attr("style","display:none;");
	        $('#deal-dashboard-container').attr("style","left:10px;");
	    }else {
	        $('#deal-dashboard-container').attr("style","right:10px;");
	    }</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>

      <cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="true" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="customcss.css"/>
      <cssitem location="inline" cachelocation="false" name="packageViewCSS">body {

	}
	
	#AppQueue {

	}
	
	#deal-dashboard-container {

	    right: 10px;
	}
	
	#deal-dashboard-container #dashboard-container,
	#deal-dashboard-container #dashboard-container div {
	    position: absolute;

	    left: 0;
	    right: 0;
	}
	
	#deal-dashboard-container > div{
	    height:100%;
	}
	
	#deal-dashboard-iframe {
	    height:inherit;
	}
	#deal-dashboard-container #dashboard-container #deal-dashboard-iframe {
	    display: block;
	    width: 100%;
	    height: 100%;
	    border: none;
	}
	
	.queue-button-container .nx-header-right {
	    float: none;

	}
	
	div[pagename="PackageView"] {
	    position: absolute;

	    bottom: 0;
	    left: 0;
	    right: 0;
	}</cssitem>
    </css>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateDebtIncomePage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

    <css>
            <cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="simple-queue" cachelocation="false">.dti-queue-panel .nx-queue-header {
    display: none;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

.dti-queue-panel .simple-queue.nx-queue {
    border-top: 0;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-queue-item{
    color: white;
}
.dti-queue-panel .nx-queue-item-inner-with-icon {
    height: 60px;
}

.dti-queue-panel .sk-icon {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid white;
    margin: 0 15px 0 0;
}

 /*to get the font content, go https://astronautweb.co/snippet/font-awesome/ */

.dti-queue-panel .sk-icon.sk-icon-members:before {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    content: "\f007";
    padding: 4px;
    font-size: 20px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected > .nx-queue-item-inner {
    color: white;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected .sk-icon {
    color: #48ce94;
    border: 2px solid #48ce94;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item {
    border-left: 5px solid #7f7f7f;
    background: #7f7f7f;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-template {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-queue-loader {
    display: none;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item:hover {
    border-left: 5px solid #2d5074;
}

.dti-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected {
    border-left: 5px solid #48ce94;
}</cssitem>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="inlinecss" cachelocation="false">#party-queue-panelset {

    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height:100%;
}

#party-dti-queue {

    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 250px;
    height: 100%;
    overflow: visible !important;
}

#party-dti-queue > div {
    height : auto !important;
}

#party-dti-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 250px;
    right: 0;
    height:100%;
}

#party-dti-page-include {
    height:100%;
    overflow:visible;
}

#partyDTI-queue {
    margin: 50px 0 0 0;
}

div[pagename="PartyDTIDashboard"] {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height:100%;
}
            </cssitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="reloadStatements" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var statementParameterModel = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters');
var statementParameterRow = statementParameterModel.getFirstRow();
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__FinancialSpreading_Label_FSUnsavedChanges}}");

if(statementParameterRow&&statementParameterRow.FSStatus){
    alert(message);
    return false;
}

var frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('balancesheetAccountIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('balancesheetCollateralIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('incomeAccountIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('incomeCollateralIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('cashflowAccountIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('cashflowCollateralIframe');
if(frameToLoad)
    frameToLoad.render();
frameToLoad = skuid.component.getById('ucaAccountIframe');

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="renderStatementsYearPickList">var field= arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
$ = skuid.$;
var globalCashFlowStatementModel = skuid.model.getModel('GlobalCashFlowStatementModel');
// If there isn't a value, then make the value our 'default'
if (globalCashFlowStatementModel.data.length>0) {

var selectedStatementsYear = '';

$.each(globalCashFlowStatementModel.data,function(i,row){

selectedStatementsYear +=row.clcommon__Statement_Year__c+';';

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateGlobalCashflow" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
skuid.actionSequences.getByName("LoadingMessage").run();	
var statementParametersModel = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters');
var parties = statementParametersModel.data[0].Parties.replace(/;/g, ',');

var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.FinancialStatementActions', 'generateGlobalCashFlowStatements', {
applicationId : skuid.page.params.id,
accountIds : parties,
statementYears : statementParametersModel.data[0].StatementYear,
}
);

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="initializeStatementYearPickList" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var picklistEntries = [];

var currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();

var i;
for (i = currentYear; i >= currentYear-20; i--) {
picklistEntries.push(
    { value:i+'', label: i+'', defaultValue: false, active: true }
);
}

return picklistEntries
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="intializeStatementName" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;


var statementParameterModel = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters');
var row = params.row;

// Financial Statment name for the pdf
if(row.Entity&&row.Type){
var selectedEntity = row.Entity;
var selectedType = row.Type;
var selectedValue = selectedEntity ==='Account'? row.Account : row.Collateral;


var typeFieldDetail = params.model.fields.find( obj => {
return obj.id==='Type'
})

var entityFieldDetail = params.model.fields.find( obj => {
return obj.id===selectedEntity
})

var typeLabel = typeFieldDetail.picklistEntries.find( obj => {
return obj.value===selectedType
})

var entityLabel = entityFieldDetail.picklistEntries.find( obj => {
return obj.value===selectedValue
})

if(entityLabel&&typeLabel){
statementParameterModel.updateRow(statementParameterModel.getFirstRow(), {
    StatementName:typeLabel.label+' - '+entityLabel.label
});
}
}
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="hideCollateral" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var statementParameterModel = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters');
var entity = statementParameterModel.data[0].Entity;
if(entity == 'Account'){
    $('#balancesheetCollateralIframe').hide();
    $('#incomeCollateralIframe').hide();
    $('#ucaCollateralIframe').hide();
    $('#ratioCollateralIframe').hide();
    $('#cashflowCollateralIframe').hide();
}else if(entity == 'Collateral'){
    $('#balancesheetAccountIframe').hide();
    $('#incomeAccountIframe').hide();
    $('#ucaAccountIframe').hide();
    $('#ratioAccountIframe').hide();
    $('#cashflowAccountIframe').hide();
} </jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="trackFinancialStatementChanges" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
    	window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
            var data = JSON.parse(event.data);
            if(data!=undefined&&data.isFSChanged!=undefined){
                var statementParameterModel = skuid.model.getModel('StatementParameters');
                statementParameterModel.updateRow(statementParameterModel.getFirstRow(), {
                    FSStatus:data.isFSChanged
                });
            }
        });
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>

<label id="genesis__GENERATE_SCHEDULE_MSG"/>
</labels>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="external" name="Apex AJAX Toolkit" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js ">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateSchedule" cachelocation="false">var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__GENERATE_SCHEDULE_MSG}}");
$.blockUI({
    message: message,
    onBlock:function(){
        generateSchedule();
    }
});
function generateSchedule(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('SchAppModel');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidNewApplication','generateSchedule',
    {
            applicationId : scRow.Id
    });
    if(result == 'Successfully done'){
        var AmortizationSchModel = skuid.model.getModel('AmortizationSch');
        skuid.model.updateData([AmortizationSchModel],function(){
            $.unblockUI();
        });
    }
    else {
        $.unblockUI();
        var panel = $('#errorDisplayForPaymentSchedule');
        var editor = panel.data('object').editor;
        editor.messages.empty();
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: result,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }
        ]);
       
    }
}
</jsitem>
<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteRow" cachelocation="false">var param=skuid.model.getModel('Holiday_Schedule').getFirstRow().Id;
skuid.model.getModel('Holiday_Schedule').deleteRow({Id:param});
skuid.model.getModel('Holiday_Schedule').save();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateRepaymentPlan" cachelocation="false">var repayModels = skuid.model.getModel('Flexible_Repayment');
var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('SchAppModel');
var scRow = scModels.data[0];
var expectedPayStart = scRow.genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c;
var repayRow = repayModels.data[0];
var showAlert = true;
if(repayModels.data.length === 0){
    showAlert = false;
}
repayModels.data.forEach(function(element) {
    if(element.clcommon__Payment_Start_Date__c === expectedPayStart || repayModels.data.length === 0){
        showAlert = false;
    }
});

if(showAlert){
    alert("Atleast one repayment plan start date should be equal to the contract start date to generate schedule");
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateApr" cachelocation="false">var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('SchAppModel');
var scRow = scModels.data[0];
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidNewApplication','calculateApr',
{
        applicationId : scRow.Id
});
alert(result);
window.location.reload();</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateData" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var pageTitle = $('#RateScheduleTablePageTitle');
if (pageTitle !== undefined && pageTitle.data('object') !== undefined) {
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;

    var rsModel = skuid.model.getModel('Rate_Schedule_Setup');

    var error = false;
    $.each(rsModel.data, function(rsCount, rateScheduleRow) {
        if (rateScheduleRow.genesis__Index__c === undefined && rateScheduleRow.genesis__Interest_Rate__c === undefined) {
            editor.handleMessages([
               {
                  message: 'Interest Rate must be provided for rate schedule where index is not provided.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
            error = true;
        }
    });

    if (error === true) {
        return false;
    }
}

var feeSchModel = skuid.model.getModel('Fee_Schedule');
var feeApplicationMethod;
$.each(feeSchModel.data, function(rsCount, feeScheduleRow) {
    if(feeScheduleRow.clcommon__Include_In_EMI__c === true){
        feeApplicationMethod = 'Fixed_Amount';
    }
    else{
        feeApplicationMethod = null;
    }
    feeSchModel.updateRow(feeScheduleRow, {clcommon__Fee_Application_Method__c : feeApplicationMethod});
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateRateSchedule" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('SchAppModel');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();

var resultMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ScheduleActions','populateAndUpdateRateSchedule',
{
    applicationId : appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'Id')
});

if (resultMsg !== undefined & resultMsg[0].includes("success")) {
    var rateScheduleModel = skuid.model.getModel('Rate_Schedule_Setup');
    rateScheduleModel.updateData();
}
else {
    var pageTitle = $('#RateScheduleTablePageTitle');
    if (pageTitle !== undefined && pageTitle.data('object') !== undefined) {
        var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
        editor.handleMessages([
           {
              message: resultMsg[0],
              severity: 'ERROR'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
}
</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createNewPolicyException" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for setting variables for creating new policy exception
*  Where: Create new policy exception button
*
* @name  createNewPolicyException.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


//a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

$('#createNewPolicyException').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingPolicyException').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newPolicyException = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
var newPolicyExceptionRow = newPolicyException.data[0];

if(!newPolicyExceptionRow){
    var newPolicyExceptionRow = newPolicyException.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'showCreatePolicyException', value:true },
            { field: 'showExistingPolicy', value: false },

        ]
    });

}else{
    newPolicyException.updateRow(newPolicyExceptionRow ,
                        { showCreatePolicyException : true ,
                          showExistingPolicy : false });

}
</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="submitAutoStatus" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for setting status to pending or approved on whether it requires approval or not
*  Where: save button of modal for creating new policy exception
*
* @name  submitAutoStatus.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


//a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

var newPolicyExceptionCreate = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyExceptionCreate');
var newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow = newPolicyExceptionCreate.data[0];

if(!newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow){

    if(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Policy_Exception_Definition__r.genesis__Requires_Approval__c){
         var newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow = newPolicyExceptionCreate.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'genesis__Status__c', value:'Pending' },

            ]
        });
    }else{
         newPolicyExceptionCreate.updateRow(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow ,
              { genesis__Status__c : 'Pending' ,
          });
    }

}else{

        if(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Policy_Exception_Definition__r.genesis__Requires_Approval__c){
            newPolicyExceptionCreate.updateRow(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow ,
                        { genesis__Status__c : 'Pending' ,
                          });
        }else{
            newPolicyExceptionCreate.updateRow(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow ,
                        { genesis__Status__c : 'Pending' ,
                          });
        }

}

skuid.model.save([newPolicyExceptionCreate]);

</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="checkRequiredFields" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for validating all the required fields are enterd or not
*  Where: Create new policy exception modal save button
*
* @name  checkRequiredFields.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


//a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

var newPolicyExceptionCreate = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyExceptionCreate');
var newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow = newPolicyExceptionCreate.data[0];

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#errorPanelCreate ').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var isBlankStr = function(str) {
    return (str === undefined || str.length === 0 || !str.trim());
}


if(!newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow){
    if(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Policy_Exception_Definition__r.genesis__Requires_Officer_Explanation__c && isBlankStr(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Officer_Comments__c)){
         return displayMessage('For selected policy condition template " Officer Comments " is mandatory  ', 'ERROR');
    }


}else{
    if(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Policy_Exception_Definition__c){
        if(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Policy_Exception_Definition__r.genesis__Requires_Officer_Explanation__c && isBlankStr(newnewPolicyExceptionCreateRow.genesis__Officer_Comments__c)){
             return displayMessage('For selected policy condition template " Officer Comments " is mandatory ', 'ERROR');
        }
    }else{
        return displayMessage('Please select a policy condition template ', 'ERROR');
    }
}</jsitem>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="checkDeleteRenameQuestionDefinitionName" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var isDirty = false;
var questionModel = skuid.model.getModel('Question');
var displayConditionForDependencyModel = skuid.model.getModel('DisplayConditionForDependency');
displayConditionForDependencyModel.setCondition(displayConditionForDependencyModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Display_Condition_Question_Id__c'), params.row.Id);

$.when(displayConditionForDependencyModel.updateData()).then(function(){

    if(displayConditionForDependencyModel.data.length<=0)
    {
        questionModel.deleteRow({Id:params.row.Id});
        questionModel.save();
    
        $.when(displayConditionForDependencyModel.updateData()).then(function(){
            $.each(questionModel.data,function(i,row){
                var rowNumber = i+1;
        
                questionModel.updateRow(row, {
                    Name: 'Question - '+rowNumber
                });
            });
            questionModel.save();
        });

    }
    else{
        alert('Question can not be deleted');
    }
});
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="renderQuestionName" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0];
var cellElem = field.element;
var value = arguments[1];

if(field.row.clcommon__Question_Definition__r!==undefined){
    cellElem.text( value + ' - '+ field.row.clcommon__Question_Definition__r.clcommon__Question_Description__c);
}
else{
    cellElem.text( value);
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="reloadPageInclude" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var questionPage = skuid.$('#createquestion').data('object');
if(questionPage!==undefined)
{
    questionPage.load();
}

var displayConditionData = skuid.$('#displayConditionTable').data('object');
if(displayConditionData!==undefined)
{
    displayConditionData.load();
}</jsitem>
    </javascript>

#sk-3Wzo-372 > div > div > div > i{

}

#sk-OKj-351 > div > div > div > i{
    font-size:16px;
}</cssitem>
